It is nice to be out anywhere and you can access a live video feed from your home.  Would like to have one more inside and one outside the home as well.

Reviews.Title: Great for fish tank viewing away from home
Reviews.Author: Chris B
Reviews.Content: Now that I have my whole fish tank automated, I have been using this to view the tank away from home. It give me a piece of mind when I go on vacation. Also, lets me check on the cats when I am out of town.

Reviews.Title: great cam lots of features seller was great and fast shipping
Reviews.Author: R. Atkinson
Reviews.Content: well first i got the tenvis ip391w great cam good night vision liked it a lot then got the tenvis ip602w great day light cam not so great at night picture look very white anyway got the tenvis jpt3815w for inside let me tell you it's great i know the foscam is the best but for the money you can't beat this cam good night vision at about 18 feet decent picture

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Justin T.
Reviews.Content: ****Update*** So after only one week the camera stopped working! It started making a loud noise and when I unplugged it and plugged it back in the noise stopped but the camera would not reset.  I even tried resetting it via the reset button and nothing.  I then plugged it into my router via an Ethernet cable and it would not recognize the camera.  Have to send it back! Even though this is extremely frustrating I'm going to order another one and give it a try again, you just can't beat the price!  However; if this one stops working then I'm going to have to switch brands. Have to give it only three stars for now.This is my first wireless IP camera so I wasn't sure about going with Tenvis but am really impressed.  The setup was a little difficult however; I did figure it out without having to call or e-mail support.  I am using this camera as a baby/child monitor.  The night vision is outstanding!  I downloaded a paid app from Android ($3.99) which allows background noise even when the screen is off, it also makes sounds when the camera detects movement.  My only complaint (the reason for the 4 stars and not 5 stars) is the speaker sucks!  You can hear ok, so the mic is decent but when you try and talk back through the camera is does not work well if at all most of the time. Other than that, it's great and you can't beat the price.  Just bought another one.

Reviews.Title: Not bad if you are familiar with networking
Reviews.Author: mrandall@teknalight.com
Reviews.Content: The set up is fairly straightforward if you have any experience with IP cameras at all.  However, there are a few glitches along way.  First off, try using the enclosed software to set up the camera, then go to the web browser interface to fine tune.  Set a static IP address so you can always find the camera using the browser on your local area network.  If you use the IE browser, there is a plug in that you must install, but on some Windows 7 machines it may not work, labeling it dangerous.  Instead, use Firefox or Chrome to browse to your camera.  For viewing outside of my home network, I set up a no-ip.com dynamic dns address.  After opening up a port on my router, that works great, but I realized if I tried to mix viewing the camera from outside and then inside my LAN (using the internal network address), the camera seemed to stop working!  Not sure why that happens. A reboot of the device fixs it, so I just stick to viewing the camera from outside the network only, which is where I need it anyway.  Also, after 48 hours or so the camera seems to not respond very well.  So I have a cheap home programmable timer to reset the power once a day.  Kind of a kludge, but that seems to give me reliable performance.  I also use an Android phone with IP Cam View app - works great and allows controlling the camera remotely.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price.
Reviews.Author: Fredtopia "Fredtopia"
Reviews.Content: I used to install state of the art cameras in banks, offices, even police stations and the airport.  Cameras have come SOOOOO far in the past 5 years!  Then, a $1,000 camera would maybe get 480 lines of res, totally analog, 12 volts, either color only or black/white only and maybe night vision that worked for 10 feet.This thing has pan/tilt, color with good light, GREAT night vision, listen in audio, the 2-way has yet to work, works over wifi, uses 5V, works over the internet and works great on my iPhone!Let's put aside it's actual quality for a second so I can say that anyone who complains at all about the cameras today has NEVER worked on a camera from 5 plus years ago, strung 100's of feet of siamese cable, futsed with 12V power suplies, lenses, fixed cameras, time lapse recorders yadda yadda yadda and dinosaurs used to rule the earth...This little $60 thing is amazing!  You just need to know what to expect, how to set it up, and all of the VAST shortcomings of existing CCTV. (Closed circuit video, TV, surveilinece, etc)The fact that I could order this device, program it for 5 minutes, stick it upside down in the bunny hutch in my yard and now everytime the weather sucks or my wife hears a noise and tells me to go check on the bunnies all I have to do is roll my eyes, pull out my iPhone and show her a LIVE VIDIO FEED of her rabbits happily chewing on thier carrots.  I can even hear them crunching on them!  THAT IS AWESOME!So, I am sorry if the directions are too hard for you, I am sorry you don't know how to port forward a public port on your router and access your public IP from the Interwebs...that is your problem....take a course or youtube it for Pete's sake.All of these very "similar" cameras come from the same factory in China and are re-branded with a different label so I understadn a little confusion.Get the one with all the features and the lowest price, they are all the same.  Shop the APP store for a different iphone app, the Tenvis one stinks and they admist this on the website.For the price, versatility, and quite frankly the performance of these little thinkgs I am replacing all my $200-$300 cameras at my house and office with these!One for the Bunnies,One for the front door to see who is there and to pan down and see if my amazon purchases have arrives....or even see who stole them!!!!One for the babies room,One pointed at my car at nightone in the back yard to watch Racoons and OpossumsBe amazed!

Reviews.Title: Garbage!!!!!
Reviews.Author: javier
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I have ever given a negative review of an item I purchased on Amazon and I buy a lot of items on here. First off the instructions are not very clear or concise and to make it worse it is written in very poor English. Tried to find manual on line-guess what? Exact same manual included in box and on CD. Camera worked only on wired connection and no matter what I tried I could not get it to work. I'm not exactly a computer genius but better than average. I sent an email to the Tenvis customer service and after one I received an response. The response was to read the manual again. Really? I called customer service and had to leave a message regardless of what time I called. Never received a return call. What good is a wireless camera that only works wired? In case you are wondering what I did to fix the issue here goes: changed ports, channels, security settings, DCHP, DDNS, wireless settings from N &G;, to B, on the router. Reset the camera dozens of times. Turned off firewalls and security on computer. Attempted to download firmware update and finally clicked my heals three times and asked that the camera go back home. It may work for some but not for me and really should have never been this difficult to install plus no customer support. Sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Nice IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Cher and Jim
Reviews.Content: I have 3 JPT3815W cameras (plus 1 of a different brand). These are about as easy to install within a LAN as any other wireless device. However, setting them up for access from outside a LAN is more difficult. To be specific, I happen to have an Actiontec DSL Modem and I was able to achieve remote viewing only after configuring the modem to allow 'port forward' for each of the cameras. To accomplish this, I assigned port numbers of 8080, 8081, 8082, and 8083 to each camera respectively. After this I signed onto the Actiontec and created a port forwarding table. (I did this by entering each one of these numbers as well as each cameras IP address). Then, because my Internet service provider uses Dynamic IP addressing, I signed up with a DNS service provider. I elected to sign up with NO-IP at a cost of $15 per year. (Note that DYNDNS charges $20 per year). However, if only one domain is being setup then there is no cost to sign up. After obtaining my DNS account with NO-IP, I was able to create 4 separate hostnames and to then associate each camera's IP address and port number to that particular hostname. (Tenvis offers technical support if it is needed).

Reviews.Title: Had it for 2 weeks can only view while on my couch
Reviews.Author: Stephanie J Best
Reviews.Content: Hopefully my attitude will change. I've had this camera for 2 weeks. My intent was to receive emails from it and be able to view it remotely form my computer/phone at work because we had a creepy dude in our back yard last month. As it is now it only works when my camera or computer is in range of my wireless router. So right now I can use it to watch my wife walk out to our shed from the couch (useless)  I've been dealing with their customer service, but I think we're talking different languages. If I cant get this thing to do what it says it's capable of, it's going to turn into an expensive baseball.

Reviews.Title: Not good...not good at all
Reviews.Author: ryan
Reviews.Content: I know about technology. i know quite a bit about it. this isn't another one of those reviews where the person didn't know how to set it up and thus hates it. this is a review from someone who has many security cameras around the house and is quite familiar with setting them up.if you have even a shred of networking knowledge, you can have this set up in literally 5 minutes or less. easy enough. but once it's set up, you see what the image looks like....not good. it's somewhat clear, but the colors are quite washed out. greens are more reddish and overall it's just bad. take the money you would have spent here, and add a few more bucks for bette quality. mine quit working within a few days.

Reviews.Title: VERY Frustrating!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Scire
Reviews.Content: I wish I could tell you if it works well or not, but I cannot get it to work at all unless it is tethered to my laptop via an ethernet cable, rendering it completely useless to me. I have been through the poorly written manual (really bad translation from Chinese AND hard to follow) numerous times and will get a different result every time I try to set up the wireless. Messages range from not being able to find the camera on one attempt to successful set-up on the next attempt when nothing was changed. After more than a week of frustration, I cannot wait to get this thing back in the box and out of my life.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: E. Munoz
Reviews.Content: Works great, a on/off switch for the night mode would be good but they don't advertise it so it's ok. web interface/user asignment/creation works fine.A bit more information on how to find which model you are using to update the firmware would be good but it is not hard either.All and all, good buy

Reviews.Title: Much too complicated to set up for anyone but an engineer
Reviews.Author: Paul from Berkeley
Reviews.Content: Don't know if I've rated this one before but I returned it. Much too complicated to set up for anyone but an engineer. I use iCam, which is inexpensive and easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Niru
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing, I can view everything from my office and I even get good quality video, I highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Please look at all reviews before buying
Reviews.Author: J. A. Carpenter
Reviews.Content: Stopped working on they wireless network.  Can get it to work wired, but that does not work in the location where I want the camera mounted.  It kind of worked for 2 months, but never worked correctly.  tech support never contacted me back.  Had to buy Blue Iris software to get some of the funtions that I needed, but was supposed to be built in to cam.

Reviews.Title: it was to much like a toy not reliable
Reviews.Author: mertrna
Reviews.Content: did not like at all returned it would recommend as a christmas toy baa hummbug was not what i thought it was needed something more professional

Reviews.Title: Works good.
Reviews.Author: P. Moreland
Reviews.Content: Got it, had to call support, and email support to try to get WiFi working. Eventually, it just started working for no reason. Strange.Initial setup was fairly easy. Menus and text are broken English, but navigatable.FTP and email alerts worked fine. Pan/Tilt works great. Night vision works ok.Motion Detection though, does not work well. I can non stop emails even on the lowest detection settings. the problem is, I only get emails from 6-8am, and 7-1am. I have the schedule set to ALL DAY. Not sure what is going on with that.Web/android apps work great. Easy to setup and port forward as I already had a DDNS name.PROS:FTP/email alerts (when it works)Web accessCheapCons:Motion detection doesnt work right sometimesBroken english menus, but not a real problemReflection from windows wont allow night vision to work. You cant mount it behind a window and have it work 100% correct.

Reviews.Title: If "Camera/Feed Not Available" is what you like to see, this is the camera for you, otherwise, look elsewhere
Reviews.Author: Stephan Seyfert
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to serve as a simple baby monitor. I regret that decision. I need something to be completely reliable for that purpose, and any security use would also demand reliability. Sadly, this product does not deliver. It constantly fails to connect to the network, via both LAN and Internet.The setup was very easy and everything worked fine. After about 3 days, it started constantly disconnecting. Power cycle achieved nothing. Setting it all up from the start again achieved nothing. It might work but then again, it might not. That's not acceptable to me. I guess it's true: you get what you pay for. I want my money back.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality and Cheap
Reviews.Author: somyougago
Reviews.Content: Would not recommend this brand.  It's cheap quality build.  You get what you pay for.  I recommend Trendnet.  It's slightly more expensive but it's secure and better quality.

Reviews.Title: Very Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I have wanted to set something up to keep an eye on my dog and house while I was at work.  I read a lot of reviews that were good and bad and setting up can be difficult.  I have never set up a camera like this before and while I do know my way around a computer, I have never messed with IP Addresses, DDNS and port forwarding and things like that.  I was really excited about the low price and I gave it a try.  There is a video demo to follow along with on the tenvis.com website that's actually pretty good.  However, if your setup does have a problem somewhere along the line, it is difficult to figure out what the next step should be.  There's not much of a manual with this camera and I had to go online and look for reviews and forums for help to get through this.  I got a little confused when I read other reviews where people were going to these other website for DDNS addresses so the camera could be viewed over your smart phone or web browser and I found that you do not need to go this route because Tenvis provides you with an address to do this for free.  I did have to contact customer support for a few things and they were good at getting back to me by email, but a little hard to understand sometimes.  Calling wasn't an option for me because they make you leave a message and the support center is only open Monday - Thursday from 7-3.  After I figured out how to port forward on my router and setup the DDNS, everything worked great on my phone.  I have an LG Intuition and I downloaded the IP CAM Viewer for free and tested controls out and then upgraded to the PRO for $3.99.  All the controls worked really well and I could move the camera, however, I discovered the motion detection is way too sensitive no matter what setting I put it on and I get tons of emails in sets of three. While the audio worked and I speak through the camera, it was so quiet and hard to hear that it really wouldn't do any good.  I ended up hooking up some external speakers to it and it's way better but the speaker volume is at max and it shouldn't need to be at max to hear the audio. Also, there is a light on the front that constantly blinks and I ended up covering that with electric tape so it wasn't so distracting.  There is a ring of red lights that you can see at night around it, but that didn't bother me for what I was using it for.  Another down side to this camera is video recording was unreliable and hard to play back with the phone app and the power chord is extremely short.  You will probably need an extension for it or move an electrical outlet to be closer tot he camera. Overall, I was really happy with it and decided to purchase an IPROBOT3 as well.

Reviews.Title: Works to a point, certainly not great
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_moK4RYBS7JE9RA', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_moK4RYBS7JE9RAloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; var swfWidth = "320"; var swfHeight = "100%"; var flashVersion = "9.0.115"; var bgColor = "#FFFFFF"; var swfParams = {}; var flashParams = {}; var embedAttributes = {}; swfParams.amazonPort = "80"; swfParams.allowFullScreen = "true"; } } } Length:: 0:37 MinsCamera is ok for the money but is definitely not without it's issues. I had no problems setting up the camera, port forwarding to the web, 3rd party motion detection software etc... that's all fairly standard, about the same as any other camera I've used.-1 star - VERY short power cord, need to splice to put it anywhere that's not 4 feet from a plug.-1 star - as you can see in the video, there is some sort of issue with the cams light sensing ability. I personally don't know enough about this technology to really understand what is going on, but what I do know is that when you point it towards any bright source of light, the video immediately becomes distorted and "stretches out" is how I would describe it. I have the same model mounted on my front porch (in an area the can't be affected by rain) and it has the same issue. Works good all night, when the sun comes out and is hitting the ground in front of the camera I get the distorted image. Turn the camera away from the light and the image goes back to normal. Haven't seen anyone refer to this issue with any other brand of camera.-1 star - customer service is a JOKE! First they have an answering machine for their so called America customer support, really??? Second I brought the above mentioned issue up with Tenvis on their customer support forum and their only reply to me is that it looks like the video wasn't recorded with their software. I explain to them that this is irrelevant as I have the same issue when not recording and using their web interface and I get no response? Maybe they will yet, but it's been several days now and I'm not counting on it.Bottom line, at this point I wish I would have spent a few more bucks and purchased a Foscam or one of the other slightly higher priced brands. They all look very similar to this model but they definitely are not the same. Unless they provide a solution in the next couple days, this is getting returned for another brand.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for indoors.
Reviews.Author: hens-n-chicks
Reviews.Content: Works well. Do yourself a favor if you are not technical and go to the Tenvis website and download the IP Camera Wizard to set it up. It walks you through the steps and makes it simple and fast! I did get hung up on the DDNS service, but was able to figure it out by reconnecting the router cable and clicking on the DDNS wifi link. The night vision works, so well that I can see where I did touch up paint on my walls.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas M.
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera so far and I,m thinking of purchasing another one.It,s easy to use and well worth the money.the picture is clear  and almost perfect and very quiet when rotating and traversing.I give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Works great...once you update the firmware.
Reviews.Author: Z. Krzycki "Euro"
Reviews.Content: Word to the wise if you buy this...it works great and hopefully my instructions help someone else...The only limitation was using Wireless G but my router has dual channels so I just set the 2.4Ghz channel to use Wireless G, no biggie.Update the firmware first...I had to install v1.7.25 before my wireless router would work.  You can use whatever encryption you want and password once you update.  When changing the admin password there must be a character limit or they don't allow numbers because while this worked on my computer, my iPhone could not connect until I changed the password to a 7 character (letters only) password.  Change the password before trying to add the camera via app on a mobile device (save you a step later).

Reviews.Title: Can't view over 3/4G
Reviews.Author: Jorge M.
Reviews.Content: Despite the fact is very easy to configure. I have been unable to view the camera from 3G or 4G on my phone. It only works when I am at home connected to the same wifi the camera is (what's the point then?). It has worked 2% of the time in other wifis and 2% on cell data (for some reason). I forwarded the port on my router and still cannot get it to work.. I e-mail tech support from the vendor and they told me to contact my ISP to ask them if my router/service allows port forwarding. I have tested and am sure that the port is open. Disappointed of this product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Saul Infante
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something to remotely monitor my house and found this wonderful camera. It is very easy to install and easy to use. It really was what I wanted. Now this wherever I can connect to it.100% recommended!!

Reviews.Title: Great product! Setup is easy but you must read this for easy setup!!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: OK, I have to give this product five start.  For the price you get great features.  However, to set this up easily you MUST NOT USE THE INSTALLATION CD!!!!1) Connect the power cable to your camera.2) Connect the camera to your router using the supplied Ethernet cable.2) Go to the Tenvis website [...] and download the IP Camera Wizard.  Using this is the easiest way to setup!!Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: hayley hap
Reviews.Content: The best thing ever. Very dependable and easy to install.  Great find. Will highly recommend this product to my friend and their family .

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, great price.
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera continuously for over two weeks and have had no problems.  The picture is clear and the IR provides excellent coverage at night.  The software and camera installed easily.  I have recommended this camera to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: sheril1876
Reviews.Content: I have to say this camera is really good for the price.it shows really clear even in the night.I recently bought a camera of different brand I wasnt satisfy because the night vision wasnt all that clear I couldnt make out what was going on  it.but this camera is absolutely perfect for the price.I have no complains or regret purchasing this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: David Lee Smith
Reviews.Content: It took more time than I expected to set up the software. The color picture is good on my laptop. The night vision also worked well Pans, tilts, zooms, does everything that I want. The android app is easy to use.  You can probably tell that I am not close to a techie, but for home use to check on the grand kids in the basement, etc it is great.

Reviews.Title: Quick setup. Works as advertised.
Reviews.Author: CT Mom "CT Dad"
Reviews.Content: "The IP camera was running as described 5 minutes after opening the package. Pleased with the image quality and brightness. Actual frame rate can be choppy, but is just as likely the speed of my wifi. I'd recommend this product."

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Cheri Fish
Reviews.Content: This wireless surveillance was much needed product for us and has worked as we had hoped.  It was easy to install and link to our wireless for full functional use.Thank you for providing such a good product.

Reviews.Title: For the money these are pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Lex D.
Reviews.Content: Let's be honest, these are not overly expensive cameras. They do however function very well for what they are.I bought three of them and have had them up for a couple of weeks and I use them to monitor my infant when he is being babysat.I gave them five stars because they do what I expected, wanted, and do it better than I actually hoped for considering the price range.Now, the sound functionality...we'll it's crap...but I have not plugged in an external mic to see if that works better. The speaker pretty much sucks too. So if you are buying for that feature, then my five star review would probably be a lower rating in your case.Setup....setup is a pain, based on reviews I expected it. I ended up port forwarding 80, 81, and 82 in order to get all three functional on my net gear router. I did a lot to get these working and I wish I had done a write up then so I could remember it all to provide others assistance, but I didn't, and I'm sorry to not be of more help. I will tell you that if the search tool is not finding it, but you see the MAC address of the camera in your router, then factory reset the camera..there is a little button on the back, hold it in, it took a good minute of me holding it in, then the camera will reset and spin all around for another minute. After that, I could find in search and router. Do the same if it's not showing in router even if you compare MAC address.I say MAC address because sometimes even if you rename the camera, the name does not show in the router.I do have their camera software, it is just OK, so I mainly use Livecams Pro on my iPhone and iPad. I find that their software sends the cameras spinning every time I switch views and I have to readjust the aim point.Trying to think of anything else I can share but my mind is a blank.These performed good enough...btw I only use inside and the IR will bounce off reflective material and blind itself, so windows area a no go at night...but they still perform well enough in price and my needs that I am going to try out a couple of the robot3 models.Hope this helps someone out there.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Natascha Pratt
Reviews.Content: We planned a trip overseas months before our dogs decided they wanted to have pups. I didn't want to miss anything while I was away. The setup was easy. I was able to access the camera and watch the puppies play and their mom take care of her babies.

Reviews.Title: 3 Steps to monitor my house.
Reviews.Author: AganVarman "self actual"
Reviews.Content: Based on reviews and value for money, i went ahead with the purchase. Key steps to install were1) Connect camera wired to internet router, and follow the steps in manual. Breeze, to set up in wifi and monitor in wifi.2)  Set up free account in no-ip , you get free for a month and a discounted 15$ a yr subscription in an email later. Updated third party ddns , in network-ddns settings of the camera. Now URL t<camera number>.mytenvis.org will work from 3g/4g. I used Tenvis sight Android app in my phone , easy to set up and works nice.3)  Installed cameras (repeatedly bought after first worked)  at locations to cover windows and zones. Reduce size to one level down (340*240) speed 20, and tilt fastest, this worked optimal and fast, clear on my phone in 3g.Five stars because camera works wifi, phone sturdy, though wall stand can be more sturdier but not bad.  Android app is nice. Though i pay for no-ip (usage can be more than camera like voip ), feels bit more safer to own my ip server than product vendor.  Hope this review helps.

Reviews.Title: Works great !
Reviews.Author: Mary Tucker
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, picture is clear, connected both internal (for my Ipad) and externally for my PC at work and my iphone.  Going on vacation soon and feel secure that I will be able to see my property

Reviews.Title: Camera was exactly as described
Reviews.Author: Darrin Wilson
Reviews.Content: After we finally got it set up correctly, works as described.  Finally had to hard line it to our router to get it to work.

Reviews.Title: Easy install
Reviews.Author: M. Howard
Reviews.Content: These were quick and easy to install. Had them set up and running in my shop in no time.Work fabulously and gave us peace of mind without having to spend a whole lot.

Reviews.Title: Doesnt support all securities
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. Davis "funnytree63"
Reviews.Content: No where in product literature does it mention that it does not support WPA2 Enterprise security, and when asking for help from their tech support the return message was that it is hard to support all securities and they have no plan to.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Gasem M Al-Idan
Reviews.Content: It is a good product and I am happy wit it and I will purchase it again when we need it.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: YH
Reviews.Content: Friend recommended us to buyEasy to set up and useWorks for usWill recommend it to othersGood product

Reviews.Title: Great IP cam on a budget
Reviews.Author: IronScott
Reviews.Content: I have installed and use several different branded IP cameras. This Tenvis was by far the least expensive but was still very easy to install. The software is typical of most IP cam software and it works fine. No problems getting it setup on my network. Mobile setup was fairly easy as well.Given that I have various brands of cameras I choose to use Blue Iris for monitoring and alerting. BI has this camera configured so it was just a matter of entering the network ip and it just works.Once you've setup a couple IP cameras you pretty much know how to work with them all. If this is your first cam just carefully read the instructions and read through the reviews here on Amazon for tips. It really is not too difficult but can be challenging if you aren't at least a little technically savvy.All that being said, very happy with this camera. Will have no problem buying again.

Reviews.Title: Good product, good price
Reviews.Author: Aderbal Ramos
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a client and he love it. He can view his business from his iphone.Easy to install, easy to configure.If you use it with Chrome you will not be able to record, you need to use Internet Explorer 9 or down to do.

Reviews.Title: Not taking thte $15 bribe
Reviews.Author: Susan G. Davis
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty computer savvy but me and 2 office buddy's couldn't get this to work.  After many emails with support we can't get it to record on my system. I'm sending it back. Waste of time.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis wireless camera.
Reviews.Author: R. Burd
Reviews.Content: Love it.  received as shceduled. Installed useing cable then went wireless. Needed to do port forwarding on modem. took 2 tries but worked out. Now have on computer , Iphone, ipad, and galaxy s3. works great so far using pan tilt and all.

Reviews.Title: Security cam
Reviews.Author: E. Shelton
Reviews.Content: We actually mounted this outside under a porch cover and it has survived a hotter than ever summer, and a colder than ever winter.  My only issue with this camera is that the colors are a bit odd.  Image is clear, but red shows up as green and vice versa.  In the summer we have pink grass and we fly the good old green white and blue! lol I use iSpy free monitoring software.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: butch petrello
Reviews.Content: great camera i have 3 of them now, i feel safe when i leave my home and i can watch it, last one i got i recived it a day early thanks for the fast service

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: midohioguy
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised, no complaints. Pic quality is great. Easy to install and use, I bought two, only running one so far.

Reviews.Title: Good Home Camera
Reviews.Author: Joel T
Reviews.Content: I was looking to get a camera to monitor my cats when I'm away, and this product works really well for my needs. It has an app for android and IOS, has a decent range of motion, and has excellent night vision. I have left it running for days at a time with no problems. It was a little time consuming to set up the camera for external access, but has been working like a charm since then and can't be beat at it's price point. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great ip camera for under 50 $
Reviews.Author: Amit Bachar
Reviews.Content: This device keeps the shape that became so popular since my first IP Cameras purchased back in 2009, with the lens ball recalling the Princess Leia's hair cut.My 2 old units are still in service, despite a hard life in my hands as Guinea pigs, with a permanent TTL connection soldered to them...Some quick highlights of the Tenvis JPT3815 "2013 edition":MJPEG 640x480, w/o IR CutNot to be mistaken with JPT3815W+ (5db antenna and IR-Cut)Wifi 802.11b/g and Ethernet 10/100Embedded microphone and speaker for 2-way audioAudio out connectorNo alarm I/O connectorMy Tenvis unit came with the firmware 1.7.10. That version was unstable and I upgraded to the newly released 1.7.15 during my tests, which gave some relief.Tenvis warned that the 2013 edition's firmware, which now comes as a unique 3.6MB .bin file, is not backward compatible.The IP Camera Wizard software is aimed at making the network setup as easy as possible. The program will detect the camera for you and help configuring it in a few steps.In addition, the Quick Start Guide gives a clear overview of the  installation steps: Wired network setup, first access to the camera from a browser, IE plugin installation (IPCPlayerIEplug.ocx installer comes embedded in the camera), wireless LAN setup,...The wizard will even assist in setting up the Internet access with your predefined built-in DDNS id (xxxx.tenvis.info). On the first day of test, there was no way to register to Tenvis DDNS, and I see similar complaints on their forum. The next day, it suddenly worked. Hopefully it will eventually become more stable as their server has recently been upgraded. Something to keep an eye on...The following third party DDNS are also possible: dyndns.org, freedns.afraid.org,[...], [...] and ddns.oray.com.All these efforts in assisting the beginner with setting up the IP Camera are good points to be credited to Tenvis.If you're more experimented, checking the predefined IP address and port labelled on the camera base should get you started quickly as well .The first screen loaded upon connecting is a welcome page with various access options, the first one being the detected browser. The IE ActiveX plugin can be installed from there. The interface is localized in several languages...

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Jesus Zambrano
Reviews.Content: Security camera very good recommend, easy installation and compact. The picture is good, nitida and panel configuration is simple.!! Bring the screws to secure the base, the base, network cable and camera.

Reviews.Title: Works well, easy setup, and an upgrade for me
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these and have been pleased.  Setup wasn't all that difficult and the pan/tilt features really work well via the remote iPhone/Pad application.  My previous camera wasn't infrared nor had the pan/tilt feature, so this is certainly an upgrade.  Very pleased and would highly recommend at this price point.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Lily
Reviews.Content: Im very satisfied with this purchase. It works well, video quality is clear and great, super easy to set up this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great buy.
Reviews.Author: Wendy Anfinson
Reviews.Content: This product was shipped quickly and it is everything it said it was. I hooked it up to my computer with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Aaron Weaver
Reviews.Content: I installed this camera and didn't have any issue getting it configured and remotely accessing the camera. For the price I am satisfied with the product. The video is decent and the interface for the iphone works well.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam for Great Price
Reviews.Author: Joseph Boyd
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for a quick delivery.  I found setup easy and quality better than i expected.  I will definitely consider buying more of these cameras.

Reviews.Title: TENVIS JPT3815W Wireless IP Camera
Reviews.Author: mx229
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is an excellent product. Very clear picture day or night, super easy to set up, I will probably buy another.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME camera
Reviews.Author: S. Jones
Reviews.Content: I received this camera very fast and was very anxious to set it up. Set up was fairly easy and pretty fast. It took me a little to figure out how to do everything it's capable of, which is a lot. I love the motion detector! Anytime someone walks in front of it, it alerts you. The app for a smart phone is very nice and you can receive immediate alerts. I definitely would recommend this product to everyone looking for this type of surveillance.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: nightlayne
Reviews.Content: You won't find a better security camera for the price. It was easy to set up and I was pleasantly surprised with all the features it has.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: todd barnes
Reviews.Content: pleasure doing buisness so far i am enjying the camera but having difficulty connecting it with my 4g service other than that easy set up.

Reviews.Title: Great IP Security Camera
Reviews.Author: BostonAmazoner "Joe P"
Reviews.Content: Great security camera I had it installed & running on my PC in a a few minutes. It was very user friendly setup, I use the Tenvis Iphone app to watch my house & my dog while I'm not home. This camera is top quality & very good to have.

Reviews.Title: Great, inexpensive, Wireless Network Camera
Reviews.Author: Lewis S Ribner
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, excellent price! Camera provides a clear picture, even in a dark room. The product works exactly as described and was very easy to install and have up and running in less than 15 minutes. Great for home use as a baby monitor or for home or office security.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!!!!  but UPDATE FIRMWARE
Reviews.Author: Derek Slayton
Reviews.Content: Great for a in home camera for streaming to cellphones with motion detection. I will definitely buy a few more.

Reviews.Title: Drops connections, Repositions randomly
Reviews.Author: Nivas R "Nivas"
Reviews.Content: Perfect when iy works, but that is rare. Works for a few minutes, decides to move/reposition or connection drops. I am still trying to make it work continuously.

Reviews.Title: Once you get past the weird, it works great
Reviews.Author: dinardo
Reviews.Content: So the setup is a bit wonky-turn all of the settings off, then set it up how you like (it can't deal with timed AND motion alerts.) Once I got past that it diligently sends me email alerts if it sees any motion (light-based I think). Being able to remotely control it from my phone, or peek in on my dog during the day is great. Worth the extra money (which is still much less than some of the other models out there).

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I'm looking for!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Castro
Reviews.Content: I'm loving this product already even after just a day of use. This is exactly what I'm looking for, good product at a very reasonable price.  By the way, installation is so easy.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Like the simple, step by step installation guide.successfully installed less than 30 min.Works nicely on  my i phone and the video quality is satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: michael bresnahan
Reviews.Content: I like the wireless feature which allows me to move the camera to different areas quickly. There are two was to configure the camera the first is through the set up wizard which I didn't use the second is doing the configuration directly on the camera. The directions for the configuration are very easy to follow and comprehend. Only recommendation I would like to see is the ability to block out small portions of the motion detection area that the camera is looking at. That way you can remove a tree branch of ceiling fan from the area you would like to monitor. Other than than a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! Very easy to set up!
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Gordon "theandrewgordon"
Reviews.Content: I looked over foscams and other ip cameras, but this one had great reviews, and low and behold it lived up to the reviews! :) Now we can easily check on our kids room during nap time to make sure no one is out of bed. :)Setup is as directed... Connect to router via ethernet, set up camera IP address etc. then disconnect and test. Worked like a charm.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Updated may 14returned item after less than a week of use I can no longer access the camera on my phone without using the same wifi that the camera is on. As I wanted to be able to view the camera away from home and I can no longer do this I have decided to return the item and look for a better onefast shipping with easy setup. Product works great works on my galaxy s4 perfectly. Definitely plan on buying more in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Sean Winningham
Reviews.Content: Camera can be used day or night, has 360 degree rotation, and can be viewed on your phone or tablet via app.  comes with a mount that can be connected to a wall.  comes in standard, HD, and UHD.We only had the camera for about a month or so, but no issues.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera!
Reviews.Author: KMK
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to put it outside our condo and monitor from inside because for some odd reason, for the first time, the peephole is situated too high!Wireless capability is very nice as we can monitor from all living rooms and bed rooms. We can rotate the camera up/down/left/right, within the given software features, which you can install access through ip address. Day and evening, the views are great and clear. At night, thanks to night vision, we can still see and differentiate somewhat if it's postman or some other strangers, of course we can't be sure if they are really postman!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Joel Hash
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. Everything I expected when I purchased it. I will probably purchase another. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Camera used as a Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Marcus Kirtley
Reviews.Content: After purchasing about $200 on a Summer Infant video monitor 2 yeas ago, the stupid thing stopped working. Not to mention the range wasn't that great.  We were hooked on the ability to watch out twin girls and wanted another video monitor, but weren't going to spent a bunch of money on a new one that may only last another 2 years.  I had been looking at IP camera's in the past just for home security and remembered to look again and see what one cost these days.  To my surprise you can pick the baby up pretty cheap as you have found on Amazon.Setup was pretty stinking easy with a small manual that came with the product.  Once on your network downloading the App for you phone and setting that up was also a breeze.  So far I'm completely satisfied with this product.  The picture image isn't HD or anything spectacular but it is 3 time better than the summer infant monitor we had.  We love that you can take pictures and record as our twins are often playing in the same bed and doing some pretty adorable things together while they should be napping. :)Overall I would recommend this as a baby monitor and a security camera.  The ability to pan and tilt is spectacular and very quit compared once again to our other monitor.  YOU SHOULD BUY THIS MONITOR IT IS WORTH EVERY PENNY.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Edwin Eslava
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product. Easy set-up.  Fast shipping.  I have another one set up at my house.  Good for watching kids and for house security.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis JPT3815W Wireless IP camera IS AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: D.O.M.
Reviews.Content: This camera performs excellent.  Its low price makes it an ideal choice for home surveillance.  Excellent picture quality, easy setup, very controllable.  The only problem I have so far is trying to access the camera remotely when Im away from my LAN.  There is info online about doing this and I am working my way through it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little cam at a great price point.
Reviews.Author: Greg Colin
Reviews.Content: I went into this not really sure what to expect, but it had good reviews and the price was right.It's been a treat so far, for the two and a half months I've had it. Image quality is surprisingly good, set-up is relatively easy, and it's connected to both of my wireless networks easily. It will occasionally take a few moments to activate a "sleep" connection, but it's not a huge issue for my situation. Some neighbors were victim to vandalism attempts so we set this up in front as both a deterrent and to be able to check any noise late at night right from bed. It works perfectly for that situation. We keep it indoors, up against the window, and while the IR can indeed create a "glow-back" effect (normal) I can still see adequately in low or no-light conditions. Placed outside I imagine it'd be flawless. I have not tried to audio or mic so I can't comment on those aspects, but I've used it successfully on my Windows 7 PC, Android phone, and iOS 7 iPad Mini.I'm planning on buying another pair so I can monitor everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great entry level camera!
Reviews.Author: E. Casassa
Reviews.Content: This was the first surveillance camera that I set up for my property. I had a list of features and a price point in mind before I started my research. This little guy exceeded my expectations based on some iffy reviews. I positioned the camera approximately 45 ft away from my gateway. My provider delivers 100 Mbps download and even with three kids streaming on their tablets, phones, and game consoles I receive a smooth feed of what's going on in my driveway, yard, and street. Remote access works really well and I feel confident that I am now able to build a strong case against the USPS and the shenanigans the carriers engage in with my mail. I do recommend purchasing a third party software for your computer to take full advantage of what this camera (or any other similar device) has to offer.

Reviews.Title: BE WARNED
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is very nice and the app is easy to use; however that being said, if you don't know how to network or setup proxy servers DO NOT get this camera for remote use.  You can use it away from home but make sure you know how to access and modify proxy settings and change your router preferences.  I work in Tech and this was easy for me, but i know from experience helping people this is not a user friendly remote access camera.  That being said great camera and wonderful for someone who is going to use it for in home only.

Reviews.Title: faulty
Reviews.Author: Joseph Nunez
Reviews.Content: worked ok for one day then crashes completely. Tried the reset different power supply as indicated by Tenvis web site yet no responds from the camera. I got no use out of this product. none at all. People be careful about these low end cameras. very upset I cannot believe that this camera is not working only after a very few hours of receiving the product.

Reviews.Title: Good quality camera at a good price
Reviews.Author: Jason Hou
Reviews.Content: This wi-fi camera was everything I was looking for. If anything the audio is a little noisy, but overall a nice product.

Reviews.Title: This camera is Great
Reviews.Author: Richard Bland
Reviews.Content: This camera is Great. Very easy to install. I had power issues with it so I had to exchange it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!!!!
Reviews.Author: Antonio Estipona Jr.
Reviews.Content: TENVIS JPT3815W Wireless IP is awesome though at first I had difficulty make it work through my HTC 4G LTE.  But the technical support from Beijing really helpful.  His name is Coco.  He did remote configure my Port forwarding.  Though I missed to see our loving cat M&M; in our short visit of our friend from South Carolina.  But now it is 100% works.  I recommend this product.  It is awesome!!!  Works perfectly!!!

Reviews.Title: Decent low cost unit
Reviews.Author: lester d. stephany
Reviews.Content: Not going to set any records for distance or clarity but for its price it is a nice little panable camera

Reviews.Title: Great item!!!
Reviews.Author: Vincent L Ragona Jr
Reviews.Content: Item as expected.  Easy to setup and access. I use this camera to check in on my 91 year old grandmother and it does the job just fine.

Reviews.Title: Could not get it to work without wire attached to router .
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: With the camera connected to the router (wire) it worked great , nice picture .  Could not get it to work without the wire attached to the router.  Today nothing should be anything but Plug and play .Directions are horrible . Customer service is in China , Beijing  time .Research after the fact , many blogs complaining of same issue .

Reviews.Title: Affordable and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Laura Fauth
Reviews.Content: This camera hooks right up to my iPad making it easy to use and control with a touch of the screen.  The sounds quality wasn't the best but for the price this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Robert Ferioli
Reviews.Content: I will use this keep an eye on my vacation home. I will use the motion detection and watch the HVAC

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: kburns
Reviews.Content: Performs as good as wireless cams costing twice as much.I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good deal

Reviews.Title: Great Deal would Recommend
Reviews.Author: Steven Kozy
Reviews.Content: Great Deal, ordered it after seeing a friend watching his camara on his phone. Ordered it next day and received it next day, Camera was simple to set up and to mount.  It came with all mounting hardware and is outside under my eaves so not to get wet. The Camera performs better than i could have imagined for the Price. The sound is excellent and movement is smooth. I am now watching my home from my phone and will recommend it to friends. Thx Steven

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Leopold Stotch
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my purchase of this camera. The Model that I received in the mail is the JPT3815W. The device needs to boot itself and when you first power it on, it will cycle itself which means it turns the camera around in all directions first. SO don't keep your hand rested on it or have objects in it's way when it starts. The instructions DO NOT explain this, but the instructions compared to some other companies of the like are BEAUTIFUL!!!Pros: Price  Night Vision  Console allows disabling of power light indicator or pulse setting  Almost 360 degrees of view  Plug and Go. Use a network cable to get it started (same as router you have to use a cable the first time(included))  Wifi makes it easy to put this camera anywhere there is a power source.Cons: CD shipped with unit is BLANK I had to go download the software.  Length of Power Cord  No option to disable IR Night Vision (reflections cause white out)  No zoom feature with OSD but works in programs such as ISpy and YawCam  Must use the name "admin" as login and cannot be changed (within camera firmware)  No clear definitions on which address' supply which streams for 3rd party software(but I still figured it out)I might purchase another one of these. These cameras are so fun to play with. Download ISpy and try the motion detections and other settings. A very good buy, just a little disappointed in the lack of some basic camera features but you really cannot beat this for the price. Having it shipped in two days with Prime, just plain awesome. I hope the camera makes it a while.

Reviews.Title: Love it. Great IP cam for the price.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Ramirez
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up for in home viewing but a bit hard for outside viewing. But got it working after playing with it for a while.Can't beat the price compared with the other brands.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa S.
Reviews.Content: We ordered two of these cameras for our studio and love having them on our computers to be able to view any time at our studio or even at our home.  A+++

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Stevensad
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work well with wep wifi security, in fact it I had to use a cable.  For the price, it is decent.

Reviews.Title: Product review
Reviews.Author: Angelito Espejo
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I am very  much satisfied with the product. I feel safe being able to access my house on surveillance. This product meets my expectations I will recommend this procduct to my family.

Reviews.Title: Item was well worth the money
Reviews.Author: rdiprima013
Reviews.Content: item is easy to set-up, easy to configure and easy to view from android phone and any browser. I will make sure to include Tenvis in my ext search for another camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap as heck
Reviews.Author: W. Scardino
Reviews.Content: I can't argue with cheap.  Especially if it's for a lot of technology in a small package.  A Cam with night vision, wifi, web interface and audio input and output.  Count me in...  640x480 is not a great resolution for a huge room or a back garden but for a small bed room it's not too bad.  I had to knock off a couple of stars, and I will explain why.  On wifi this thing drops out so much I had to wire in a cable just for its exclusive use.  I found it wasn't so much the place I was putting it but the power of the cams built in wifi range.  It wasn't consistent enough to stay streaming.  So it would fall over after about an hour or so and restart.  This would cause a problem with the software I am using (iSpy).  The motor for the pan and tilt is very loud, however I didn't knock a star off for that.  The other reason I took off a star was that I have a white tinted line down my screen from top to bottom slightly off center.  It doesn't really concern me.  However, others my be upset to find there video is impaired.

Reviews.Title: This is the coolest thing ever !!!!
Reviews.Author: whooops61
Reviews.Content: ...and once you figure out how to put it on your network, you don't need anything but an electric outlet. I am going to get a few more. And with a remote program like Teamviewer, you can access your cameras from literally anywhere (as long as your computer is on)."

Reviews.Title: Works Perfectly
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Ive just started using this product but i love it. its quite flexible and the quality is just right. It was easy to set up and i love the ability to view the feed from my phone!

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!
Reviews.Author: tim daniel
Reviews.Content: Very great product. Took me a mi ute to figure out exactly how to configure the cameras. But after I went to tenvis.com everything was easy as could be. Excellently priced and exceptional product. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: JUNG MIN HAN
Reviews.Content: I love this. I will buy one more! Working beutifully. Great price! Nice design. I am recommeding this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor for Baby
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: The monitor was easy to install and it works great. We set it up to monitor our baby with our phones and computer, now we can see the baby anywhere in our house without having to lug around and charge an extra monitor. I also like it that you can pan the room, right now the baby is just in the crib, but eventually will be roaming the room and it will be nice to have the monitor be able to move around the room.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price!
Reviews.Author: Luis G. Vazquez
Reviews.Content: For what you are paying for this camera, it works great. Setup was a bit tricky but got it to work. If you want to be able to see the video feed from outside your network and you use a Wi-Fi router with the camera you got to setup port forwarding; once you do that, you’ll be able to watch the feed from anywhere with internet access. I’ve tested the android app with an LTE connection and I was able to view the feed and control the camera with no problems. I’ve only used the official TENVIS app (I do wish they add the ability to record from the android app).

Reviews.Title: Good product, great price
Reviews.Author: shirley Tu
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Tenvis JPT3815w after doing some research online. after comparing  the price and the specifications with other cameras, I decided with this one and I am pretty happy about that. the camera is easy to set up, the video quality is good, pan and tilt is very smooth, night vision is clear. The only problem I have is to set up DDNS on mac computer, but after I change to PC, everything is fine. overall, I am satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: TENVIS, JPT3815W Wireless IP Pan/Tilt/Night Vision internet Surveillance Camera's
Reviews.Author: Willie Jones
Reviews.Content: They are the greatest camera in the world for their cost.  I am really enjoying deploying them with all my customers that need surveillance cameras in their areas.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Tenvis IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Nathan Koester
Reviews.Content: I ordered the camera as a demo device to develop a home automation system, and never intended to use it for anything more than a Proof of Concept tool, as well as development device.The camera was able to be used without any software, allowing it to be remotely accessible just by finding the IP and going to the web browser. The wireless setup was very detailed, however, changing the port is not intuitive. It is recommended to use the wizard tool that can be downloaded from their site to adjust the port number, as well as changing the port on the router itself. I did this to ensure a safer port, as well as allowing it to be port forwarded manually so I may use my own domain, versus the one provided with every camera for remote access.The android app that is provided for downloading is intuitive, easy to use, and does allow listening from the camera, as well as speaking through the camera, so there is 2-way audio support.The SDK is the only issue I have with the system. As a developer, I prefer to use Linux, but the SDK is natively written for Windows, which appears to only be for the User Interface. Since I will have to re-write some of the sample code given to work on Linux, i'm displeased, but only due to the extra work I need to do to interface with my current system. As this is a niche use, I am not detracting from the overall rating, as it's rare that people that buy this product will use the SDK, as far as I am aware.Overall, it's a simple to use, easy to setup camera, and can be used right out of the box with no manipulation, unless you wish to set it up for external network monitoring.

Reviews.Title: nice and economy ip camera
Reviews.Author: SHUN LAU
Reviews.Content: Like the technical support being very helpful when I had a problem to set this camera up.amazing product, didn't expect much from the night vision, however it is much better than i thought.5 stars ++++++

Reviews.Title: TENVIS JPT3815W Wireless IP Pan/Tilt/ Night...
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: It seems working fine with my local internet. I have set portforwarding but unable to see my cam from outside world. I have followed instruction correctly. Checked firewall. enable and disable DMZ no luck. but overall cam is fine. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Best Tenvis ip cam for home security
Reviews.Author: Cesar Nicolas
Reviews.Content: Best security ip cam! For home security. You can control in the internet. Easy to set-up. Good price. And no hazzle

Reviews.Title: Sucks. Stopped working after 4 months and no warranty support. Stick with Foscam
Reviews.Author: JD "Consumer Extraordinaire"
Reviews.Content: This totally stopped working after 4 months. I spent hours trying to reboot / unfreeze it... which is a PAIN. Technical support was unhelpful and responded in very broken English. The also refused to fix or replace it.I replaced it with a Foscam - which has worked well

Reviews.Title: excellent product woudl recommend to everyone
Reviews.Author: jrabiea
Reviews.Content: love this product, it is excellent, used in our warehouse and performes perfectly.awesome product. very light and easy to install

Reviews.Title: JPT3815W Great Product
Reviews.Author: Brad Stortzum
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great product for the money. Easy to setup and install the software on the PC. I really like the ability to control the pan and tilt from my iPhone. Great product. I will be purchasing more of these cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great little cam for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Stevenson
Reviews.Content: I've owned this wireless IP camera for about 5 months, and overall, I'm very happy with it - particularly for the price paid.  Set up was straight forward and range/performance is good.  I got if for security, but there have been some helpful side uses, like making sure the pet sitters showed up while I was out of town.  :)

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: John V.
Reviews.Content: speed cameras work just as good as the more expensive ones the only reason why did he give it 5 stars was because you can't use it outdoors its not waterproof but the camera is very responsiveaudio and mic or okay

Reviews.Title: RARELY WORKS
Reviews.Author: Uncle Elroy
Reviews.Content: Goes out all the time! I've owned it for about 6 months and I have not yet gotten a full weeks use out of it! Do yourself a favor and go to your local store and buy a camera so it's easy to return when you realize it's not going to work. A Masters Degree in Computer Sciences is helpful when preforming setup.

Reviews.Title: Great if Working
Reviews.Author: J. Rachatanavin
Reviews.Content: IF you are lucky enough to receive a unit that actually works, they are actually amazing.  However, of the 3 units we ordered, only ONE worked out of the box.  This IP camera has a startup cycle when it powers on.  The camera will begin moving automatically.  After it finishes its cycle, it's good to go.  Setup is easy. Just follow the instructions on the included CD, and everything is a piece of cake.  The image quality is awesome.  We use the camera as a baby monitor.  The night vision image is phenomenal.  Most baby monitors that boast the same have very limited visibility in near dark rooms.  This camera has a clear view in the entire display, no dark, blurry edges.  So bottom line:PROS:-awesome image quality - night vision is excellent-accessible from virtually any smart device (manufacturer has apps in appstore and google play)-can have secured access when setting up each camera-easy controlsCONS:-2-way audio quality not so good-motion detection alert is through EMAIL, not realtime beeping on your device (so if you're lookin to use this as a security system when you're gone, you may not get notified until it's too late)BIGGEST CON:-some units arrive defective!! as stated above, 2/3 units we received were DOA.  They did not go through the startup cycle, nor did the manufacturer suggestion of holding the reset button down for one minute (yes one FULL minute) work.  I am a pretty tech savvy person, and nothing got those 2 defective units to work.If we had only ordered the one unit, which worked, this would probably be a 5-star review.  But as it is, 2 came dead.  We've returned those, and ordered replacements.  Hopefully those will work.

Reviews.Title: always reloading
Reviews.Author: Michelle Martel "mainiax"
Reviews.Content: picture is clear but my problem is every time I turn it on my Iphone to watch it it has to reload and spins around the entire room before resetting. I like both my foscam and my Easy N much better then the Tenvis. I also cant change the settings unless on the network where on the other cameras I can.

Reviews.Title: Works OK, has some issues.
Reviews.Author: T. Dennis
Reviews.Content: I've had my camera about 2 months now and it's still working fine.  I've read a lot of review that say these have a habit of dying after 3-6 mos so if I have that issue I'll update my review.First, the camera was a bit of work to setup.  The directions aren't crystal clear but if you're at least somewhat tech savvy you should be able to figure it out.  I had it working on my internal network in about 30 minutes, however it took me a while to get it going via external connections.  The issue with mine is that my internet provider has a modem/gateway combo, I had to open the ports on the gateway before I could open them on my WiFi router.  It sounds like my situation was unique because everywhere I went for troubleshooting told me I shouldn't have to do that.I've got the camera mounted inside a chest freezer that I use for homebrewing beer, I use it to monitor temperature and fermentation.  The temp in there ranges from 38°F to 90°F (well within the operating range of 14°F to 122°F) and so far I don't see where that has been an issue.  There is no light in the freezer so it is using the IR night vision mode.Unfortunately viewing the live stream can be a bit buggy.  Frequently the camera is non-responsive to pan/tilt commands, or it will "jump" after issuing a few commands.  The camera will jump in and out of the proper aspect ration and sometimes gives a stretched view things.  When it is working properly the view is clear and sharp, even in night vision mode.You can access the camera from any browser however you have access to more features when using IE.  There are also iPhone and Android apps available which is kind of nice.Overall I think the camera is "decent", I'll see how long it lives and if the problems get any worse.  For the price it's doing OK but  I would likely by a different camera if I purchased another.

Reviews.Title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS GREAT
Reviews.Author: carl allen
Reviews.Content: Its a wonderful camera I would have rated it 5 stars but the instructions suck . I recommend it highly it would be great at twice the price.I install this kind of seciurity equip in my line of work and we charge 6 times as much. Go ahead and buy 1 then go on youtube for setup instructions youll probably order a second one in a week

Reviews.Title: Internet Explorer required to run these.
Reviews.Author: skypocket
Reviews.Content: Internet Explorer required to run these. Are you stuck in the 90's? Epic Fail, I should have gone to Staples.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the Price
Reviews.Author: Julie Carleton
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a good camera for the money it costs compared to the other cameras I've seen that have all the same capabilities

Reviews.Title: PC only
Reviews.Author: Dr. Rex Thornhill "Dr. Rex"
Reviews.Content: The camera syncs up with IOS (Mac) but the software for motion detecting will not record with this system.  I spoke with support and they inform me that recording of video feed is only functional with a PC.  I don't have a PC.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis doesn't make the grade
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I'd read some other reviews that these cameras freeze if they are viewing an area that is highly detailed (such as looking through a window screen) or if they point at a window there can be a very apparent glare that render the cameras useless. Well, these cameras freeze on a regular basis (regardless of the scene that is being viewed). I would never recommend anyone to purchase these. I will admit that the quality of the video rendered is not bad; but because of the great possibility of camera freeze this negates other features, such as email and/or FTP alerts. If the camera has frozen it can no longer detect motion and thus can't alert the user. In addition, while it's very easy to configure these cameras to provide video within your own Wi-Fi network, set up of the DDNS (in order to view the camera from 'any' location through the Internet) is quite the hassle. I had to email Tenvis to determine how this is to be done (I still have not completed the task due to time constraints). The instruction manual provide does little to help set up Internet access for the camera, and the Email/FTP alert function for motion is also quite confusing. I don't know if there are other more hassle free IP cameras on the market but if there are, I would have to direct buyers to try them instead.

Reviews.Title: It was a struggle
Reviews.Author: schmecher
Reviews.Content: I struggled with this for a whole day trying to set up the wireless. Port forwarding didn't help. The software is worthless for wireless as well. Having to mess around with IP addresses and port forwarding is not for the novice user.

Reviews.Title: I'm loving it
Reviews.Author: amber
Reviews.Content: It was very simple to set up and makes me feel safer for me and my family even when we're away from home

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up and use. Works just like it says it will.
Reviews.Author: Courtney Tidwell
Reviews.Content: For the price, this one is a very decent camera with ability to view on browsers or mobile apps. Great features like alarm, night vision and wifi. There are better quality camera's, but you will have to pay quite a bit more. This one does exactly what I needed it to.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael Olson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for studying the behavior of developing tadpoles in zero light conditions for undergraduate research. It took a while to set up, but has worked very well since the initial set up. The infrared works very well and being able to shut off the green LED prevented any light from altering the behavior of the tadpoles. The resolution is great, even in zero light conditions. I would certainly recommend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA
Reviews.Author: nald19
Reviews.Content: this product is perfect for securing your home. its easy to install just follow the owners manual. if your pc cant detect your camera after installation, try to reset it by pressing the reset button for more than 3-5 seconds then release it. the reset button is under the base of the product.i give it a 5 star for quality of the product and for the price.what i like about it is that you can see live video on the internet and you can control it.i dont have cons on this product.i highly recommend this product on every household.

Reviews.Title: works as expected
Reviews.Author: J. Borisch
Reviews.Content: for the price it gives a good picture. works well wirelessly.  we use it to monitor our basement as we have had water leaks before.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Seth
Reviews.Content: Awesome IP Camera. I was able to hook this up to my wireless network after a few hours of troubleshooting. It was well worth it, I love this camera. Nice picture quality and the mic is a fun tool to play tricks on the animals while away!

Reviews.Title: IP camera set up
Reviews.Author: Stefan Cervik
Reviews.Content: I would like to rate this product higher but the set up was at most tedious and frustrating.  The instructions for a person who has no technical knowledge of setting up IP cameras very cumbersome.I managed after 2 1/2 days of messing with it to finally get it set up most of the way but still can't pick it up on my phone in 3G..  If I can get the 3G issue resolved I would rate this product higher...

Reviews.Title: Worth the $
Reviews.Author: Missy
Reviews.Content: Package arrived as scheduled.  Satisfied with the overall performance of the camera.  Set pretty easy too.  No complaints thus far.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic For Spying on my Kids
Reviews.Author: Paxwell
Reviews.Content: We ordered this camera to put in my kids' shared room. We have really enjoyed being able to check up on them throughout the night. The night vision is fantastic. But by far our favorite thing about this camera is the fact that you can view the feed on your phone using the Tenvis app. You can also control the movement of the camera remotely from the app which is really cool.  We are planning on ordering a couple more cameras because you can view them all in the app simultaneously.

Reviews.Title: Very useful
Reviews.Author: Darby J Gardner
Reviews.Content: I got this camera mainly to keep an eye on the puppy and make sure he stays out of trouble when we're away from the house. It's also a handy tool to check in on the kids or even the house when we're gone. Setup was really fairly easy using the included quick start guide. You do have set it up on a wired connection first, but that's no problem.About the only issue I have is the video output. It has a green and purple tint to it, but I'm not to concerned about that. It gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: YB
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm.. We have 6 and they are working flawlessly. Will definitely recommend for home security. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Good value, great camera, easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Fer
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this camera to serve as a sort of baby cam so that I can check on my newborn daughter while at work.  I have to say that this camera was  very easy to set up by following the instructions.  In about 5 minutes after plugging the camera in, I was able to use it over my home network and over the internet with no problems.  I did have to forward a port to access the camera from outside my home network but this is simple to do by logging into my router.  I have tried doing similar setups with other IP cameras and even with usb cameras using Yawcam but this camera with the android app has been by far the easiest solution.  The quality is actually better than I expected and there is very little lag or blurriness even over the internet.  The night vision is also good.  I plan to purchase more of these and place them around the house to finally have a nice and easy to use surveillance system.The one negative thing I would comment on is that like other reviews mention, the company actually bribes you to leave 5 star reviews in exchange for a $15 rebate.  This is why I am deliberately leaving four stars because I think this is a somewhat shady move by Tenvis.  Ironically, had they not tried to bribe me I would have probably left a 5 star review.  Anyways, I still recommend this camera highly.

Reviews.Title: dont get the product
Reviews.Author: david b
Reviews.Content: would.not recomend thos product does not work at all  and the tech support just sucked the guy was no help at all he said that he doesnt know what tobto so for me to call anotger tech support or just return the product so i just returned it screw them if i cant get support then i dont want the product

Reviews.Title: I bought two of them
Reviews.Author: Duckjin Kang
Reviews.Content: This works just fine flawlessly. I like the fact that this rotate almost 360 degrees.I would be better if it has higher resolution but still worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: AN AWESOME CAMERA 02/24/2014
Reviews.Author: FoxyLinda
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera, It was so easy to install and use I was amaze of the quality of the camera. It was easy to set up and I was able to set it up with my samsung galaxy s3 . It was a no brainer so you don't have to be tech knowledgeable, to understand how to set it up just follow the easy instruction and you'll be up and running in no time.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: RMMJ
Reviews.Content: We bought this cam to observe a hummingbird nesting her eggs in our front yard. What an awesome camera for that! It took all of 10 minutes to set up on our wireless network and we are using an iPhone app to control it remotely. Could not be happier with this product and are going to purchase more.

Reviews.Title: Everything works easily
Reviews.Author: Vinicius Boen
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, with some good features like: nightly vision, controlling it through phone, alert messages.I do recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: eera2525
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It works just as described and the instructions are easy to follow. I can watch it from my phone anywhere or from any computer with an internet connection. My best part is that you can set up the motion detection and will receive an email when motion is detected. it's pretty awesome, and the resolution is great.If using IE to watch it you can actually talk through the camera and hear audio from the camera. The best part is that you can move it which is a plus.

Reviews.Title: works great day and night
Reviews.Author: Larry Rice
Reviews.Content: I found this camera easy to set up. And works great with my iPad, iPhone,and laptop computers and my Kindle HD. Yes, I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: A great product at a superb price
Reviews.Author: Jacquelinr Cade
Reviews.Content: I am glad I choose this product.  The installation was easy and the clarity is great.  For the price, I am extremely happy.  This product  exceeds my expectation. I am pleased and glad it was my chosen one.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Edo
Reviews.Content: reasonably priced.. works well.. easy to setup..works great with tenvis sight app.. using it on my android and ipad via cam's ddns..

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Scot Montgomery
Reviews.Content: Cheap, easy to use and functional.  Setup in minutes, auto send pics to email with motion sensor alarm.  Great backyard critter-cam.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It does the job I bought it for and was not to hard to set up for use,that's it now

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Dobb "Sandy Beaches"
Reviews.Content: I have had other cameras in this price range like Foscam fail after a short period of time.  This is my second Tenvis because I like the first one so much.

Reviews.Title: Provides good surveilance at a low price
Reviews.Author: Ernest Blaisdell
