Reviews.Content: The price is low, resolution is high, and the installation goes smoothly provided you begin by a wire connection to the router. Then you can easily set it up with a wireless connection.

Reviews.Title: Extremely hard to set up.
Reviews.Author: RobPlease
Reviews.Content: This camera was a nightmare. I originally bought it to have a camera to monitor my dogs while I'm away. When I first plugged in the camera it crashed my whole home network.Once I finally got it back up I plugged it into my Windows-only computer with a disc drive to set it up. You can NOT set this camera up with a Mac, wirelessly, or without a CD drive no matter what you've been told otherwise!The setup did not work or find the camera.My network went down again.I was never able to setup the camera and I like to think of myself as having a relatively advanced knowledge of computer setup technology.I suggest if I was to do this again I would spring for a more expensive model that ACTUALLY WORKS.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Does Not Work
Reviews.Author: Doug LeGrand
Reviews.Content: This "wireless" network camera only works as long as the LAN cable is plugged in. Fortunately Amazon quickly and cheerfully refunded the cost, as a replacement was not an option in this case.

Reviews.Title: Recommended.  TENVIS JPT3815W Wireless IP Pan/Tilt/ Night Vision Internet Surveillance...
Reviews.Author: Rogerdh
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  Works very well.  Works so well in fact, I ordered a second one.  I use one to view inside my home and another to view outside through a window.  However, infra red lights reflect on the glass so I covered them with black electrical tape because I have outside motion lights.  Plus, the camera warns you when it detects motion as well.  Super.I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Wireless camera that freezes up
Reviews.Author: Steve "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Don't bother with this camera.  For security it locks up in a matter of minutes which means if freezes on the same image without working. Nice still camera.  Sometimes freezes up and refuses to refresh, so you have to unplug it to reset. A nice piece of junk for the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up with Windows 7 64bit
Reviews.Author: Ldill76
Reviews.Content: I would have seriously given this a 5 star based on cost and ease of use, but the company chose to try to manipulate ratings by offering a rebate based on linking a 5 star review here. Step one : Plug in both power and internet. Step two: Go to the website (or insert disc which I didn't do) Step three: Download the utilities Step four: Follow the online help tool Step five: Download your app (I went with the 2.99 one in the istore) At that point I was wifi, able to observe our pets and interact with them through audio from LTE and 4G connections (Less latency when connected to the same network)  For the price it was a great buy, it tied in with my other DVR based systems with the added bonus of being movable with ease. I will recommend as well as purchase more of these as needed. I really should ding more for the attempt at review fixing since the item stands on its own, I do not like that method.  Instead of doing that, get rid of some of the negative reviews by stating clearly in the description "Must have the ability to follow directions"

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what it claims to
Reviews.Author: laura schwab
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with the quality of this product and feel that the functionality is great for the price. Product works and is priced well.

Reviews.Title: TENVIS JPT3815W CAMERA
Reviews.Author: John L. Vassallo Jr. "Gunner V"
Reviews.Content: Great looking camera.  Excellent design and capabilities.  Very versatile in its operation.  For an indoor wireless security camera, it's easy setup & install... done in minutes.  I will buy more from this manufacturer, and of this model.

Reviews.Title: Product included a note that if I left a 5 star review, they'd pay me money
Reviews.Author: Zachary Patterson "foozer432"
Reviews.Content: EDIT: Don't believe any 5 star reviews about this product -- the company pays for them ( I tried to get the cash, but never received it.)This camera was super easy to install.  I wanted a solution that did not require a cloud subscription such as with a security company, so I could make sure to have full control over my network.  This camera easily interfaced with my home WIFI, which then allowed me to remotely access the camera via my phone or laptop while out of the house.  Great solution.  Recommend this, along with thehttp://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000IDCDZY/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_1for extra mounting flexibility.

Reviews.Title: Great for streaming to your phone
Reviews.Author: Some Reviewer
Reviews.Content: Works great when streaming to your phone. Have one indoor and one outdoor. Both are wifi with no lag. Able to control pan and tilt remotely via web browser.

Reviews.Title: Nice !
Reviews.Author: Tracy Rose
Reviews.Content: This met my expectations.  We are just using it to monitor some feral cats we are helping out.  It works amazing.  Admittedly one has to get it to see your network and then get the network to see it.  But after all the local security things all is good.  The night vision is spectacular.  The rotation ability is amazing.  The software control and monitoring especially for the iPads and iPhone is a wonder and really helpful.The camera every couple of minutes has a socket error that blanks the screen for a short bit and I can not overcome this yet.  They did not seem to address this on the web help.  I have not yet set up the internet portion for viewing away from home.  That might be a bit tricky given the port openings and potential router threats.  I mounted a couple of these inside the small cat structures I built for the wild kittens.  I went to mount one inside my window but forgot it projects an Infrared light all night.  That means there is nothing to be seen at night but glare from its own light off the window.  I wish the IR light could be turned off remotely.They are sharp and I'm going to work on getting some all weather ones to join them now that they have me in the grove of easy surveillance.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: vpel
Reviews.Content: Someone said that they wish they can turn off the flashing green light. I'm not sure if you figure it out but in your settings menu go to misc of advanced and it gives you the option to turn it off or on or blink. Just some fyi. It works great I haven't figured out how to be able to watch it from other than my home. I can view onmy app and ccomputer. I have 2 of these and I really like them alot.(Update) I have it working now where I can view away from home. I love this camera. For the price you can't go wrong and customer support is awsome. I email them and within 10 or 15 min they respond and even access my computer to help me with set up. I plan to buy quite a few more of these.

Reviews.Title: cheaper alternative to foscam
Reviews.Author: Mr. San Do "Sanny Do"
Reviews.Content: cheaper alternative to foscam.  seems to be just as good too! i like it!  easy set up, if you are familiar with setting up ip cameras.  just use the ip camera tool!

Reviews.Title: Great for watching the kids or the house from afar
Reviews.Author: J. M. Lussi
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. Purchased to monitor the kids upstairs or keep and eye on the pets and the house while away. Works great.

Reviews.Title: Nice cam for the price
Reviews.Author: M Ewing
Reviews.Content: Easy install and working flawlessly - so far so good.I'll add a few more in the near future as needed

Reviews.Title: Very good picture quality
Reviews.Author: Paul Pender
Reviews.Content: I just installed the JPT3815W, which was very easy to do.  I installed the camera to keep an eye on the two puppies we have running around the house.  Had a little trouble setting up the 4G on my IPhone, but once connected, it works great.  Now I can watch to puppies tear up the house and know which one the trouble maker is.  May decide on a second one in the future.

Reviews.Title: This eye watches in the shadow of the night
Reviews.Author: J. Miller
Reviews.Content: For a cheap little security camera, this does what I want it to. I was able to set it up within minutes. I could set it up to save images on my remote server upon motion detection, although there are a few false readings I get as the sun casts shadows through the window. The ability to control it remotely and with an app on my phone is a plus. It also comes with a mounting stand to attach it to the walls or ceiling. The Infrared function works seemlessly as the lights come on and off.For the price, I wouldn't expect high resolution. Indeed, to get a good face shot you have to set it up in a location to get a good headshot close up if that is what you are after.

Reviews.Title: 5 Star product
Reviews.Author: Subham Malakar
Reviews.Content: Great product! Great design! Great service! Great customer satisfaction. Looking forward to get the excellent vigilance. So happy that I bought it!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera to Keep an Eye on Things
Reviews.Author: Jason Swartz
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything does everything I expected it to. My network knowledge is limited so set up took a little longer for me. Once fully set up it works great and is accessible from all my devices. I can keep an eye on the dog during the day and rotate it to see the bird in the feeder outside. Great camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Straightforward configuration, great speed, perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Mark R.
Reviews.Content: I was nervous based on some of the negative reviews of this camera - I shouldn't have been.  Configuring it was quite simple on my home network - I would echo other comments of doing a wired connection for the initial setup.  I only installed the Tenvis network discovery software; I didn't use their other programs.  Once I assigned it a static IP address and entered my wifi network password, I unhooked the wired connection and have been running it wirelessly since then. The picture is sharp and nearly real-time via home wifi; perfect for our baby-monitor needs.  I haven't used the Tenvis software on Android; I'm using IP Camera Lite from the android marketplace.  It works well, controls the camera smoothly, etc.  We'll be using this as a baby monitor - I'm happy I took the chance on this camera...only problem is now I'll probably want to buy a couple more.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the competitive price
Reviews.Author: JS Stars
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup for both wired and wireless (802.11g) operation. Good picture quality and nice alarm system. Works well on my iPhone 5s using the app, Tenvis Sight.

Reviews.Title: Very Buggy, Poor Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Pen Name No. 9
Reviews.Content: I am beginning setup right now and the first thing I noticed is incredibly difficult instructions and thus setup. It is unclear from the Quick Start booklet written in TINY fonts whether WiFi *only* should be used to set it up or the extremely short Ethernet RJ45 cable should initially be used. It is also unclear whether one could set it up via browser or the software on CD must be installed. There were no hints whatsoever regarding how to connect to it through a browser, so I ended up installing the Search Tool.And this is where problems begun: Somewhere during search installation progress, it stopped with an error message complaining about being unable to find a soap.dll file.  How on earth is a lay person supposed to know what that soap.dll is and where to find it???  I clicked the [Ignore] and then proceeded. The setup miraculously completed and nothing crashed upon launching. It appears that the only way for it to find anything is if the cat5/RJ45 cable is connected between the PC and the camera (despite both being WiFi enabled), since the search tool application found something at  192.168.1.239:7777. If you attempt WiFi only,  the wizard will not show any progress indication whatsoever, as if the thing is hung, and will simply remain blank forever.I will update this review (and remove additional stars, based on findings) as I make progress in the installation...OK, so after being puzzled for a while about what to enter in that 'Configure camera's network settings' I GUESSED that the 'Obtain IP address automatically via DHCP' should be UNCHECKED. The 'PC network connection information' cannot be edited for some reason, and the only section that's editable is 'Camera Network Information'. I just put there some value that I know belongs to my LAN's subnet. This seemed to have been successful and another line was added to the list of IP cameras (in addition to the original one which seems to be unusable in my LAN).That miraculously launched IE on the IP address I entered and prompted for downloading, installing and running an IE ActiveX plugin from the manufacturer (somewhere in China). I downloaded the plugin, installed it and ran it and, lo and behold, I see my room in the browser. So... this thing seems to be working. The only question now is: How useful is it? That's because it works as long I am connected with an Ethernet/cat5/Rj45 cable DIRECTLY to the camera. What I would like to do is enable both PC and camera to be totally on WiFi, connected through my wireless router.Notes: The above succeeded only when:1. Installing the Search Tool as Administrator (on my Windows XP SP3 PC).2. Connecting from my PC with an Ethernet/cat5/Rj45 cable DIRECTLY to the camera.After the initial success, then trying to connect through WiFi, the camera disappeared on me for some reason. I had to disconnect the Ethernet cable, turn off power, count to 3, turn on power, then reconnect the Ethernet cable.Then after going past IE default admin/admin login + enabling the ActiveX plugin, being presented again with the Web application, there is a 'Settings' icon that seems to allow WiFi configuration for the camera. Let's see whether this gives me what I want (and how difficult it is)...Well, I am not sure whether it is possible to connect to the camera via WiFi, but I could certainly:1. Connect to the camera INDIRECTLY via wired LAN, from anywhere on the subnet.2. Make the camera connect to my WiFi router, thereby allowing it to send email upon motion alarm (most useful for me right now).Not bad for the price. Let's see how reliable this is. Will follow up if anything break or changes.A few more notes:1. The emailed photos are blurry and unclear. Is it possible to (re)focus the lens? If so, how?2. Is it possible to increase resolution of the emailed photos beyond 640x480?One day later: Removing one star (down to 3) due to the inability to use the camera with any password other the default 'admin'. Changing password is successful and logging in to IE's "Live Video" is successful using the new password but... the picture is completely BLACK! (restoring the password to the default 'admin' remedies the situation).Two days later: Removing one star (down to 2) due to having to REBOOT the camera for an email alarm to register. Also, reboot IGNORES the preset settings. Also, even without a reboot, the presets are inaccurate and erratic. Also, the camera alarm seems to have lost sensitivity (now responds to light changes only, not to motion, which seems to have worked the first day). Very buggy and disappointing.One more comment, awarding this product the lowest possible score: The user guide that comes with it makes you believe (page 3) that you can configure it (via the TENVIS Search Tool) through WiFi. The tech support forum is totally useless regarding this issue.

Reviews.Title: Okay product
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I gave this item only 3 stars as I got the product to work with a wired connection, but the wireless connection is choppy and then just freezes. I've looked at the wireless specs on the router and everything seems fine. It also only works with Internet Explorer, so if you have Chrome, forget it. I'll mess with it some more, but I have a feeling I'll return it.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey O.
Reviews.Content: Got these hooked to my Wifi network in 5 minutes.  Work great.  Very clear video and IR works great in total darkness

Reviews.Title: excellent product and service
Reviews.Author: Luis Valdes
Reviews.Content: excellent product and service, I highly recommend it, if you do this at your fingertips purchasing.I highly recommend it, if you do this at your fingertips purchasing. Regards

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: William Sarris
Reviews.Content: Works fine, just what i was looking for simple camera to look aroung the house when we are away. Good resolution, easy instructions, affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Gary Langford Jr
Reviews.Content: Does everything I wanted it to. Great picture at night. Easy to setup. Never loses connection. Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love this product
Reviews.Author: Anna Bodiford
Reviews.Content: This product was super easy to set up even for non tech savvy people like us!  We purchased it to use as a baby monitor as it's much more economical than a baby monitor. It also has the talk back option that most baby monitors don't have. We love this product and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a camera to use. It was also super easy to link to our I phones. One of my favorite features is that I can see my son at home while I work.

Reviews.Title: Much better then expected!
Reviews.Author: Greg B
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied with my purchase and may buy more for my home.  I have no complaints excellent product!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Mark S
Reviews.Content: works great,very useful for monitoring summer houses when you are away,good for price.I like the infra red so you see in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Prepare for Headaches
Reviews.Author: T. Green "Mindbender"
Reviews.Content: Setting up this camera is like doing your taxes. Make sure you have the whole day available because it will take you that long.  I initially bought a Dropcam which spoiled me into thinking that all IP cameras were that simple to setup. WRONG. Most likely you will have to port forward your DNS which in itself can cause you to curse. With my Dropcam camera it did it automatically. With Tenvis you have to jump thru a bunch of hoops to get there and even then its not a guarantee. This should be easier. If I have to go to tech support every time I set up a tech gadget, then forget it. My time is too valuable to be wasted on the hopes that this thing will work . Mailing it back today.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product, arrived in 2 days.
Reviews.Author: Ronald Stearns
Reviews.Content: This web cam worked right out of the box, no additional mounting hardware needed. Good night vision. Easy to set-up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera to watch my baby in the night
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were wondering if the baby slept the full night or if she wakes up in the night. We tried with skype at first but during the night we were clueless.  The night vision mode of this camera let us do it and we are very happy. The software from the CD was easy to install and the configuration was clearly described in the quick start guide. It was not a problem for us to make it worked. Besides, the camera is fast and we can see our daughter in almost real time (the delay is less than 1 second) from our computer and from our ipad and from both devices at the same time. Moreover, if she moves, we are able to follow her since the camera can be moved by using the software in the computer.  By the way, when it moves, there is almost no noise.We also liked features like capture pictures and videos using this camera, and the two way microphone is good. There is also a feature we will try soon and it is the alert options that enable us to use it as a surveillance camera. Excellent feature when going on vacations!My wife and I would recommend this camera to anyone who maybe looking for a baby monitor or for a surveillance camera.Excellent price, excellent product.

Reviews.Title: One of the best IPCams for the money
Reviews.Author: Rigoberto Cintron
Reviews.Content: The IPCam is easy to setup and it works very good. There many Android apps that support the IPCam and worked very well.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: JW Madden III
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera because I needed something I could not only move around remotely, but physically as well the mounting system is conducive to many types of mounts. The price was right. The unit performs perfectly from computer(s) and IPhone. We also tried it from Chile and they were impressed and I will be ordering additional units for myself & others.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Mike C.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with these cameras.  They are easy to program the IP address.  I have had more expensive cameras that did not work as well.  Again I am pleased with them.Mike C

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: Susanne Webb
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this camera to anybody who is looking for an IP camera.The price is great and it comes with microphone and night vision.I also love that you can control it and watch it from your mobile deviceI am very satisfied. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: easy to set up, works as described, well worth the money
Reviews.Author: El Santo
Reviews.Content: got it set up in about 20 minutes, works well with my wifi. Motion detection works fine. Nothing fancy, but exactly what you expect for that price. The only negative thing I can say is, that I had to google how to set up the email settings. So I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup camera
Reviews.Author: Sherrie J Duckwitz
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup.  Great graphics. Excellent product.  I would recommend this item for any one that needs a baby monitor or security camera.

Reviews.Title: Does not work with WEP
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Couldn't get it to work on WEP. Not sure why. However, shouldn't be using WEP anyway. It works fine with WPA

Reviews.Title: Finally! A Modern IP Camera!
Reviews.Author: JayMan
Reviews.Content: This was my 3rd try with the IP camera vendors and I vowed to quit if this didn't work. Well, TENVIS has restored my faith in 21st Century technology. It "plugged and played" just as any IP device should and their software is 5 star in nature and the camera works great. You're crazy to buy any other.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the money
Reviews.Author: roaoro
Reviews.Content: I've found that none of the IP cameras out there work perfectly, or are easy to setup.  This one works good as long as you set it up right.  Good picture quality.  I had issues with getting the wifi working at first, but the seller was quick to send me a firmware upgrade that fixed the problem, Thanks.

Reviews.Title: IP Pan/Tilt/ Night Vision Internet Surveillance...
Reviews.Author: Odie Russell
Reviews.Content: I have 2 IP602W that work very good so I bought the 3815W for the pan/tilt and it works good and well built, the night vision is not as good as the 602W, it has a clear picture.  I will be buying 2 more later and would recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: Good IP Camera/ 01/25/2014
Reviews.Author: SUKANTA BHOWMIK
Reviews.Content: The product is good in compare to price with other IP Surveillance product in the market.Only having prob. with Wi-Fi signal with out LAN connection

Reviews.Title: I think it's alot of camera for very little cost.
Reviews.Author: Jackie M.
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to set up. My son helped me.  It was the first time he had ever set up a camera and it certainly looked easy.  Set up took less than an hour. The picture is very good .  Even at night  I'm so glad I got this little camera.  It does a lot more than I expected and the price was so good.  I can either take a snap shot or video and I can control it away from home with my cell phone.  I haven't tried the audio yet,  But it even as audio capabilities .  The next one I get will be white because it will blend in with the white walls in the room I plan to put another one in.  You can add up to 8 cameras.

Reviews.Title: Very easy setup, works well
Reviews.Author: Yu-jin Chia "Yu-Jin Chia"
Reviews.Content: Got one of these to use as a baby monitor. Quite frankly, products marketed specifically as video baby monitors are a complete ripoff- especially if you already have a smartphone or laptop. Look around and you'll see that they average about $100 and some are a lot more. There is no reason you should have to pay that much.That said, you can also spend that much on a webcam like this, and once again- no reason you should have to. The technology is definitely mature enough that they're inexpensive to produce. This Tenvis camera as of this writing is $45 and it does everything I could ask for. If I were to buy a baby monitor with the same features, it would cost me $150.The camera includes items to mount it, an adjustable antenna, instructions, and a CD with the search utility on it. The utility is actually not strictly necessary, it just makes the setup a bit more straightforward. All the utility does is direct your browser to the camera's IP (on a sticker on the bottom, in case you forget) and you're at the viewing/setup utility. From there it just sort of works- there's really nothing else you have to do. A few notes on setup:1. Change the password. You don't want random people in the neighborhood able to access it.2. There's two ways to connect: wirelessly and via a ethernet cable to a router. Wireless setup is via the setup page and is the same as setting up any other device on a wireless network. Wired setup is even easier- you literally just plug it in. Cable isn't included though, and this tethers the camera to a router.3. There is a mic port if you want to attach a external pickup.4. Although all major browsers can stream the camera view, only IE can do audio. Keep this in mind if you plan to primarily use a computer and only own Macs :-)5. If you plan to use a phone or tablet, Tenvis just points you to a third party IP Camera app. It's a pretty good one, but to use two way audio features and record modes, you have to buy it for $3. Would have been nice if they mentioned that or gave you free credit to do it.6. You can set this for remote access (outside your home network) and use some advanced features like motion detection recording. These are a bit harder to set up and the instructions aren't great. I haven't bothered yet; will update if I get around to it.Generally speaking, the camera itself works very well. Night vision mode produces a very clear picture, it can pan and tilt in a wide area and is both quiet and quick. The audio pickup built in is decent; output is a bit garbled usually but that's rather to be expected. Range appears to be decent. The onboard utility supports multiple cameras.This isn't the most advanced or high resolution IP camera out there, but it's also one of the cheapest. For the price, you get a lot of functionality. The unit itself is unobtrusive and easy to setup, and you can link as many devices as you want to it. I haven't had a single problem with it so far and it serves my needs well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I held off on buying a security camera because I figured the set up was too difficult.  I bought this camera on the recommendation of a colleague and I couldn't be happier.  The set up was simple and the set up manual was easy to follow.  My wife and I enjoy watching our dogs when we are out.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Product and shipping was super fast!!
Reviews.Author: quang m
Reviews.Content: Great product. I received the TENVISJPT3815W in a few days after ordering it. very satisfied with shipping. installation was very easy to set up. It only took me a few minutes 3 to 5 minutes. very please with how easy it was to set up. Thank you. a satisfied customer!!

Reviews.Title: Great IP Camera!
Reviews.Author: SumGuy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to spy on my dog while I'm away. He's a notorious counter-surfer. The minute I leave the house, he would start looking on the kitchen counter for any food that I might have left out. I hooked up this camera to my home wi-fi, and downloaded an app that allows me to monitor the camera on my smartphone. The camera also has 2-way audio. So now, whenever I leave the house, I open up the app on my phone, and if my dog is getting into something he shouldn't, he hears me yell: "Bad dog!" It's completely cured him of this habit. And yes, it makes a great security camera too. You can pan/tilt it remotely, and it has a great video quality. Very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Heather Ramirez "Heatheraqui"
Reviews.Content: I have not go tthis working yet but I am excited to start viewing my home remotely via wifi.  Great!

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up and use, using as baby monitor
Reviews.Author: dad
Reviews.Content: I have been using this product in my child's room as a monitor. It was easily mounted on the wall and the application on the iPad makes it easy to check quickly on him. It was an easy setup also. And the ability to move the field of vision from the iPad is awesome also. I would buy this product again.You have a great clear picture in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Very easy setup!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Joe
Reviews.Content: This product was very easy to setup when using the supplied instructions. It has a great feature that allows you to setup remote access without the need to create a third party dynamic dns name or do any port forwarding on your router.Setting up your camera for remote access is very easy to do with the supplied instructions. The recommended Iphone app works great as well.I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great functionality
Reviews.Author: Michael Lorman
Reviews.Content: Purchase four of these and they work great. Pan, Tilt and Night Vision. Will probably purchase more when I expand the system.

Reviews.Title: Cheapest baby monitor ever!
Reviews.Author: Erin M Linaberry
Reviews.Content: I have bought a total of 4 of these cameras so far.  That is still cheaper than buying one baby monitor with the same or less capabilities!  I love that I can use my phone and spy on my dogs when I'm not at home (or the babysitter!).  Sound is decent enough, can't expect too much from a built-in microphone and speaker.  Night vision is wonderful.  TENVIS customer support is the best!  I had an issue with one of the first camera's I bought, they paid for shipping the faulty camera to them and sent me a new one!  For security use, the motion detection and email alerts are extremely useful.  Once my baby is all grown up I'll probably just use them for security, they will always be functional for something :)

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: jvd
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is great.  Does what it is supposed to do.  Pans, tilts, etc.  No problem with wireless or wired connection.  Image is satisfactory.Software that comes with it is pretty basic.  No audio unless you have internet explorer (activex).  It's functional, though.There's also an ipad app that works pretty good (not free though).

Reviews.Title: Very Cool
Reviews.Author: kimberly walker
Reviews.Content: I thought this was going to be hard to set up but it was very easy.  Better than a baby monitor because you can move the camera around from the app on your cell phone. For the money it was a great deal I am going to be buying a few more to set up an entire network in my house.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great value
Reviews.Author: Gary Ng
Reviews.Content: I felt the unit was priced very competitively and took a chance on it.  So far, I'd say I got my money's worth.  I'm not tech savvy, but was able to get the unit up and running.  The only obstacle I ran into was getting setting the port forwarding on my router.  The user guide had great photos, and although it was pretty useful, I still got a little confused.  I ended up sending an email to support, and they were very responsive and helpful.  I actually purchased the unit to monitor my home while we were having our floors refinished.  We had to vacate the premises, but the camera gave me some assurance that I could view the workmen at any time, as well as check on the unit in the evenings.  The picture was pretty good, some of the shots were of my doors that were about 30 feet from the camera, and I was pleased.  I easily downloaded the Tenvis apps onto my smartphone and tablet, and all the functions and features were easy to use and worked flawlessly.  Very pleased with my purchase.  Good Luck to you...

Reviews.Title: difficult at first, but Tenvis customer service helped
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "freecycleml"
Reviews.Content: I've never used another kind of camera, but this one is great.  Got it hooked up to my wifi and sends my email pictures when it senses motion, even at night.  Images are clear.The only problem is that the instructions provided are TERRIBLE.  Even worse than IKEA's furniture instructions.  However, the Tenvis people are super responsive and even remotely accessed my computer to fix whatever I couldn't figure out.

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste Your Money
Reviews.Author: mc
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera and spent forever trying to get it set up to view remotely. The directions are in broken English and the website no longer exists.Such a waste of money. Wouldn't port through my router, so I bought a new one of those as well because the Wizard (which again is in broken English and hard to understand) said that a Belkin would port with their software. Still a no go. It is asking for a router username and password, which doesn't work when inputted.I'm fairly computer savvy, not a pro, but I can usually find my way around things pretty efficiently. On this camera though, it's a piece of junk. Works when you are on the same WiFi as the camera, but is not viewable remotely.Find another brand and model, spend a bit more - but at least you'll have something that works.

Reviews.Title: Great low cost WiFi IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Kevin B Copeland
Reviews.Content: You have to set it up by connecting an internet cable directly to your router, then you are able to set it up easily. Then once you set up your wifi settings, it works wirelessly. I was able to view it from work. Just follow the instructions in the package. Includes a network cable, adjustable wall mount. Power cable. Video up to 640x480.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jon Moody "Entrepreneur"
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews I ordered this with a little bit of trepidation.  But once I received it got it up and running I am still amazed at how much technology I got for such a low price.  My home wireless network is completely Apple up to my router.  Some others had reported problems using this device within an Apple network but I didn't have any problems.  I plugged this device into my router,  configured it following the instructions and everything worked including access over the Internet.  I am also writing my own smartphone software to control and access it and again I have found no problems with it.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: ChrisO
Reviews.Content: I have tested this for a day now and so far so good. I will come back online to place another 30 day review of the device once I have it running everyday and such.PROS: It is simple stupid to setup. Forgives mistakes easily. Has it's own built in DNS server for remote access of the cam if you have port-forwarding enabled. Does everything FOSCAM cam does spec for spec plus more and most of all it is cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Surveillance without the big price
Reviews.Author: CHEWIE
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera to watch parts of your home when away.  I have it set to email me when / if the motion sensor is activated. Color, sound,  and night vision works flawlessly.  Easy to use wireless or wired.  Setup wizard makes it simple. Can be used with mobile phone.  We are completely satisfied with the Tenvis camera.

Reviews.Title: Handy IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Tari Hisime "Tari Hisime"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera to install in my home so that I could view my kitty cats while I am away.  I love this device because it gives a clear enough picture for me to see how my Boys are doing throughout the day.  I can preset locations around a room that I would like to pan and tilt the camera to.  I also downloaded an app on my iPhone so that I can control the camera from there, along with my computer.While I have tried the microphone/audio option and know it works, I usually don't use this.  I would rather not bother my kitties while they are resting and I am away.There are many helpful reviews posted online to help you figure out how to add this camera to your home wireless network.  I'm so glad I made this purchase!

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Chico
Reviews.Content: i like how u can look and move your camera from your phone or laptop  and has great night vistion  i going to order more of them for my back yard....  and side......  ip  camera are the  best and  this ip camera is lowest price for this camera it a good deali plan to buy more of this one

Reviews.Title: Best camera out there!!!
Reviews.Author: Jason Sterling
Reviews.Content: i am very pleased with the out standing performance this camera has. it's well worth it. You will be glad you did. thx again.Jason Sterling

Reviews.Title: Doesn't do what it was meant to do
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Unable to set up this camera for viewing on mobile devices. That was our initiative in buying it, so it was a complete waste for us. There is no English helpline.Also, I received an e-mail from the company asking for me to leave a good review in exchange for a free camera. So, a lot of the good reviews on here have been cheaply bought.

Reviews.Title: Nothing secure about it
Reviews.Author: S E Moore
Reviews.Content: The worst thing about it is that it can't be counted on.  I'd be willing to have a hassle to save some money as long as it worked which was what I thought I was getting at first.  This thing took forever to set up.  I ended up calling china.  The woman who answered asked my to use email support in the future, which I've tried but they take up to two days for each response and at times have just sent an image from a page in the manual!I think the idea is to drag you out past when you can return them with SLOWLY addressing issues with a piece of junk device.So, what took forever, you ask?  Back and forth with connection to the router and getting it on my network was a problem.  After several tries I got the reluctant Chinese customer service person on the phone from China.  They asked me to go through all the steps again after a factory reset and said that would work.  It didn't.  I called again.  They had to connect via team viewer to change the assigned ip address of the camera on their end... The DDNS was screwed up.  I wish I'd taken notes at the time to be more specific about the problem.  I'm not tech illiterate and I'm generally intuitive with this stuff so for me to be baffled and frustrated is just rare.  I'm the one people call when they can't figure out their gadget.I never could get the IMAP going with Gmail.  It was on and off.  I'd get their little "success!" message saying my settings were correct but then no emails and I'd go test again and get a fail.  I wonder if those messages are actually testing anything or if it's like a magic 8 ball.  I've just got "success!" with yahoo but still, no email.I had to go out of town shortly after it arrived and NEEDED this to work so I got FTP storage and that setup went OK....  for a week or so.So now the motion sensor is not working.  I planned on using images from this camera for things you NEED a security camera to do.  It worked for just over a week and I got many false positives- like 45 images of nothing a day- from the motion sensor but I didn't really care because I was still getting images and I figured I'd mess with the sensitivity later but didn't want to reduce it at the risk of missing something.  And I did at least get something I needed so I was almost going to be willing to put up with glitchiness as long as it was sending me something I could use.  All of a sudden it just stopped.  The tech support in China said they couldn't do anything unless I was home with the camera and sent me ANOTHER copy of the manual.I got home and confirmed that there's not a thing wrong with my settings.  I was always able to access the thing remotely but didn't have a desktop at home to record video to and it will only upload stills to FTP and that's not working.  I've captured video and stills with the camera now that I'm here and there's no problem with that.  Just the alarm.  You know, the reason you don't just run a webcam all day and play back the footage.  But until I get a REAL motion sensing camera, that's what I'm going to have to do.  At least I got something I needed but I won't try to save money again on something that just HAS TO WORK.  If you think you might actually really need a security camera, buy something else.  I have no idea what all those days of it not working cost me.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Hospodavis
Reviews.Content: Camera records, pans/tilts with no problem. We use the camera to watch the pets when we travel and are able t talk to them with the microphone/speaker. Great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Can watch my house in Saco Maine anywhere in the world!
Reviews.Author: Dellas Nason
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this camera its champagne quality at beer prices!we tell everyone about this product and how much we love it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Security Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Adam Graves
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent security camera for the price.  We purchased it to monitor our home when we were on vacation.  Easy to install and easy to use.  Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Easy way to add surveillance - feel much safer!
Reviews.Author: Timothy Cribb
Reviews.Content: About 18 months ago, my apartment was broken into and a lot of my electronics were stolen. The community had no cameras to see what happened, and I had no security system. We moved that weekend and the first purchase I decided to make was a new security system. Being in an apartment, though, I couldn't 'install' any sort of hardware, so my attention turned to the DIY type set ups. I found a neat open source program to run on my computer (iSpy) and wanted to get simple-to-use and easy to install cameras to monitor my space. Needless to say this camera fit the bill. Biggest benefit is that it's wireless. I was able to set it up very quickly; hard-wired to my router at first, then set loose anywhere in the house. Once positioned, the iSpy software did the rest. Because it's a standard IP camera, iSpy was able to control it with ease, tracking motion, panning/scanning rooms, time-lapse video, and even alert me when there was motion. It also saves video to my computer as soon as it detects anything, and those are auto-uploaded to my cloud storage immediately (and a UPS/Battery keeps everything running if the power goes out). The camera has some color-accuracy issues that could be better, but the quality is otherwise great (especially for the night-vision).I cannot be more satisfied with this camera. It has great features on it own (I use a simple IP camera app on my iPhone/iPad to monitor it remotely, but the web interface for the camera works well too), but more importantly, it is also a fairly 'open' IP camera that works with most IP Camera managers.I have since moved again, and the great thing is that the camera moved with me without having to clean up wires or brackets. Feels like a great investment.

Reviews.Title: Nice IP Camera
Reviews.Author: kent e eisenhart
Reviews.Content: I had the camera up and running in minutes with no problems. The web interface is convenient and easy to use. The video quality  matched my expectations. The pan and tilt work well. The price is right, and I will purchase another.

Reviews.Title: Simply doesn't work!!
Reviews.Author: CPV
Reviews.Content: After hard work to configure and connect, the camera goes offline 100 times a day....Amazon must check this rating list because the quality product is poor......Surveillance...from me to the camera trying to put it online...Money for nothing!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera with Great Features at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Steven Allen Kozlow
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera to be able to keep an eye on our grandsons on the days they spend with us and we want to put them down for a nap.  It was easy to set up, has a great picture and is easy to move and refocus in the room.  It also has great night vision and we can see clearly in a dimly lit room.Aside from being able to view with our browser (Chrome) we have an app for our android phones that works well too.  With our home wifi network, we are able to look in on our grandsons whenever we want.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work with most email services
Reviews.Author: Tech Gadget
Reviews.Content: I've have two Wansview and two more Foscam; both IPcams work very well and remotely with a laptop or smartphone app.  However, I wanted to try something cheaper but I found the Tenvis more difficult to setup.  After a couple of month of messing with it, I couldn't get the camera to send any alerts with Hotmail, Yahoo or Google mail--Tenvis doesn't have a way to do logon authentication.  I could get the Tenvis cam to work when I'm at home but for some reason, the Tenvis won't work remotely (port-fowarding with laptop or smartphone).  Consequently, I'll stick with Wansview and Foscam from now on.  If you just need a baby-monitor, Tenvis will work for that purpose only.

Reviews.Title: They work one day or minute and then they don't
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I had a heck of a time setting these up and don't look for support, it's somewhere way out there - where no one goes.... After getting these setup at my cottage, they just stopped working. I found a work around by attaching a timer to the outlet and forcing them to reboot every day. With two of these, I normally get about 5 days of working each. some days te darn thing just doesn't work, but the other one does - so I don't believe it's the router or internet.If your technical and cheap like me, you may be able to tolerate the poor performace - otherwise spend more and get something that works.

Reviews.Title: Risky
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Im sure its a great product as well. I used mine for about a month. I sent it back because the internal mic didnt work at all. So i connected an external one and it still didnt work at all. everything else worked as expected but the rang on it was very very low. and it kept cutting out and the cam was only about 10-15 feet from the access point. connecting by Ethernet cable or a longer or better antenna should fix that problem though. And the software that comes with it is really cheap. And theirs no recording function on the software or the camera itself. But you can find free ip cam software on the internet that works with it that you can record with which is what i done.

Reviews.Title: Does a fine job.
Reviews.Author: Vincent D.
Reviews.Content: clear image, ir works in many room sizes at night, when rebooting does require that you re flip the image if handing upside down.

Reviews.Title: Awesome.  Worked well
Reviews.Author: Louie Lim
Reviews.Content: Excellent.. I have a WANVIEW camera and this is better than the wanview.  Installed easily and quickly.  Very satisfied.  Highly recomended

Reviews.Title: wothless, their software couldn't find their camera
Reviews.Author: Xmas
Reviews.Content: 1st camera I ordered, woul;d have been well worth the cost if it worked. I could ping the camera with ping command, but none of their software would locate it or talk to it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: G. Abbott
Reviews.Content: Use this to keep an eye on a home I own in Wisconsin.  If it had a zoom capability it would have gotten 5 stars.  Overall a very good value.  Disconnects sometimes, but that could be my connection on site.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis camera
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Mason "mike35z"
Reviews.Content: Hooked up the cameras and was very impressed with the image quality.  The resolution is very good with lots of detail.  works very good in low light levels.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up
Reviews.Author: skconsulting
Reviews.Content: It is all about removing it from the box and ease of setup to get it going.  I only have 1 small suggestion for you even though the answer is in the FAQ.  I had a hard time determining what the password was with the (<null>) listed on the base of the unit.  Maybe you should have a sticker that says "Username is:  admin and leave the password blank" and place it in the Quick Start Guide.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Diego Vallejo
Reviews.Content: I like this cam.easy to operate and excellent tutorials in the webpage. I think that te price is very good for the product.

Reviews.Title: Lola Pet Camera
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for a couple to keep an eye on their new puppy. They loved it! No more anxiety about the puppy chocking on something or getting bored since they can also talk to her with the 2 way voice feature on this camera. The night vision is so visually clear and bright. I worried it would be difficult to see a 3 pound black pup on it. The set up wasn't as difficult as I had anticipated since I had to set it up.Having multiple options for tech support helped. The forums at Tenvis.com we're a great source of info. I just wanted to make sure first what problems others encountered during the set up before I attempted to set the camera up myself. Honestly, there was very little I didn't like about this camera. Once my pocketbook recovers from the holidays, I plan to purchase my own.

Reviews.Title: Easy Setup, Good Quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had the camera up and running in minutes with no issues. The web interface is convenient and easy to use. The video quality is good, and matched my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great for an inexpensive baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Kirk
Reviews.Content: We received this as a gift to use as a baby monitor.  Works great viewing in the house on the iPhone and iPad.  Very inexpensive way to have a video monitor in the baby's room.

Reviews.Title: Decent picture - lousy sound
Reviews.Author: Y. Trehalf "You betchya!"
Reviews.Content: For the money - so far, this is worth it.  Here are my comments:1.  If you want to view the image/video outside your network, you will need to have some computer/networking knowledge. the instructions aren't very clear, but unless you have a static IP (most of us don't), you will need to configure a 3rd party to allow you to view.  You can save the $40+ dollars Amazon suggests you spend for the software2. The software that comes with it isn't  very user friendly, and at times it is hard to understand, and the translation isn't very good.  It took me about 1 frustrating hour to get things going.3.  The wizard was not able to connect to my wireless.  When I went into 'settings' and put the info in myself, it worked just find.  odd.4.  The main reason this did not get a 5th start is that it reboots itself very often (have others had a problem with this?).  It seems to crash my browser, and by the time I'm able to reconnect, it's either looking at the ceiling, or going in all kinds of different directions.  It's probably meant to do this, and I understand I can pick a 'default' view for it to reset to, but I'm not liking this part of the camera.5.  The picture is decent,  not great.  It isn't as good a basic photograph, but it's better than other camera's at this price.  While you can set it to take (and send you) pictures when it detects movement, unless the person is semi-still, it's mostly a blur.  If using for security, and the person is moving quickly, you will likely not be able to identify them very well. Know that some colors are a bit off as well.6.  The sound is lousy.  You can't leave  both the 'listen' and 'speak' settings on at the same time.  The feedback is horrible.  There is also quite a delay in the sound.  when you speak 'to' the camera, it is barely understandable on the other end.Bottom line - it does the basics well for the price.  You can set it to record video onto your local computer when it detects movement, and when outside your network, you can still take pictures while watching.  one thing I found is that you need to be in Internet Explorer to use all the features.  Anything else (Chrome, Mobile) gives you very limited options.  it's hard to move the camera when viewing in mobile.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!!
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is unlike any other IP camera I have come across.  Paired with the quick and easy installation this camera cannot be beat.

Reviews.Title: Good prodoct
Reviews.Author: keren fridel
Reviews.Content: I recommend this camera.The picture is good, even in the night vision mood.The tilt/pan operation is quietThe installation is not quick, but easy to do (needs basic computer skills).

Reviews.Title: Solution (camera and software together) does not work and instructions are atrocious
Reviews.Author: Camron Malik
Reviews.Content: The software does not work properly with the camera. One can see the live images, but recording does not work properly. The instructions and manual are simply atrocious. Incomprehensible! The manufacturer needs to test the solution much more, make it work with products which are more prevalent and standard (e.g. linksys routers), have a tech writer with better english skills write the manual from scratch and ensure the software (especially recording and using Internet Explorer) is tested.

Reviews.Title: Good quality ip camera with reasonable price
Reviews.Author: S.N.
Reviews.Content: Originally bought the more expensive Foscam FI8910W, but had to return due to somehow blurry image. This one is $20 cheaper, but did the job just fine, if not better.So far it's been working perfectly for 2 months, no random reboot, clear picture in daytime and nighttime. Great product!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA, BUT COULD BE A LITTLE BETTER
Reviews.Author: wayne
Reviews.Content: SO FAR IT WORKS GREAT. MY BIGGEST COMPLAINT IS THE USER INTERFACE. I CAN NOT GET IT TO LOAD THE ADD ON FOR INTERNET EXPLORER, WHICH HAS ALL THE AVAILABLE CONTROLS. I HAVE TO USE FIREFOX OR MY ANDROID PHONE, WHICH DON'T HAVE ALL AVAILABLE OPTIONS. ALSO CAN'T SEEM TO LOG IN TO THE CAMERA IF I'M AWAY FROM MY HOME NETWORK. THE CAMERA ITSELF IS GREAT, NOT THE BEST EVER, BUT STILL GREAT.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, especially if near an ethernet port.
Reviews.Author: Robdelm33
Reviews.Content: Camera works but is very hard to set up with phone app. The picture quality is okay when viewing from the app, but the picture cuts in and out, making it basically impossible to focus on anything. I think this may be a problem with my smart phone speed but haven't been able to find any documentation to be sure. Camera is flawless when viewed online through their website. Works well for me since I am just using to monitor my front door while I am away.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice!
Reviews.Author: Richard, Texas
Reviews.Content: My first remote security device and it works perfectly. I was able to check in by phone, on my pets and yard without any problems. I will order another one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Upyukt Prakash
Reviews.Content: Excellent productGot the results a s thoughtI had a a similar product but this is exceptionally better than others

Reviews.Title: Don't like it
Reviews.Author: A. raheem
Reviews.Content: The setting is too complicated. Easy in a network. Very hard to setup from outside.Camera stops functioning several times.Would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I want one too!
Reviews.Author: Bree
Reviews.Content: My son asked for this for Christmas so I ordered it for him. I started reading the box when it arrived and I want one too! It looks like a really nice one for a not so high price!

Reviews.Title: Good price range for the features
Reviews.Author: Ken Henderson
Reviews.Content: Got this for my Son and girlfriend for Christmas to watch their cat while they are at work/school.  I chose this for the features which included both wireless and eithernet hook-up alternatives.  Nice to see it had many different moutning options when my son opened it.  Also allows theme both to view remotely from their phones.  'The pan and tilt work - you don't see these options on other systems in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Cam for the price
Reviews.Author: sdaniel
Reviews.Content: Overall is a really good camera, I thought it was smaller, configuration easy for someone who works around computersProPicture quality more than expectedEasy to set up in iphoneConsHard to find the app for android, the manual should have the icon app as you put it in the iphoneVertical Pan & tilt range very short, more degrees will be appreciated

Reviews.Title: tenvis camera
Reviews.Author: POHAI
Reviews.Content: Camera was quick n easy to set up and my husband WORKS ABOUT 7 MILES AWAY and he can catch it on his phone from workits got a good picture as well. Its so good Im buying another one today thanks .

Reviews.Title: Poor quality, bad software, router support
Reviews.Author: Clyde
Reviews.Content: The disappointment started when I tried to screw on the antenna, and the assembly itself was loose to the point that the antenna wouldn't stay in place. So I had to fix that before the misery of getting it to work started. I finally got it to function on my home network, but setting up the port forwarding simply wouldn't work with my Linksys router. Looking online at the forums of how many people have problems with this, it's not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: TODD MOE
Reviews.Content: Worked for two days to get this connected to Windows computer and no luck....Chinese made, Chinese instruction book and no help online.....do not buy this item if you have ATT Uverse or what ever provider my brother has.....

Reviews.Title: doesnt work
Reviews.Author: Pavel Miller "pavster"
Reviews.Content: doesnt work...cheap crap...!! spent an hour trying to get the camera to connect to the internet, saw the window where my computer recognized the camera but still it didnt work

Reviews.Title: its a good plus for the money
Reviews.Author: Carl W.
Reviews.Content: Its the second one i have purchased. i'am sure i will be pleased Dont talk to soon. my first is working fine.i' am viewing at a distance, for the money its the best buy at out there at this time in my oppinion.

Reviews.Title: Great product overall!
Reviews.Author: DZ
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and use.  We use this as a baby monitor and we can see our baby so clearly (day and night)!  I can even watch my baby while I'm at work and he's at home with the sitter.  Great investment and such an affordable price!

Reviews.Title: This is pretty awesome
Reviews.Author: masha
Reviews.Content: Just bought this because we want to keep an eye on our dogs, and it's working great! Set it up today, the set up was just a tad bit difficult, like other customers said, some understanding of networking is definitely a plus. But once we got it going, it's really cool. We can just hop right on to our ip address (after our port was forwarded) and keep an eye on our precious kids! So far the only problem is that it like... froze once, and I had to unplug it for a second - but that may be due to bad wifi connection where the camera is. Will definitely keep an eye on it, and move it around if necessary! Other than that though it's really cool. We can move it around most of the room, and the night vision is excellent. It's really quite remarkable. And the settings for managing the camera are quite intuitive! Excellent buy, very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Contains Malware - Cameras good
Reviews.Author: Emmett Clark
Reviews.Content: Cameras deserve 5 stars - software is dangerous and deserves less than 0 stars - so a rating of two seems appropriate. After install get a third party program to use on your phone and computer - and run a program like "Malwarebytes" to clean up your computer. You may have to remove some extensions in your browser depending on which one you use.

Reviews.Title: not that great......
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: OK i guess, night vision never turns on, no way to force it on or off. if there is any light at all night vision never turns on, at all! if you want to use it for day time/ room with a decent amount of light or a totally dark space its OK, frame package dropping and slow reaction time, BEWARED!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Chris Foote
Reviews.Content: Folks, please remember this is a full featured camera for under $50....you won't find Pan/Tilt and built in WiFi capability for under $50 from any of the big brand names.Having said that, the camera works fine. Yes, this is a Chinese camera with a no-frills user interface, but it all works once you get it up and running.WiFi Tips: For those looking to setup for WiFi use (I'm assuming the majority of us), first plug it in to your router with a network cable. Run the Wizard off the CD and it should find your camera without issue. *IF* you are running a WiFi networking that is 'hidden' (i.e. SSID is not being broadcast), temporarily turn on broadcasting so the camera can connect. Once you do that, input your WiFi networks info and it should connect without issue. Once its connected, I'd advise setting a static IP -- if not, use DHCP and *then* you can disabled SSID Broadcasting and you should be good to go.There is an updated firmware out for IE11. When you go to Tenvis's webpage, MAKE SURE you download the right firmware for your hardware revision. You can look at your hardware revision by going to settings (hit the gear icon from the main video viewing page) and you'll see Hardware revision in the "About" section (the section that appears by default).Overall this little camera works great. It's really nice to have Pan/Tilt on a camera that is under $50. Video quality is good but not excellent. Again, you can't expect miracles for the price point, it does a great job for the $$$.I have not tried nighttime video quality with the IR, but we'll see how it does...

Reviews.Title: OK for viewing from inside your network...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "leftybassatl@yahoo.com"
Reviews.Content: ...but remote viewing and recording is agonizing.  I may have just gotten a bad one, but eventually I just gave up.  I'm fairly technically savvy but this setup was completely absurd.  It was fairly easy to get viewing from inside your own network, but DDNS setup was impossible, rendering this camera useless unless you're looking for a baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Shoddy Construction, outdated software, impossible installation
Reviews.Author: R. Rasmussen
Reviews.Content: The installation instructions are poorly written and refer you to their website which is a holy mess. While attempting to install the camera the feet fell off. The software would not recognize the camera and would not update it. After 4 hours I finally got it to work. It does work VERY WELL and I was hopeful that I could get all three cameras that I purchased to function as well.Then I tried to install the other 2 cameras. 4 hours later I just could not get them to work. I tried to push the reset button (mislabled on the "Quick Start" insert) and it fell into the camera. I disconnected them all, put them back in the box and I'm going to try to find anything better.

Reviews.Title: wonderful product and company followup
Reviews.Author: mazen kanso
Reviews.Content: great product for its price and the company guys are amazing they followed up with me to install it they even did this through teamviewer.great people TENVIS

Reviews.Title: excellent camera, excellent price!
Reviews.Author: Diego Zavala
Reviews.Content: i recomended it!,  i love it!, the quality is excellent, easy to configure. The best 640 x 480 image quality, 30 fps! ,great focus. great night vision. you can use it with wifi or lan cable. You can see your house, office, garage, etc, over the internet and manage the pan and tilt in any place in the world!. Work  on android, iOS , Mac or Pc . Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Works OK most of the time, but resets at slightest power disturbance and resets where it is pointing.
Reviews.Author: TED T
Reviews.Content: I bought several models of Pan/Tilt cameras and some outdoor cameras for a home security setup along with BlueIris software.  This camera works well when actively controlling it.  I have it in garage so I can look around out there (and see if the laundry cycle is completed), but the electrical load out there (washer) seems to glitch/reset the camera so every day when I check it it is always pointed up at the ceiling instead of where I left it.  Night vision is good at close range, camera image is wide angle, so it will be most useful within <15 feet.

Reviews.Title: Just OK, would not use for good security needs
Reviews.Author: James Hess
Reviews.Content: The first lower starred review I've done.I use these to help as I am somewhat homebound and don't have a lot of mobility.First, the software on a MAC is really terrible. You miss a lot of features.The camera itself is pretty well built, no real complaints there for an indoors camera.Setting up on the network was a real pain. I still cannot get them to hold a static IP address on my WiFi.  Which means when they reset, I sometimes have to run the Camera software to find their new IP addresses.Color is really poor quality. Red shows up as purple, blue shows up at grey, lighting in the room is fine but this thing looks ugly.The night mode works good, IR really picks up well.It will randomly go into a roaming mode all by itself and then not go back to the position it was in.I can move the camera to look somewhere, and then it swing back to a different position on its own as well.I would not recommend buying these for full time security use to anyone. They just don't have it together or they are offloading a poorly designed product.For temporary use and if you don't care what the color looks like, it's ok.

Reviews.Title: TENVIS JPT3815W
Reviews.Author: E. Petter
Reviews.Content: Does a good job for my application.  I use it to monitor a CNC machine in my shop.  It lacks ZOOM which would be nice to have but considering the cost difference I'm satisfied for the money I spent.  I can't zoom but the image provides enough definition for me to know if the machine is operating within normal parameters.  I'm  considering purchasing another for monitoring my chicken coop.  I doubt I'll spend the extra money for a cam with wider field of vision and zoom just to monitor some chickens.  Reasonable value when your application allows something other than a top dollar performance.I had no problem with the set up.

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera. Night vision is GREAT, day time recording is average. Decent pan/tilt range. Setup very quickly, running very smoothly. The only problem I'm having with it is that the DDNS service does NOT work. Tenvis has forums which are helpful and this seems like a very common complaint. If anyone has had luck resolving this issue I would like to know how. I've triple checked the default gateway, IP address and subnet mask....still no luck.Also the internet functionality is a bit limited (unless you use IE, blerg), as you cannot record or access sound. The free app available for Android works well on my tablet, but again, no sound.Over all it's a neat little camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, great price.
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. Have this camera mounted in an unheated area. Occasionally there are color saturation issues but over all it is a good camera. The one downside is the inability to turn off the infrared lights.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great -- Yet.
Reviews.Author: C. SMITH
Reviews.Content: The camera has a very good picture, compared to a much more expensive TrendNet camera.  My biggest gripes are the user interface for the camera.  I can't get motion triggers to work even with email testing successfully.  If you attempt to run the camera in IE Norton comes back and says there is a virus in the activeX control.  I would give it a 4/5 if it shipped with a more polished UI and the trigger event worked for me.I'll update the firmware and post and updated review once I have tried it out.

Reviews.Title: Simply the best, cheaper than all the rest.
Reviews.Author: eAli
Reviews.Content: This camera works terrifically. The included instructions and setup wizard software make setup a breeze. Had the camera setup wirelessly and able to view over the internet away from home within 10 minutes. It has a built in microphone, and speaker to talk back through the camera, which is an added surprise. The transition from light to infrared night vision is very smooth.  There is also an alarm feature that you can setup to send you notifications through email anytime the camera detects motion within the frame. The  pan and tilt functionality is awesome and you can even set it up to run sentry mode, where it sweeps back and forth across the entire perimeter. The picture quality is not the best but definitely good for the price and application.I would  definitely recommend this camera for anyone interested in a relatively inexpensive camera that is easy to set up, and I will definitely be purchasing again from Tenvis.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: cdolady
Reviews.Content: Great camera, easy to set up and the connect to the wifi. was able to since to an app as well as computer viewing. Picture looks great in both light and nighttime. The two way radio is pretty neat. Plan to purchase several for monitoring in the house, good range on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Priceless piece of mind for less that $50.  How can you beat that?
Reviews.Author: Bassic
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product after a neighbor's home was burglarized - just as an added protection/surveillance for my house while I'm at work, etc.  Simply, I am impressed all around...  The price/value, the ease of setup, and how this inexpensive device gives me a piece of mind of remote viewing.  Note that it has "auto record" capability (which I'm using) after an alarm event.  This means it'll record about 15-sec of video to your computer.  But it only works with Internet Explorer.  Also, when I downloaded the plug-in required, my Norton antivirus software would not let me install.  When I contacted the Tenvis helpdesk, they advised me to deactivate the antivirus before installation...  I didn't like the response, but it was a very QUICK response.I've had this camera running for about two weeks.  I can see and control the camera from any computer (user/password protected),and able to see activities on my iPhone anywhere...  I've received a few false alarms (this things sends you email when motion is detected), but they are more like "assurance" that the camera is working and watching.BTW, everything I described above came in the box (except for the plug-in software for IE, which is a free download from Tenvis).I'm getting a couple more to monitor the rest of the house...Great product and an amazing value.  I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Gwinny
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up, works as expected. Great value for the price. Thinking of buying a second one to add to my network.

Reviews.Title: an inexpensive solution for my needs
Reviews.Author: VDrummer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a way to monitor a doorway. That is all I pretty much needed this to be, so this being the cheapest solution it worked. Setup was painless, but I'm an IT guy and know my way around IP devices. I dinged a star because like most reviewers have already noted, the two way audio doesn't work. So if it doesn't work, don't add it as a feature. I haven't tried removing the antenna or using straight wired connections as others noted, because I really didn't care about the feature and I knew it wouldn't work when I bought it based on the reviews. This was a cheap temporary solution to have a monitor while I wasn't home. The firmware on this device lacks some features as others have noted as well such as not being able to turn off the IR and the web service only using http and not https.

Reviews.Title: security camera
Reviews.Author: Yogesh N. Badiani "yb"
Reviews.Content: poor instructions, not user friendly, I could never see video, snapshots gave very poor picture quality,there is no u.s. toll free number for support. email set up instn are not there.

Reviews.Title: Frustrating
Reviews.Author: Christie Washburn
Reviews.Content: I cannot get it to work at all. Every time I attempt to connect the software to the internet through my computer and modem, it shuts my whole modem down. I had AT&T; come and replace the modem and they ran the software but the same thing happened, the modem shut off. The repair man said the camera was not compatible with the modem. I don't dare attempt to run this elsewhere since it had such an adverse effect on my own equipment.

Reviews.Title: Real 180 degree rotation
Reviews.Author: Saad B. Al Jabri
Reviews.Content: So many nice features like: real 180 degree rotation, audio and video capabilities but the video resolution is poor and the size is so big.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money and time on this!
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Item is unreliable.  Every time I would leave the camera on and leave; I would return to find the camera repositions itself or is unresponsive.  This is a copy of the Foscam from China which is a bad illegal copy of.

Reviews.Title: Superb product!
Reviews.Author: Subramanyam K
Reviews.Content: meets all my home surveillance needs. easy to use and works well remotely. Took a few extra steps to configure Wi-Fi but worked instantly after.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Ovidiu Boghean
Reviews.Content: Camera is great actually. The picture quality is good and the night vision is great. If you are to use this indoors, then it is the perfect camera. I used to take some surveillance video in front of my house. It worked great and it was easy to record. The motion sensor does not work well outside, at least not from a great distance. Indoors it works perfectly. The e-mail alarm works as advertised. I was not able to hook it up to broadcast over WIFI or the internet. I don't believe that it is an issue with the camera as it is with my router and my lack of experience. I had it connected over LAN with the Ethernet cable and it worked great. The app that can be downloaded from the tenvis website is the better of the two recommended in my opinion. I was able to control the camera from the phone but only while I was in my home network, not over the internet. This could be largely because of my lack of technical know-how. I did not finish the whole set, up, I was having some issues that seem to be related to my router. Overall I think it is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent tool need simpler setup
Reviews.Author: FAREED A KHOUQEER
Reviews.Content: it is an excellent tool, need more work on "plug and play" simpler setup i guess for most of us

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Christopher Van Wyhe
Reviews.Content: A good product for the price. It was easy to set up and works fine.A few things you give up when buying this product compared to a higher-priced one:- No control over the night vision LEDs. They're on all the time making it useless if you're trying to point it out a window at night- Video recording only works in Internet Explorer- The camera also cycles off randomly, when it powers back up it moves around off of the target I had it pointed to-- kind of a pain.I use it as a baby monitor when I'm home and cover the IR LEDs when I'm away so I can point it out the window and keep an eye on my front yard.Again, a good product for the small price you pay.

Reviews.Title: This is a cheap indoor camera for home security!
Reviews.Author: Les
Reviews.Content: This is a good indoor camera for any home owner to have for home security. It was very easy to setup and provides a good clean video for security purposes.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: goldfox
Reviews.Content: pleasantly surprised with this IP cam. setup was easy, everything worked just as you would expect, even setting up the motion detection was easy and worked flawless. The mount was a bit odd, I would prefer a flat mount for it.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: honda
Reviews.Content: This is very good wireless camera! It may take a while to set up based on your internet environment. but check their webiste, there's a lot of instruction. At least I find my answer with the ATT 2wire router. It's really cool you can watch the door and garage with the iphone remote ~

Reviews.Title: Affordable and easy to set up/use for home security!
Reviews.Author: P. Gelabert
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for an affordable and easy to set up/use IP camera for a while. I was driven away by high prices and reviews mentioning the difficulty of use. Once I spotted this Tenvis and saw a video on YouTube on how to set it up, I was eager to try it out. When I got the camera I set it up on my network in less than 10 minutes and in another 20 had it set up so I was able to access the camera remotely. The instructions and software were very helpful and the camera is awesome! I am able to see in complete darkness and pan/tilt/rotate remotely. I'm looking forward to adding more cameras from Tenvis in the future!

Reviews.Title: Great and Economical
Reviews.Author: Max Mulberry
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic, economical way to maintain surveillance on one's home. The mobile app user interface is is easy to navigate, though set-up can be a bit tricky at first making sure that the camera works both while on your wireless network and when miles away from it.I was so impressed that I bought a second one! Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase in the price offered.
Reviews.Author: Archana Rathore
Reviews.Content: Good purchase in the price offered. bought 2 of them and have installed one already. Seem to work fine with a good day and night vision quality.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Christoph Serfozo
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. As others have said the unit is all plastic, but I've had zero issues getting it up and running. Would recommend and will likely be ordering more.

Reviews.Title: wired = yes; wireless = no.
Reviews.Author: j.slinger
Reviews.Content: The unit I received only half worked. I really wanted the wireless part to work though. The wired connection worked great!
