But my router is in the basement and where I want the camera is upstairs. I bought this for the wireless option and there is no way I'm running a wire through my house.Also if you do get this, download the setup software from Tenvis' website. There are more options there...but still is buggy as the translation of the pages aren't fully translated between Chinese and English. I was amused by the grammar used though, lol.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: JustWhelmed
Reviews.Content: Works great but there is a lag between the camera and the video. Would like it to have a higher resolution as well. The night vision is perfect for what I needed it for.

Reviews.Title: may have to send back
Reviews.Author: BILL
Reviews.Content: trouble lots of it , but stile working on it. may have to send it back and try another.the good news is i wont give up

Reviews.Title: Security camera
Reviews.Author: Janeen
Reviews.Content: I LOVE the mobility and agility of the camera. But as of yet I have not been able to set it up as the lights don't do what they say they should

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Joseph F Venditti
Reviews.Content: Fine camcorder...moves and works well with my android ip cam viewer. I had to manually set the port forwarding on my router to workcorrectly, outside of the instruction manual if you encounter this problem, easy instructions are obtained through youtube. under tenvis setup. the manual will not specify this. Very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera but.....
Reviews.Author: Edward T.
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the money, but I had intended to use it in my garage but the cameras hidi is on the same freq as my door opener. So I use it in another location.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and great image
Reviews.Author: kc
Reviews.Content: EZ setup, good focus, good infrared illumination.  Remote software works without issue, good range of motion.Would recommend to any user.

Reviews.Title: they work intermitetly
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: hard to get connectd, does not recognize my Belkin router. one of the camersa failed within a week and had to ship it  back. It was replaced shipping was expensive but I got good customer support communications. unable to get the support for use on the net, works on local lan  I was not able to find an app that will work on my windows phone. ONe of tthe ID codes is not readable on the underside of the camera and ws ont able to get the sellers support to ID the camera

Reviews.Title: Good starter, hard start
Reviews.Author: M. Davis "M.D"
Reviews.Content: First off, I always appreciate reviews and haven't given many but this purchase NEEDED one. Had to have one. This is a bad and a good thing. The first part of this review is about the installation. The worst parts about this product is that CUSTOMER SERVICE is technically unreachable for your immediate help and that the installation process is tough, to say the least. The two hardest parts of installation are 1. the camera being recognized during the installation process and 2. the port forwarding so that the remote, internet viewing option is available. I spent the last 6 hours trying a lot of everything to get the camera to be identified in order to go to the next steps of the installation process and trying to figure out exactly how to port forward correctly. You're going to have to do a lot of googling to get the right info.  Hopefully with this video, you wont have to do as much. The main help for me came from this video on the Tenvis youtube page [...] (TENVIS IP Camera Setup Tutorial for Windows OS).  A lot of people and reviews have said that port forward and installation is easy but I'm trying to prepare you for the worst. Better to expect difficulty and find it easy than to expect a fast installation and have to work much harder at it than you thought you would.The second part of this review is about the product. This is my first IP Camera. The piece connected to my cam for the wifi antenna became super loose after only a short period of time. I just receieved it this morning (11/2/2013). It's so loose I haven't been able to connect using wifi since the first two tries while struggling with installation. I have a very long ethernet cord though so that didn't frustrate me. Once the cam was up and running, I was very satisfied. I love the amount of rotation and tilt for this cam. The color is lightly saturated but the picture is as clear as a 640x480 video would be. I don't get along with my neighbors and my neighborhood isn't all that safe but I've been here all my life. I work all day so when I'm not home, I would like to see what's going on with my property. This is the perfect product to get you started with the video surveillance market. I want more cams set up and I know I will order more. I bought the dummy cam and a video surveillance sign before I bought this. Nothing beats actual video though. Hope this helps. Hope it saves ya some hours of struggle.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product. No problems.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Colon
Reviews.Content: I like this product because I can use it with my tablet and labtop. I have no problem with this item. I already recommended it to some people.

Reviews.Title: Cannot configure this unit wirelessly
Reviews.Author: Daniel P. Lizun
Reviews.Content: Poor instructions and limited support to configure this device wirelessly.  Still sits in the box for which it came from.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: rodrigo
Reviews.Content: I like the camera. I use at wi-fi and cable. I bought the app for the audio. But it is not good.

Reviews.Title: Good price and easy to set up
Reviews.Author: renata reich
Reviews.Content: Really easy to set up, image pretty clear.I connected to my iphone 5s and I was able to move the camera on wifi, apparently to connect the audio there is an extra $2.99 fee.Overall pretty good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal - Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: This is my first IP camera, and I'm pleasantly surprised; very easy to set up with the Windows Wizard App and use with any browser - it works LAN-wired and wireless; now I can check my house entry while I'm away and receive e-mails with attached images when the camera detects movements; it also records a short video on one of my computersThe software has a few glitches that I would fix for the next release: the Windows Wizard app did not recognize my router (Frontier cable router) so I had to manually punch the port- it certainly requires some technical knowledge; the ActiveX control for Windows Explorer throws an annoying OK message box every time that I connect to the camera or I change a setting and the video settings are not persisted - I would clean the ActiveX control from useless messages and provide a better help when the router is not supported.

Reviews.Title: Great set of features
Reviews.Author: Ari
Reviews.Content: This camera becomes even cheaper if you consider all the features it has.Since I like to tinker with computer stuff, it was a great task to set up this camera, but for the unexperienced user, pay attention for the port forwarding config, which is the topic that makes you camera accessible outside the house.

Reviews.Title: Not able to get wireless to work
Reviews.Author: skeptic
Reviews.Content: After first trying the setup wizard without success and then much playing around with it, I sometimes could get it to work on Ethernet, but have not been able to get it working wirelessly, so it is useless for what I wanted, and I wasted a lot of time.  Apparently, you have to call China for support.  Unfortunately, it is too late for me to return it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, audio a bit noisy
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Levich
Reviews.Content: Overall very good camera, comparable to Foscam that costs almost double. Some minor issues:1. audio noisy could be loud at times when connecting via WiFi2. green blinking light on the front could be bothersome for babies (Foscam has lights on the back that aren't that visible)

Reviews.Title: Outstanding quality and value!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Greenleaf
Reviews.Content: I was not sure what to expect, this being my first "Nanny Cam" but I was pleasantly surprised.  Very easy to set up and use, and now I can check in on my pets and my home while we are away.  Peace of mind came at such a buy!  The quality of the image is surprisingly clear and the night vision aspect means I don't have to specifically leave lights on to check in on the dogs.  Love it!UPDATE:  We have been using the camera for about a week now, and have been able to check in on our home and dogs remotely from work on my computer, and from each of our iPhones and my iPad.  We liked the camera so much, we bought a second one, so now we have them upstairs and downstairs.  Exceptional value, great quality.  Very happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Rubbish.
Reviews.Author: Naddls
Reviews.Content: Very annoyed with this product. Bought it, installed it. Spent hours and hours emailing with tenvis support (who replied qyuickly). However, end of the story is, that the camera works great for a couple of days and then I lose the feed on my app and can't access it anymore from outside my network. Therefore, it's totally useless. So far, nobody has been able to tell me why it keeps dropping out. End of story: uninstall and throw away.

Reviews.Title: First one DOA, second one is okay.
Reviews.Author: Jason Fortier
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera to start trying out a Zoneminder server I was building. The camera arrived dead out of the box, so Amazon quickly replaced that one.The camera seems to work okay, but I am disappointed that it restarts itself ever couple days, so I lose the the positioning and inverted image I have set up for the monitoring I am doing (I have it ceiling mounted so I need to invert the image).As many have already stated, the IR LEDs remain on at all times, so it is difficult to use looking through a window. The picture is decent and the wireless seems to be fine.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL DIRECTIONS
Reviews.Author: Dallas viewer
Reviews.Content: For me trying to install the software was a nightmare InInstalling on lap top Windows 7 Home version with Google Chromethe easy booklet instructions do not match the manual's instructions . screens shown in manual did not appear on set up screens. Google would not accept the IP address . Slow to zero response on certain actions.Password / SN instructions/ are confusing especially when using the info on units base..Set up should not require so much manual input in today's  tech age.Wasted 3  hours on attempt to set up using varying combos of passwords and S?N'sFlashing green light is not conducive to security , telling all "look a camera"

Reviews.Title: Excellent Night Vision for my kid's room
Reviews.Author: M. Frank
Reviews.Content: The only reason I'm not leaving a 5-star rating is because the camera was a bit difficult to setup and I'm an IT Technician. The hardest part was configuring the IP config because my router has an odd IP address range. It may not be an issue others would experience so I don't believe it's a problem with the camera. But Excellent Night vision and works really really well! I also would recommend "IP Cam Viewer Pro" for iOS devices. The manufacture apps are worthless so expect an extra $3.99 to view on remote devices but the ability to remotely control the pan/tilt, speak through it, and hear audio is fantastic with that app. I don't know if all cameras come with it, but mine had a $15 MIRebate inside so I was very pleased with this camera only paying $29 for it! I highly recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: review by sam
Reviews.Author: S. Demchak
Reviews.Content: camera works flawlessly and is a great value for the price easy to setup and the pan and tilt works great the on board mic works well but the on board speaker is relatively useless extremely low volume cant hear it  i guess that is why they have an audio port to plug in an external speaker

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: LIZ WALLIN
Reviews.Content: This is the second one be bought for the easy way it was to set up. Picture and video are good too.

Reviews.Title: great value and versatile product
Reviews.Author: WisconsinThanksgiving
Reviews.Content: this is for a remote site.  this operates from my laptop, iphone and iPad easily.  the setup has a link to the youtube video that was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Really good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: spirits3250
Reviews.Content: This is the third camera set and type I have tried. The first set I bought were similar to the tenvis but a different manufacturer. They cost more and were much harder to set up.  There was no customer support at all.... so I tried a different camera for my second camera.  This was a pnp model made by another manufacturer.  These were reallyreally easy to set up.  However they are stationary. .. no pan/tilt etc.  Didn't like that aspect.  So for my third camera purchase I tried the tenvis.  The price was hard to beat.  Shipping was very fast.  The camerawas exactly as described.  The camera itself was equivalent in buildto the other more expensive camerasI had previously tried.  Set up wasmuch much easier than the first camI bought (a loftek cxs2200) but notquite as easy as the pnp camera(loftek smart cam).  I am not at all technically savy but I managedto get it up and running in about 45 minutes.  It should be noted that it seems only to work with certain routers and I was lucky that my router was on the list or I don't know if I would have been able to get it set up.  The picture is very good.  Sound not so much.  Controls work well. Night Vision is great.  I've never had an expensive camera so I can't compare in that respect but for what I paid for the tenvis I think it's a great camera.  Very happy I bought it.  Compares favorably to much more expensive cameras.Update:  I need to change my rating to 2 stars.  The camera worked for one day and quit.  Customer service was very good about trying to help me to get it to work but to no avail.  It went from bad to worse when after resetting the camera there was no picture at all.  I think this is probably a good camera....I think I got a lemon.  I'm returning it.Update #2:  After further customer assistance from Tenvis I discovered the problem was with my router not the camera so rating goes back up to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Victor K
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised about the quality of this surveillance camera.  I was tossed between this one and the foscam as well, but glad I went with this model!  Instructions were fairly straight forward and the installation guide and software was easy to follow in setting everything up.Setting up ports and email was a bit tougher with my Medialink router since there was no automated process so I had to manually make the changes which wasn't terrible.  I love the wireless capability and not requiring this to be tethered to my router.  As others mentioned the power cable is a little short but an extension cord solved the issue.  Pan and Tilting controls were easy to use both in the web browser as well as via my Iphone app (I went with Tenvis.US vs their recommended cam viewer since it requires an additional in-app purchase to get audio working)The night vision quality is great though I wish it allowed users to turn off the identifiable red leds about the lens!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price so far.
Reviews.Author: Eleanor M. Saunders
Reviews.Content: The setup was a little strange, it wouldn't save my different ip-range.  Once I went in to advanced mode and changed it, things went much more smoothly.The frame rate isn't that great but hey, for the price its impressive.  Thinking about getting a few more since is a nice cheap way to monitor my home.  I would recommend getting a stand alone ip monitoring app if you are going to view it from your phone.  They are cheap and much more effective at controlling the feed.Just a side note on price, the company will also send you another 15$ discount for writing a review, which makes the price for this a steal.  I will update this review if it breaks or has any other issues.  Giving it a 4 to start out with.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Andres Martinez
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. They look very nice and are really easy to set up. The image is very clear and it is great to be able to pan and tilt the camera for a better view. The night vision looks great.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Mingmo Lee
Reviews.Content: This is my first surveillance camera I have purchased and owned. The initial setup of the camera's settings took some learning but overall it's pretty straight forward. Only thing I didn't like about one of the settings is the alarm scheduling. You have to click a tiny bar for a section of a specific hour for that particular day. I'd rather prefer a numerical schedule where I can type in exactly what time to start and what time to end for specific days.As for the quality, the picture is good enough to recognize faces. It's what I expect a surveillance camera to be. The top casing of the camera is plastic and feels a little cheap but what is going to happen to the camera that will need a very durable casing?The best thing about this is the smart phone compatibility. Just download the app, type in the correct settings and withing a few minutes you can view it anywhere you have data service. I ran it on 3g network and it wasn't too laggy, still watchable.A great buy if you're on a budget!

Reviews.Title: Frustrating
Reviews.Author: Nick Pappas
Reviews.Content: Installed software on my Mac but all I get is a blank window. It should have asked me to verify If I wanted to run the software. No help from instructions or online. I'm going with the Foscam after I return this. oh yea, it came with a scratched disk with fingerprints.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a small home surveillance system
Reviews.Author: Patricia-Neil
Reviews.Content: After an increase in burglaries in our neighborhood I got this camera based on many good reviews here. After some initial setup difficulties the camera is up and running.My setup:- Port forwarding (not DDNS because my router does not support the suggested settings) to access the live feed through a computer browser and via the iphone app TENVIS.US.- Email alert when motion is detected. I use gmail on port 465. Had to change the DNS in the network settings for email to work.- With the iphone app TENVIS.US, I could listen to audio and send audio to the camera.

Reviews.Title: My Tenvis JPT3815W 2013 Wireless IP Pan/Tilt/Night Vision Security Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Nick
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera mainly due to the price. I'm retired and on a fixed income and don't have unlimited funds. The reviews I read also helped convince me to purchased this camera.I got it all set up using the instructions that came with the camera. I am in no way a Geek but sort of know my way around a computer and home network. Anyway, I set it up plugging it into my router and using the program to find and install the camera onto my system. That went actually easier than I'd expected.Next I followed the instructions to set up the wireless portion of it. I unplugged everything and brought it to the living room, my router is downstairs. I plugged it back into power and had it sitting on the desk as I went through the rest of the install. I got the wireless set up using IE for my browser. I prefer Mozilla Firefox, but for me anyway, it seems to work better on IE so that's what I use for the camera. This also frees up Firefox for my "normal" browsing.As far as resolution goes this camera is 640 X 480 which is alright with me. There are also HD cameras out there but they weren't within my budget. No problem. During the day the camera has very decent color and clarity. Remember it's 640 X 480. At night the video is black and white but I guess that's pretty much the way night vision works. Who can really expect color when it's dark in the room.I also downloaded an App for my Android phone and my Kindle Fire which both work very well. I can pan and tilt with either one. The Apps are free but you do get ads so I opted for the $3.99 to eliminate the ads. My next project, which is beyond my knowledge is to set this camera up so that I can view it from the Internet and not just WiFi. That is where it is helpful to have a geek son who, unknown to him, will be willing to come over and help me set up that portion of it. Once he shows me how to set it up I'm planning on purchasing at least one, maybe two, additional cameras for around the house. I want to at least put one in the garage.Other than that I'm very happy with this camera. I got it mounted on the wall sort of out of sight. It can see the whole living room and entry way from its position. This one is Black but I think my next one will be White to blend more in with the wall color where I want to put it. The one for the garage can be Pink for all I care seeing as it will be in the garage.

Reviews.Title: Best IP Camera - Can view on Phone from anywhere!
Reviews.Author: Roland K. Brown
Reviews.Content: Order #106-9094238-7590653I wish I had seen these before I ordered another brand as these are less expensive and worked right out of the box...10-11-2013Roland

Reviews.Title: TENVIS Wireless Did the Trick
Reviews.Author: Wannamartin "Jim"
Reviews.Content: I needed a remote wireless camera to monitor my home while I went on an extended business trip. I'm not a computer guru, so I needed something that was fast and easy to install, and would allow me to listen as well as see what has happening while I was away. I found the TENVIS camera and got interested once I learned that this not only met my criteria, but also offered night vision and an email option that allowed me to get emails on my cell phone when the camera detected any motion.So I ordered the camera and it was delivered fast. The installation seemed basic enough to me, I just needed to know my external IP address, which I got by doing a quick Google search for "show me my IP", and I needed to set a port on my router to channel the signal requests from the internet on to the camera (I guess that is what you would call it). I downloaded a couple of Android apps for remote cameras and both connected right away and gave me total control of both the camera and its settings.So I left on my trip and never had a moment of regret as I felt that I was in constant contact with my camera and my home. I would recommend this camera to anyone needing a surveillance camera that doesn't cost you your plane ticket home. Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis camera
Reviews.Author: littlehoneys
Reviews.Content: This camera has very good quality but with decent price.I can watch my babies wherever I go as far as I just simply log into.Wonderful product and highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: The Camera is really Good and it works just the way it is describe , nice camera and box
Reviews.Author: Muhammad
Reviews.Content: Really good camera,  work like it is describe and nice and with box, I would say if you would like to keep it and watch what's going on when you're away from your house then it is really nice and it works really good and I really like it and thank

Reviews.Title: Great For The Price.
Reviews.Author: Eric C.
Reviews.Content: Works great, Image quality is better than expected, for price it is pretty Darn Good!. Very good distance in dark!. If you want a low budget Wireless camera This is the one for you! .

Reviews.Title: Got a Lemon
Reviews.Author: Edgar
Reviews.Content: Did not work, kept rebooting, tried the forums, then decided best to just send it back to Amazon and buy something more reliable. Maybe I was unlucky, never got a response so didn't care, it went back.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: rich
Reviews.Content: spend a few more dollars on this cameraFoscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and Night Vision (White)trust me. the tenvis has crap software, crappier tech support and an even crappier video feed. i spent 10 hours  trying to set this camera up and i finally packed it up and sent it back.the foscam took me 29 mins and its running right now ya i spent 70 bucks on it but the time i lost trying to hook up the tenvis i lost 10x that much in life hours.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Christina Ialongo
Reviews.Content: I wish I had read the other 1-star reviews prior to purchasing this item. I experienced the same problems as many - using a Mac couldn't connect to the camera and realized too late that it doesn't connect to a n router. Crazy when n's have been out for years, no idea why it wouldn't support that. Also the company is based in China with bad translations on the manual and the website. You might get lucky and have it work for you, but you might not. Considering the price might not be a bad gamble, just didn't work out for me.Update:After posting this review I was contacted by a company rep who tried to help me fix the problems I was having. He wasn't ultimately able to do so, and I returned the camera, but I wanted to share this info because I truly appreciated that they listened and tried. As a result I'm upgrading from 1 star to 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: THis is a Great camera, for a great price!
Reviews.Author: David Ashton
Reviews.Content: THis is a Great camera, for a great price! I ordered this camera for security for my shop. I received it very fast, and it works great. This is a great product, witch adds a good piece of mind that my shop will be safe. It has a clear picture, and it is wireless, except the power cord, whice is understandable, so I don't have to keep changing batteries. Thanks again for this great product.

Reviews.Title: configurable wireless camera TENVIS JPT3815W Wireless IP Pan/Tilt/ Night Vision Internet
Reviews.Author: Javier Simancas
Reviews.Content: is an exceptional camera equipment can be monitored with android system, its comuniccion is via wifi to send alarms via email and photos capture the moment recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love this product!
Reviews.Author: foodstylist
Reviews.Content: I live in a sober home and at times you cannot trust tenants.  I'm an electronic's lover and have many high priced items in my room.  Since there are no locks on the inside bedroom doors I got worried that some things may walk out the door so I bought the camera.  It has since paid for itself since I caught a resident trying to walk out with my 42" Vizio television.  It reported him to my I-Phone and the individual is now in jail and also no longer a resident.  It's clear and the sound was fantastic.  I reccomend this product to anyone that likes there expensive toys.

Reviews.Title: For the price not bad
Reviews.Author: Kevin E. Waller
Reviews.Content: Where to start....first let me say for the price the camera is a decent product. However, I am pretty technically savvy and I had problems understanding how to set it up because the instructions are poorly written and confusing. Your best bet is to search the web for other users and get the help you need from them. Much easier to understand. I would suggest this company hire a qualified english speaking technician to write their instruction because they miss the mark.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Donald Mueller
Reviews.Content: I wanted to set up a webcam system for my dog daycare.  I tries wired cameras ansd did not get the quality I wanted.  I tried the TENVIS wireless and was amazed at the quality.  I sets up easily.  The only problem i had was with the circuity on my router, which is actually a router .  My customers now can log in and watch their dogs play.  Will be adding more cameras. Can't beat the quality or the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Juan Pablo Malosetti
Reviews.Content: Good quality, it was a bit difficult to setup and it works fine. I highly recommend this camera for survillance.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase on Amazon!
Reviews.Author: LISA
Reviews.Content: I have been purchasing on Amazon for years and have a another versions of this Tenvis Cam that I really like. But this one is awesome. The product itself is well made and feels much higher quality than my last Tenvis Cam min315. I have both installed on the a free android app and LOVE IT! But this JPT3815W is the best quality picture, has good audio and excellent panning abilities. My only regret was that I didn't get this one instead of my Tenvis min315 too.The new installation wizard is the best one yet. I have 2 Linksys wireless cam paid $89 each while one does not work and the one well can't compare to a Tenvis set up or quality.Thank you for giving me peace of mind when I am away from home. Everyone that has viewed my cams are blown away that this can be DIY! If you can set up your wireless laptop, tablet you can do this one.The little cam boots up pans around like hello I am ready to go. All around fantastic product I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Best Controllable IP Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: rtloeffler
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, i set it up in about 20 minutes then attached it to the wall. I can now view the camera on my TV, Computer, Tablet and phone. I can also view the feed and control it when im away from the house. Nightvision is amazing and the quality of the image is great. This is a great product and i feel more secure with it installed. I will probably buy at least 1-2 more cameras to cover more locations in my house.

Reviews.Title: Poor or no tech support
Reviews.Author: stanwill2
Reviews.Content: Hard time getting it set, no tech support, so I returned the camera.  Please do not waste your time or money.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Karabinos
Reviews.Content: This is a good, inexpensive camera.  It takes some skill to set up, but once it is, it works well.  Tenvis responds quickly to customer service email questions.  Colors are a little washed out, but this is common for cameras at this price range.  Email alerts are too sensitive, but they are promising firmware updates to eventually fix that.  For the price, it's a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great little IP Camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific little indoor IP webcam for the money. Installation was easy--you just connect it to your router first with a CAT5 cable, and the software will guide you through the process of establishing a wired connection, then a wireless connection, and finally an Internet connection (using port forwarding from the Tenvis web site). That last feat means you can access your video from any Internet device: laptops, iPads, smartphones, etc. Cool! This is much more than one of those little USB webcams. It's actually a little wi-fi webserver that you can remotely control!To achieve the night vision, these cameras must be sensitive to the infrared wavelengths (by removing the IR filter). That introduces many surprises. For example, some daylight colors appear a little goofy (e.g., blue-gray trees). And while you can see people and objects near the camera that are within reach of the LED lighting at night, realize that in infrared, everything will essentially be black and white, with warm, reflective things appearing bright, and cool, absorptive things appearing dark. It's tempting to place the camera near a window (great during the day!), but don't expect to see through the glass at night--all you'll see is the reflection of the bright infrared LEDs.The pan tilt feature really works well. Pan is almost a full 360. However, the tilt (up/down) motion is mostly "Up." If your main interest is looking down (to see your pets or little children, for example), your best bet is to mount the camera inverted (using included brackets) and choose the "vertical flip" option in the camera setup.Note that you can turn off the blinking green LED using the web page configuration, making it pretty stealthy. Few people will notice it sitting on the bookshelf, doing its thing! Speaking of web page, did I say it was a mini-web server? There must be at least a hundred configuration settings and parameters under your control, via its "settings" web pages. Very geeky, if you're into that sort of thing.The wi-fi feature allows you to locate the camera anywhere within range of your home wi-fi router. All you need is an electric outlet to plug in the power supply. Hint: replacing the provided antenna (SMA connector--nice!) with a high-gain wifi antenna will greatly extend how far away from the router you can place the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on a remote access internet surveillance camera!
Reviews.Author: ANDREW HOLMBECK
Reviews.Content: Great price for a quality product. Easy to set up and easy to use.Works fantastic! remote control and monitoring from my cell phone.I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: TENVIS wifi camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I found the TENVIS Wireless IP Camera was very easy to install and set up.  I am able to view my area from any computer and my SAMSUNG Tab 2 7.0 any where that i am able to access the internet.  I ahve found the picture very clear and the pan/tilt is very easy to use remotely.  I would recommend this camera tfor anyones use.

Reviews.Title: Great Survillane Camera!
Reviews.Author: B. Shiue
Reviews.Content: Received my order quickly. At first I was worry it will take me a while to figure out how to make it work with my home network. To my surprise, the instruction included with the camera is very easy to follow, and I completed the setup in no time. Now I can see how my dog is doing while I am away from home. I will definitely recommend this product to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Eddy
Reviews.Content: i watch my puppy pug with this camera, great cam for the price, doing its job, works with iphone. has a really good quality with night vision.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: I had some doubts which IP camera to buy because there are many offers witch different prices. But finally I found the best camera for the best price that is TENVIS Wireless IP Camera.When I received my IP camera it was easy to install it and use it for the first time with out specially it knoledges. That's why I liked it.I recommend this product to the persons who need to know how is your family specially when they are far and away from you.

Reviews.Title: A Product that Works great right out of the box !
Reviews.Author: wtahelptech
Reviews.Content: It's so nice to get a product that actually works right out of the box from a seller that that cares about what they sell.This is the 3rd one of these camera's I have purchased in the last 2 years and they just keep getting better. Build quality is better, picture quality better and software is better. I have been installing CCTV Systems for retailers since 2003 and choose these for my home because they simply work and are very reasonable. They compare very well with many of the systems and cameras that cost $1000's, I can confidently say that if I put you in front of a screen with the Tenvis cameras and Bosches or Sonys side by side with camera info hidden you couldn't tell the difference and in some cases the Tenvis video would be even better.The only slight caution I have is that you should use some care installing them ie don't bounce them off the floor they are not quite that physically robust - but at a price that is so low I can drop a couple and still buy 23 replacements for the cost of one Bosche.As a vendor GyroTek has done a great job, I received a camera with the wire on the power supply damaged due to improper packing at the factory , a quick chat session with Amazon and I received credit and purchased a new wall wart for it next day.

Reviews.Title: so so
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I bought this tenvis product after our truck was broken into and a streak of vandalism has occurred on our street. I had to have a church friend install this product, a little to complicated for me. The camera is pretty cool when it works. I have it set on my trucks in the driveway.  Well after a while it pans up and stays like that until I pan it down again. It emails pictures sometimes. Whats wrong with this thing? Oh one more thing, the night vision is horrible! !

Reviews.Title: camera works great
Reviews.Author: C. Farley
Reviews.Content: My only problem here is getting the image on my android -  I can get it on fine when I'm in my home but when I go to work the camera can not be contacted.  Verizon phone and maybe their network is just too slow, don't know but when I'm in range of my home wireless it works great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: michael mariani
Reviews.Content: What Can I say, Tenvis camera's are definitely your best bang for your buck!! Pan tilt and remote viewing and for a fraction of the cost of big name brands. was as described and was here on the date they had said!! I Will definitely do business again with seller!

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: A. Bruemmer
Reviews.Content: Not working out of the box.  Little green light would not even turn on with the power supply provided.  Trying different 5v I have and green light on but wireless LAN not working.  Tried 3 different cables in two routers and two computers.  Sending back.  Don't get too many duds from Amazon but this was one.

Reviews.Title: Setup is tough and performance just as pr
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: While this may setup easily if your home network is very simple, it is not smooth when more than one switch/router is present.  Even when setup the video/audio feed often locks up and the view when the IR transmitters are on is terrible.  I wouldn't purchase this or any of the "clone" devices again.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: JudgeX
Reviews.Content: This camera is offered at the right price.  Around $50 for everything you need to watch an area around your house or even outside of it (through a window).Pros:The priceMounting bracket that comes with it is actually rather good and flexibleEase of installation and setup (though I did have to temporarily plug it in to my router before wireless would work).Picture and video quality are exactly what I would expect for a $50 wireless IP camera - moderate at best.  I list this as a pro because it's realistic quality at the price.Works fairly well with iSpy64 - a free camera monitoring app, and I'm pretty sure it would work fine with zoneminder for you linux guys out there.Cons:No IR toggle - this means that if you mount it looking through a window, when it gets dark, you will probably just see glare -tip: Mount the lens extremely close to the glass, and put something black behind the camera to reduce glare -tip #2: buy some IR illuminators and cover the ones on the camera with something thick... they are cheap and can produce a more appropriate light field and avoid the glare issue.Sound is tricky to figure out - works fine in IE.Overall, I'm quite happy with this purchase and would buy again - especially if I figure out how to get access to the microphone/speakers without IE.

Reviews.Title: Now I can watch my dog
Reviews.Author: EdNope "Eddie13"
Reviews.Content: The Tenvis was fairly easy to install as long as you have a good idea about setting up/configuring networks, ports, etc.I can't find an App that works on my iPhone 5, so I just use the IP Address to watch my dog when I'm not home.  There is an App for Android users that works well.

Reviews.Title: WIFI couldn't be detected
Reviews.Author: Luckydaisy04
Reviews.Content: I contacted support by email and they tried to help me.  He finally said that the camera I got might be defective and that I should request a replacement. I rate customer service 5 stars for prompt service, & quality of help, but the product itself I couldn't understand. I didn't like that the only help was out of china, so I had to wait a day between emails. We are 12 hours difference. I ended up returning the camera after trying to work with support for over a week.  I would've kept trying, but if I was going to return the camera I only had one more night if I were to receive a refund.My advice, only get this if you understand techy lingo. The camera wasn't bad when connected by Ethernet cord. But I didn't want to buy an Ethernet cord long enough to reach my baby's room.I gave it only one star based on my experience, the product itself seemed functional. You may have to change encryptions with your router, which my Internet company would not help me with unless I paid a fee.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: ME
Reviews.Content: I just moved into a more urban area and seeing as how I own firearms, I wanted to make sure I could keep an eye on the place.  I'm a decent way through the setup; I can view it wirelessly from my laptop while I'm on the house internet but I haven't yet set up the remote viewing.Picture quality is great and I'm really impressed by the night vision  The rotating lens is great because it allows me to watch the front door, the stairway, the side door, and the rear windows all from one location.  Setup was pretty easy and the instructions were better than I expected.  Expect to have a couple of problems, then realize it was your own fault for not reading the directions fully.  I'm not very skilled computerwise, so I'm happy that the setup is doing as well as it is.The features are really great; aside from the pan/tilt, nightvision, and picture quality, theres an alarm setup (which I have yet to figure out) that gives allows you to put the camera in 'armed' mode at a standard time/day and have it do a handful of stuff like record and email the video, make a noise, send alerts, etc.The reasons I did not give it 5 stars:-Directions cover setup, but not the more advance stuff like the alarm mode.  There might be a user manual, but I haven't found it yet.-camera viewing screen sometimes has issues like the screen freezes when I try to move it, I refresh and it's a different angle.Overall, it's a great camera and I don't think you're going to find a better one for the same quality and features.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Five4Fighting
Reviews.Content: Got this set up very easily using the web-based software. Resolution is pretty good, and I am impressed with the IR night vision. The camera will light up a 20x20 room at night with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with this camera system and company.
Reviews.Author: DKS
Reviews.Content: Purchased 2 of these cameras, definitely not happy with what I received.  Cameras seemed like good quality, but found that the two cameras purchased from the same place had different firmware versions. When I went to the company website to get the firmware updates, the page was unavailable.  The instructions were very vague, and the software that came with the cameras were not user friendly.  After several hours of setting up 2 cameras, and testing...the wireless feature of the cameras did not work.  I was able to use them locally over ethernet, but not over wifi.  When I tested the cameras from off premises, the cameras would not come up.  The whole reason for getting them was to watch over my home when we were away, and it could not even deliver that.  Returned these cameras and paid more for the name brand cameras.  You truly get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great webcam for Home Surveillance
Reviews.Author: jblah
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras to test out to see if I can create a home security system. My overall experience with these cameras have been very good so far. They seem to do exactly what I want. I have been able to set up the cameras on my network, view and control them over the internet, and view and control them via a tablet. All of these have been successful. These work perfectly. the picture quality isn't the greatest but then again this is a sub-$50 wireless webcam and i knew they weren't 720p upon purchase. infact i liked it so much i just purchased a 3rd one!Here are some more details about how I set it up for those who might be having some problems.I followed the instructions  from the guide and went through the IP Camera Wizard for both of the cameras. I was able to get them set up and working correctly on my internal network within about 15 - 20 mins. I also set up multi-cam view within one of the camera's internal IP address. This is helpful because I did not want to expose more than 1 location externally.Next i wanted to set up access outside of my network. This is what took me several hours to figure out. The problem is not necessarily the camera. The problem is more than likely going to be your router and your ability to forward a port. My setup is a modem (not a modem/router) and a medialink 300N wireless router (great router and awesome support btw). So i did not have to worry about forwarding my ports via 2 routers..just the media link. I would recommend that individuals connect the wireless webcam to their modem/router rather than using a secondary router if that is your setup.I had to call medialink and get their assistance in setting up port forwarding. You can narrow down the issue to port forwarding if you are unable to go to your IP address with the port number that you have set up with you camera (i.e. go to your IP xx.xxx.xxx.xx:cameraport. There is also a chance that you might not be able to access your webcam from within your network. basically this is called hairpining meaning you are trying to go to the internet from your local network only to connect back to your local network. So sometimes, if you have the port forwarding correct and you try to connect from an external network it will work but connecting from your home network will not work. In order to get around this and connect internally you need to set up a DHCP client list on your router with the mac address of the camera (you can get this from the IP camera wizard).In addition to port forwarding, you should also set up a DMZ host on your router and point it to one of your camera. When i did port forwarding only, the external connection did not seem to work. I'm thinking that there might be additional ports that are needed for the camera to work rather than just that one port that we are providing it. Will keep this review updated with my experiences.Update: After having this camera for a few days i've found a few flaws (not many!). 1) the power cord is VERY VERY small. it won't even cover the length of a window. 2) the automated motion sensor is triggered by shadows. so if the sun comes out it will trigger the sensor. Same with if it gets cloudy. So you get a lot of false positive unless you are in a completely dark room. 3) The size of the webcam makes it hard to make it conspicuous, this is not something you can use for a "hidden" webcam.the night sensors is awesome! no false positives at night.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Seelos
Reviews.Content: Just unpackaged the camera and wanted to give it a go setting it up.. Instruction pamphlet is in english and all you gotta do is follow its steps... Since camera was setup wired it was up and running after I finished setup, viewing program is easy to use on pc and worked on my phone no issues with the app i use. The only thing I had a short problem with was wifi.. When going through initial setup it saw the wifi but would not connect following the steps in instructions.. I had to open up the camera viewer and go into the settings there which are the settings on the camera itself, updated wifi info there and wifi is up and running... I tried the 2 way audio from my phone and it seems to be working i hear noise from where the camera is and if i talk into it it comes out that tiny little speaker.. Don't expect perfect clarity in audio... I was initially thinking of getting one of those more expensive Foscam units but this one seems to do it's job at a lower price PTZ also works fine and you can adjust speed settings through camera login through website.. I suggest going over all of your settings once logged into the camera from the viewing app.. I used Chrome and didn't need any plugins installed like on IE. My only concern is the life of the camera.. I had purchased 2 other wireless cameras from a local electronics store and they died within a few months and those cost twice as much as this one. Overall it seems like a great little unit and I will be buying more if the life is longer then the others I had... I would definitely recommend it as a portable wifi camera you can drop anywhere like the kids room or outside pool to be able to view the area with the PTZ settings..

Reviews.Title: Great IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Bill English "Bill (Pick this one!)"
Reviews.Content: I mounted this IP camera in our nursery (10' x 12' room) and it works wonderfully. The night-vision is very well lit by the IR LEDs built into the camera, the pan/tilt functions work well, and it was easy to set up. I would highly recommend this wireless IP camera to anyone looking for a low-budget solution for close-range surveillance.

Reviews.Title: No what I expected.
Reviews.Author: garyznola
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these expecting that they were the same as a couple of Hootoos that I purchased before.  Unfortunately I was mistaken.  They work well enough, but they keep losing the wifi connection and rebooting themselves.  The night vision is not even half as good as the Hootoos, and the daytime picture while pretty clear is washed out.  The sensitivity settings doesn't seem to make much of a difference as I changed them I was still receiving the same volume of emails with nothing visible to trigger the alert as I was a higher settings, but I guess I should be thankful that the emails even worked since I haven't had much success with that on other camera brands.  I may be a little harsh in my rating as when they are working properly these are not bad cameras for the price, but there are too many little quirks for my taste however to rate them any higher than I did.

Reviews.Title: Amazing IP cam for the price!
Reviews.Author: Brett M
Reviews.Content: I have spent over $300 for IP cams before. This camera has so far, performed just as well as the more expensive ones. This ip cam has no internal storage but is a simple design that shares the same shell for all models. 2 way audio makes for a nice additional feature. I currently have the camera set up in wireless mode and it monitors my living room and kitchen. The camera runs at fast speeds and was controlled by my WP8 cell with no problem. All in all considering this is intended to monitor my home when I am gone on extended vacation to give me peice of mind, I would and probably will buy another. Great product!

Reviews.Title: below par
Reviews.Author: Mr. "Snazzy Dresser"
Reviews.Content: Great price and easy set up was overshadowed by the malfunctions. I set up the motion detection alarm to send an email should something moves by my front door. I got 500 emails in less than 2 days with pictures of my wall with no movement. Incredibly annoying. The camera also has a tendency to randomly turn towards the ceiling

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: qinderigging
Reviews.Content: easy to set up,  working great with my samsung phone. I love it!!! I think I made the best chioce.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the money!
Reviews.Author: Fegarex
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what to expect for the money but it works great. Fairly easy to set up if you know a bit about routers. The alarm function/e-mailing photos is impressive too!My network has several DVRs and cameras on it so it makes set up slower but for most the wizard will make short work of set up.It's clear enough and the tilt/pan works fine too.I may order another!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value/quality
Reviews.Author: Xi Xie
Reviews.Content: Item delivered on time. The Hardware worked perfectly. Software installation (XP platform) required a little tinckering but not bad at all - The only thing being that if your router/AP is not on their list, you'll need to setup the port forwarding yourself. The proces is fairly easy though.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, good, and fairly easy to set up
Reviews.Author: HH_User
Reviews.Content: it is a good ip camera. Easy set up. Upgrade firmware from 1.7.17 to 1.7.19 with no problem. Don't need to install any software besides plugin for IE. Just go to IP address and port 81 to watch and view clear image. love it.

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: Emily T.
Reviews.Content: will definitely buy another one. I love the function on it. Works great on mac too on the 2013 model.

Reviews.Title: Excellent and very simple to install
Reviews.Author: nh786
Reviews.Content: Does the job at half the price of what others are asking. Very satisfied with the product and hope to add more

Reviews.Title: Weak signal, no technical support if you needed one.
Reviews.Author: thanhxuan nguyen
Reviews.Content: Pros: reasonable price, works like a Foscam with excellent night vision.Cons: weak signal, "Alarm Service Setting" seems not working properly, and no technical support.I resorted to buying a Foscam which is a little bit more expensive but customer service is excellent.Tips for those who have problem with "Remote View" of the IP camera: If you're with Comcast, you might have problem with Internet view though your local view is OK, which means as long as you are in the same network with your IP camera.  Call Comcast and request for a switch to "Bridge mode" then it will work beautifully.  If you could talk Comcast into doing this without having to sign up for their "Signature Support", you're a genius! Good luck and enjoy your IP cam.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Good!
Reviews.Author: GT
Reviews.Content: Very pleased, especially at this price point.The two way audio lags a bit after its been open a minute, but thats not really its main function. As far as using PTZ over an iPhone app it works very well. IR is pretty decent too!

Reviews.Title: Impressive features but setup was a challenge - now drops wireless connection
Reviews.Author: Scomo "scomo"
Reviews.Content: Update on previous review below - now that I've had it running for several months, I can't recommend this wireless security camera.  Every few days the camera drops the wireless connection and it must be powered off/on to re-boot and re-establish the connection.  If I am away from home and the wireless connection drops, I no longer receive email pics when the camera senses motion nor can I get a live feed via my iphone.  The camera can't be re-booted remotely.  This problem pretty much renders it ineffective as a security camera.  After reading Tenvis' technical support forum, this appears to be a chronic problem with this camera.Original review - This is my first review of any product.  I wanted to set up a home security camera so I could get email alarms with snapshots and access live video from my smartphone.  I had no experience setting up an IP camera and had to try to follow the instructions in the user manual.  I downloaded the setup app from the Tenvis website and used the wizard to do the configuration.  I ran into some issues because the "one button setup" didn't work correctly and the default gateway had the wrong IP address.  I would recommend getting your network information from your network connection details from your computer's control panel network screens and doing the manual setup.  You also need to first configure the camera with a network cable attached and then set up the wireless connection.  To access the camera over the Internet, you have to set up port forwarding on your router.  I had never done this,  but Tenvis had instructions for setting port forwarding up on my particular router on their support page and it was pretty straightforward.  Tenvis provides a built-in DDNS service which give you a url that points to your global IP address.  I had a problem trying to setup the email alerts using a hotmail account as the sender.  I used a gmail account instead and it worked without issues.  It took me several hours to get the setup corrected and working (because I had made several errors), but once set up correctly, it works great.  It is pretty amazing technology for only $44.00.

Reviews.Title: very good for the price, not bad at all!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: i like it, because it is easy to setup. just like description. it has chinese too. good for ipad, IE, firefox. the best i have seen so far out of the 4 different ip camera that i have

Reviews.Title: Setup is tricky, but otherwise a great value
Reviews.Author: Marc Mest
Reviews.Content: I had some issues with wireless network setup, but wired network was easy.  (I had to upgrade the firmware ).Otherwise this camera was lower priced than most on the market and works well.  The image quality is about what I expect from a security camera at this price. ( I have seen security video from the higher end cameras and it is not much better ).You have to set your expectations low when it comes to image quality. comparing this against a webcam or digial camera image quality is not correct.. Security cameras are designed to compress the video because the timespan of a recording is a day at a time.

Reviews.Title: Terrible WiFi Setup! But pretty good camera with nice picture quality
Reviews.Author: Flea
Reviews.Content: I had so many obstacles to jump over just to get it to work, and I still couldn't get it link to my WiFi for wireless use. The software is pretty poorly laid out, making it hard to find answers to my troubleshooting problems, and i spent most of my afternoon fiddling with the thing. I currently have it set up with the ethernet cable. A long, LONG, ethernet cable. Which stinks because now i have wires running through the house. I have no idea how the audio works either. But what does indeed work, works nicely, and the video quality is nice and its cool to have access on my mobile units.

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: Rondo
Reviews.Content: Seems kinda poorly built. Couldn't use it with my Verizon MiFi router as the router is not capable of port forwarding from the Internet to this device because of the way Verizon has built it's wifi network.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey L. Morgan "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: So I was having some problems getting this to work. My Modem was blocking my setup on my router. I called and got a recording to leave a message. At first I was a little concerned I would not get help with this. Within a couple of hours Dave called me back to set up a time that would work for both of us. He called me back at the set time and had everything working shortly. Plus he spoke calm, clear english, he was located in New Mexico. Very satisfied, works fantastic on my tablet, android phone and laptop. Nothing else to buy, all programs and apps are free!

Reviews.Title: Slight pain to setup, but good camera
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: Like the title says, it was a bit of a pain to set this camera up, but afterwards it is very easy to use, even for those who aren't tech-savvy.

Reviews.Title: Very good IP camera. Easy to set up and configure.
Reviews.Author: Timmy P.
Reviews.Content: Overall, everything on the IP cam is good. Video quality is good. Setup is easy. Night vision is good. I've configured it to view over the internet. This was somewhat complex even for an IT person like me. I was able to view the live video feed over my iPhone within 15 minutes. For the novices out there, there's a good chance you wont be able to configure this without help.The only down side to this IP cam is the audio. You can barely hear the audio when it's streamed. When you attempt to talk over (send audio to cam), the speaker screeches sometimes and the words in unrecognizable at times. Dont expect anyone to understand what you're saying if you attempt to talk to them.

Reviews.Title: work but not great
Reviews.Author: OnlineShopper
Reviews.Content: I bought this in Setp 2012, the camera image quality is good,  the sensor alarm is work good too. The only thing that I could never get it to work is the DDNS service setting. That mean, I never could use this camera when I am away from home. One more thing there is no software CD including in the box, you have to download it from Tenvis website.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis JPT3815W Great product. Purchasing another one. Nuff Said!
Reviews.Author: Jim Yount
Reviews.Content: I received the Tenvis JPT3815W IP Camera as a gift from my son. We both have one and have had no issues with the cameras. I am going to purchase an additional one for use at home. I think it fully meets my expectations for the price paid.Sure, I would like Zoom, but have no real regrets on this camera. One minor issue is the length of the power cord. There is a power cable extender available on Ebay and possibly on Amazon if needed. It runs about $10, or you can use an extension cord like I did.It does have 2-way audio, but if you wanted to talk to scare away someone or to let them know you were monitoring them, you will really need to plug in an external speaker as the internal one is not nearly loud enough. I got this for the video function so that doesn't bother me that much.I monitor the camera from my Android phone and that works great. The pan and tilt are very acceptable and the night vision also.Finally, I would not hesitate to purchase an additional camera and would highly recommend this camera to friends.

Reviews.Title: Like the product - could have been easier to setup
Reviews.Author: Joel D. McLaughlin "Joel McLaughlin"
Reviews.Content: I like this item very much - we use it to watch our dogs when we leave home to ensure they are safe and not causing any problems.  However, I think the setup could have been a little bit easier - we ran in to some problems trying to connect the camera to the internet - and our cisco router wasn't an option to choose when setting up the web based video - however; we got it working eventually.  Happy with the product though and the wireless feature is great for people who don't want to setup an elaborate and wired security system.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: pha73
Reviews.Content: Even though product was delivered late (by 2 days), everything turned out ok after set-up. Set-up was 1-2-3..connected power and ethernet cable to router..entered router security info (always WPA2)..assigned a port and static IP address to camera, enabled UPnP, and was good to go..no port forwarding necessary. Just had to then configure email alert and alarm service settings..and everything works beautifully. Then disconnect ethernet cable and you're wireless, and can plug the camera into any outlet around your house or apartment. Image quality is very good for the price you're paying..but have to realize this is not a license-plate reader. Lens can be manually focused if necessary, and pan and tilt gives you increased function and versatility. The only negative is that the IR LED'S cannot be turned off (actually a big negative), so if you want to point this out a window at nighttime, you're going to have to carefully cover the LED'S while leaving the photo-sensor exposed..not too hard if you're patient. I have not used the 2-way audio yet. I can see anything the camera sees from anywhere I have internet access by putting my IP address and port number in the address bar of any browser, and entering password setup (remember to always change from default). Gave 5 stars in spite of IR issue because really, this is a lot of camera for 60 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Some functions are not working
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Nagamura
Reviews.Content: Some function show in the picture,for example, the preset 1,2,3.....not even work. If you are a serious user, I will not recommemd this one. The software is not even completed.  The should not sell anything that is still under developing.  pay $2, 3 or more to buy another one!

Reviews.Title: Very nice at a great price.
Reviews.Author: dan2
Reviews.Content: I have purchased several of these IP camera in the past for both my business and home.  I was a little concerned when I saw the price because I have paid 5 times as much in the past and had received less.  You cannot beat this unit for the price.  It has everything you need.  I was very happy with the unit.  As with everything you buy .. things may work a little different when it come to hooking it up.  It went very smoothly with me ..  I have had problems with my other in the past going off and on line.

Reviews.Title: IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, it is easy to setup and has all features of more expensive cameras.  Also can be viewed on a mobile device.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Apichardo
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the product. The instructions are a little strange though the translation appears to be made from Chinese to English. The product was easy to use after you read the instructions a couple of times

Reviews.Title: Convienience
Reviews.Author: Kai
Reviews.Content: A small packaged LED based Wifi night vision camera. About the same thing as it says in the description. Good for home security and other similar applications.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis JPT3815W CMOS
Reviews.Author: Nhung
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera that works really well for the price you pay for it. Also works really well at night too. Setup was pretty easy and took no time at all to breeze through, but wish instruction manual was better written. For non-advanced users would have trouble getting it to work the way they wanted it to.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: Johngratt
Reviews.Content: I am very happy to report that this is a great buy. The picture quality is better than I expected in a camera of this price range. I can monitor remotely on my phone with pan and tilt. I have it working with my home automation program and that is more than I can say for my $ 2,000.00 dvr system. If it had zoom it would be the best at three times the price.

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: Leon
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup easy to use but software not so good. ........................good shipment good seller.....when setup you must know a little bit about web setup too.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis JPT3815w IP Camera
Reviews.Author: gstenslien
Reviews.Content: I find the camera works very well. The setup was not too complicated. It has a good quality picture, and the pan and tilt are a nice feature. The PC Web Interface works well. However, after trying the Android Software on several smartphones, I find it only works sporadically.

Reviews.Title: Good camera with pan/tilt/infrared, Great for price
Reviews.Author: Handyman
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera recently to see if it would serve the purpose of allowing me to monitor the house on my phone while I was away.  For the price, this camera packs a lot of punch.  Picture is good and so is the night vision.  You will see the LEDs glow as the ambient light gets darker.  Night is B&W;, but you will be able to see colors of objects illuminated by regular light while the infrared mode is active(including any backlit monitors/devices with color).You can set the camera to email you at user-selectable thresholds and intervals when motion is detected.  I had problems with getting it to interact with my email account, though (still working on that and will update).Camera also has audio (2-way) and it works pretty well.  I was impressed by the volume of the sound coming out of the camera's speaker, and the sensitivity of the mic.  However, I could only access this feature via Internet Explorer.  It is not available in the mobile app (iPhone tested) or in FireFox.  Hopefully, this feature will be available soon.  You won't want to test the camera's audio in the same room as the PC you are monitoring it from as you will get mic feedback.Pan & tilt is a very nifty feature if you're wanting to get a broad view of things.  But if you set it upright on a table (as displayed in the ad picture), it won't point downwards past the middle.  So if you can't place it in that position too high off the floor.  However, you could use the included mounting bracket and screws to mount it "upside down" and get a great view about 180 degrees or so l/r and up/down axes.The only problem I had (other than the email) was that the power supply prongs sparked quite a bit the first few times I plugged/unplugged it.  It's not doing that anymore, so to be fair, it might have been one of the outlets I was using at first.All in all, this is a great buy.  The picture quality is better than what I expected in a camera of this price range.  I can monitor remotely on my phone.  Now, all I need to do is to get the email notifications working.It's amazing all this can be configured using the camera's built-in "web server."

Reviews.Title: Tenvis wifi camera
Reviews.Author: E. Maalouf "Sacramento, CA"
Reviews.Content: Frankly, the quality of this camera surprised me. I didn't expect it to be as sharp, crisp and detailed for the price.Set up was straight forward and easy. Download the SW from Tenvis and install on your PC (do that instead of using the CD version that comes with it), connect the camera via a cable to your router (cable included) then turn the camera on.The SW will find it. Click on the found camera, a browser window will open with the video. Select "settings" from a drop down menu and enter desired, IP, motion detection, wireless mode etc...I put my camera in our cat enclosure in the backyard to keep an eye on them when they're sunning themselves. I access it via my Iphone app (camviewer).Done. That easy. Good quality. Very good price.I plan to buy a couple more to set up around the house to check in while on road trips/vacations.

Reviews.Title: Best Affordable Camera!
Reviews.Author: read_icculus
Reviews.Content: this camera does everything the high priced ones do for 1/3 of the price! I love the tenvis smart phone app that i can check my cameras from anywhere anytime. The set up does get a little technical, but I had my son help me with entering the ports into the router & he is 12 years old so I guess anyone who knows anything about computers, routers & ports can set it up! I would definatly recommend this product to other consumers & have already bought another one for myself/.

Reviews.Title: This camera is a great deal for what it's selling for.
Reviews.Author: AZ
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great deal for what it's selling for. I originally just purchased one camera to test out. I can say that I definately agree with the other reviews. Good color, nice clarity, good at night and during the day. Since ordering the first camera I have ordered another one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!
Reviews.Author: sailor
Reviews.Content: With researching quite number of similar cameras and mixed reviews, I decided to try this one, but I wasn't sure what to get.After I received it then started setting it up, I really like it.It has all the features I expected. The instructions in a cd was simply to follow. IP and Wifi Setup are done easily with its small software. The picture is clear in light or darker places. I have impressed with the camera.

Reviews.Title: As Good As It Gets
Reviews.Author: Hutch
Reviews.Content: I purchased a more $$$ brand camera first. Then bought this one (Tenvis) only to find that it operates as good if not better than the other brand. Setup is the same as all other IP based cameras. It helps to have some network knowledge.I will be buying another Tenvis IP camera.Thanks,

Reviews.Title: Terrible product.
Reviews.Author: Shannon J.
Reviews.Content: This thing was a nightmare to set up - after investing another hundred dollars into a new modem to use with it and several hours on the phone with tech support we still couldn't get it to work wirelessly. So, we could watch it while a computer was connected to it... great. Also, even while connected the image quality was terrible - during the day, even!Definitely a purchase that I regret.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Donald L. Schultz
Reviews.Content: I have about 10 of these on a 14 cam set up using Blue Iris.  I have tried almost every brand in this price range and for my money, this one is the best in this very low end range although almost all of them are very similar.  The camera functions well and are easy to set up if you know what your are doing.  This camera is consistently the lowest price and best in the $50 range.

Reviews.Title: Super Camera - by Steve 3/24/14
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to monitor our dogs when they are in a fenced back yard.  This camera's pan/tilt feature really makes if easy.  Very easy to install (15 minutes).  Great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: george welch
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera . It is very east to install and wouldtell everyone to try it ! also has a very good picture .  and comes with everythingin the box that you need to install it .

Reviews.Title: Already bought two of them, and they work perfectly
Reviews.Author: Melissa Carmona
Reviews.Content: I have already bought two of these, one of them I sen to my dad who lives outside of the country, and they both work great. At first it was really confusing with the whole port forwarding thing, but I got someone else to set it up for me. I am able to access the camera from everywhere.It hasn't given me any problems whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Excellent IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Gary Wayne Mays
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent ip camera! Will probably purchase another one but the next one will be an outdoor model.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera works exactly as advertised.  Had a little bit of trouble setting it up with my router, but the tutorials walked me through the process very well and it was up and running in about 30 minutes.  Strongly recommend.

Reviews.Title: well worth the money to check on the house
Reviews.Author: j
Reviews.Content: this unit works really good, it has allowed me to be able to be able to check on my house while I am away and see what my dog is up to. it has given me a good piece of mind that while I travel a lot my house is in okay standings. well worth the money. yes there are better quality pictures out there but this will not disappoint you.the tricky part can be port forwarding so you can view it from your phone but that is not to complicated and set up is otherwise really easy

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Felix
Reviews.Content: Great Product! this TENVIS JPT3815W Wireless IP Pan/Tilt/ Night Vision Internet Surveillance Camera is one of the best surveillance camera.

Reviews.Title: Michelle Tenvis
Reviews.Author: Michelle Carter
Reviews.Content: Works great! Just bought another one.. It's nice being able to check on my home any time I am away

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA, EASY TO SET UP!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THIS CAMERA BASED ON OTHER REVIEWS. IT WAS AS EASY TO SET UP AS DESCRIBED. I HAVENT TESTED OUT THE PORT FORWARDING YET, BUT PLAN TO DO SO. THIS IS MY SECOND AND PLAN ON GETTING A THIRD.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly for what I wanted
Reviews.Author: J. Sauce
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a wireless camera to use as a puppy cam.  For my uses, the product is exactly what I was looking for. The resolution is good, nitevision (at least at the short range I need) is great, and there are quite a few apps, both from the manufacturer, and third party for our android and iphones so we can keep an eye on things.  I'd absolutely buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for...
Reviews.Author: fabio cardoso
Reviews.Content: I did search for a lot of cameras and end up getting the best. TENVIS JPT3815W Wireless IP Pan/Tilt/ Night Vision was easy to install and access and the picture quality is excellent. I am very satisfied and if anybody ask me I definitely recommend it. Ps: their costumer service is in china so if you ever need them for us here will be from Sunday to Thursday from 9:00 pm to 5:00 Am.

Reviews.Title: Great price, works as expected even at a distance from wifi
Reviews.Author: S. Stokesbary
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price for this PTZ camera. It was easy to set up (I've set up a couple of other brands, so that probably made it easier). We are using this to monitor inside a building that is at least 150' away from our wifi router that is in our home. It goes through a few walls (we have a booster). It sometimes takes a bit longer to connect than the cameras that are closer to the house. We actually have another one of these cameras inside an insulated dog house in the same building. When I put it in there, I never thought it would work. But it did. I have no wifi signal on my phone in this building, yet the camera can connect. Impressive for a $45 camera. Android apps for IP cameras seem to work better than iPhone, but that is a phone app issue, not a camera issue.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Mr. Ganja
Reviews.Content: Beats running to the window when I hear a car. Let's me know when the police are coming well in advance.

Reviews.Title: great product, no negatives after 6+ months of use.
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: Awesome alternative to foscam. I haven't used the other, but this tenvis model works exactly as advertised. By following the directions and plugging it into your router by Ethernet to set it up, it is really simple to connect by WiFi and start monitoring by either web browser or android app(I'm sure there's an iTunes app as well).Night vision works great too. It always fun to see what the cats are doing while we're gone. all in all I would highly recommend this product I will definitely buy more as necessary around the house.

Reviews.Title: QUIT WORKING
Reviews.Author: Donald E. Garber
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS AND GOT IT HOOKED UP PRETTY EASY THEN AFTER TWO WEEKS IT JUST STOPPED WORKINGRESET IT AND IT STILL DONT WORKUPDATE ON THIS I GOT IT TO WORK AGAIN AND HAS RUN FOR A WEEK NOWWILL UPDATE AGAIN AFTER A COUPLE WEEKS

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: christopher s burns
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work - even after investing more than 10 hours in setup.  Note - I am expert level at networks and wireless - this should be a 15 minute task.  Directions are horrible - a lot was lost in translation from Chinese.  Even the warnings that pop up are unintelligible.  Even worse, try contacting the vendor for even more horrible communication in broken English.I hate that stuff isn't made in America.  Surely America could manufacture a piece of junk that doesn't work too!

Reviews.Title: Decent camera, poor audio
Reviews.Author: Gadget
Reviews.Content: For the price, it's a nice camera. Two issues: (1) the image seems to have a blue-ish tint at all times (2) This is a big one if you're using it as a baby monitor. When using the recommended iPhone app, the audio is not steady. It works for a few seconds, then cuts out, works again, then cuts out. Further, the audio quality is pretty bad.

Reviews.Title: Great camera if you enjoy wasting money!
Reviews.Author: Erin de Bit
