Reviews.Content: I have no idea how this camera got as good of reviews as it did.  The camera says on the box that a primary usage is a baby monitor (which is what i got it for).  There isn't much functionality a camera that is to be used as a baby monitory needs.  The camera needs good clear audio, connectivity reliability, and for my needs - be seen from my IPhone.  Wow, this thing is seriously junk.  First of all, the camera software to set it up is terrible.  The software claims to connect to WEP-open but absolutely cannot.  I was going to call their customer service to ask more about this, but the phone number is a Bejing number (so essentially no support).  Next, after i got the camera connected (had to change my encryption on my router to accommodate this camera) the audio worked about 10% of the time.  That alone is a deal breaker.  However, i thought i would continue to test the connectivity of the camera just to be certain.  The camera may have stayed connected, but it was too difficult to tell with the absolutely terrible IPhone app that was released.  The app would freeze after using it for a minute or two.  I would not recommend this camera to anyone who needs audio or reliability.  This camera is inexpensive, but unfortunately you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: ISucks
Reviews.Author: Andrew M.
Reviews.Content: Does not work, it sucks. It turns on but no picture and no sound. Thanks a lot for nothing. Thank you

Reviews.Title: it works when it's wired in....
Reviews.Author: vw
Reviews.Content: So I'm not very technical and I cannot get the wireless to connect.  I plan on contacting Tenvis support, but I can only do this during the weekdays during the day, but I have a full time job so let's just say I have not had time to do it.I have a Cisco/Linksys wireless router and it is not listed as an option in the software.  It works fine when it is connected via ethernet but I didn't buy this for the wired functions.I'll update this again after I contact Tenvis.

Reviews.Title: Security that is affordable!
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Starring "Whidbey Island Passages"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera with a very affordable price.I caught the person whose dog was messing up my walkway on the second day!  That alone was worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Tenvis IP Cam - works well at a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: althegreat "althegreat"
Reviews.Content: The camera works well if you have some networking knowledge. Otherwise, it may be tough to get it started if your home networking setup doesn't match exactly with the camera's default setting (mine didn't). The IP Camera Wizard program didn't work with my setup at all (it/my computer couldn't find the camera on the network). As with all things networking, it is expected since my setup didn't match with the camera's default settings (I used a different default IP address than most home networks). So, I setup everything manually and it worked fine. I am able to view the video from anywhere with internet access (through a computer using Firefox browser or with a free app on my cellphone). Remember, in order to view the video from outside of your home network, you need to setup your router to "port forward" to the camera (or let the router know you have a "web server", which is the camera, and tell the router what "port" it is on). I also use a free DDNS service (dvr-ddns.com) so that I don't have to use the IP address when viewing from outside home network (the DDNS built into the camera doesn't seem to work).As some other reviewers had noted, the instruction manual is hard to understand. Their website actually has some better tutorials.Overall, I am happy with this IP camera. Video qualify is acceptable (not great, but good enough). Panning and tilt works well with controls from Firefox browser as well as from the free app for Android device. I hope the camera will last as I think there are a lot of moving parts (motors) for the tilt and panning actions. Only time will tell.

Reviews.Title: deleted upon request
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Deleted upon request of tenvis , do not count this as a bad review. Thanks to Amazon for being easy to deal with, I hope Amazon treats their employees as well as they treat customers

Reviews.Title: Great product at a good price
Reviews.Author: lingjohn
Reviews.Content: Recently my house had a break-in. I decided to do something to prevent future problem. I installed a DIY security system Skylink SC-1000 Complete Wireless Alarm System, White which can dial my cellphone automatically. One thing I felt necessary is a IP camera so that I can view my house immediatelly and rule out any false alarm in case the security system is triggered.The camera serves this purpose very well. It is a perfect add-on to my newly installed security system. The installation is straight forward. It detects my router and configures everything automatically. Within minutes, I can access the camera through my computer and cell phone's web browser. It requires a plug-in to be installed. That's all it needs. Real time video quality is good. I have a fish tank and I can see fish swimming at work. The night vision quality is good as well. There are a bunch of settings you can customize but default setting satisfies my needs already.The only downside is the software is not fully translated. But with the maunal, I don't have much problem.This is a great product at a good price. The setup is easy.

Reviews.Title: Can't get it to work wireless
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It would be great it they gave more detailed instructions on how to set it up with your router. It says the WIFI parameters are incorrect and can't find the camera. I have forwarded the ports and still can't get it to work.

Reviews.Title: Very low powered Infrared Led.
Reviews.Author: Richard Pagan
Reviews.Content: I needed an extra camera additional to the foscam clone that I have (Wansview). This camera is not in the same league as the Wansview camera. This one has a nice web interface but the infrared led is almost non existent and you cannot disable the status led from blinking. I'm returning it real fast. It is not serving its purpose at night.

Reviews.Title: Has not worked ...no tech support
Reviews.Author: denny
Reviews.Content: I have had this for 16 days, it will not connect, I have sent a couple emails and have not been helped even though they said they would help me to "please do not return it just yet". it will be returned, Like I said still will not work, the tech support is not bad, it DOES NOT EXIST! I sent them email 2 days ago telling them that I am tired of waiting and being put off.....do not buy this!

Reviews.Title: Great camera and fantastic price!
Reviews.Author: TJ SMITH
Reviews.Content: The camera works exactly as it should. Setup was easy and a snap and the ability to use it wired or wireless was a big reason we went with this model. Plus,being able to bring the feed up on our phones/ipads from anywhere really makes this a great product.

Reviews.Title: Product stopped working after two months
Reviews.Author: Jordon B.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera back in February 2014. It was a pain to get setup but once I finally finished it worked fine until about a week ago. It just stopped displaying video. I can control the camera's movements but all that will display is a black screen. It was mounted to the ceiling, out of the way so no one could damage it. It's just stopped working without any reason. I recommend just spending the extra money and getting a Foscam.

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Value
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey L.
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a great little camera. Easy to set up. Needed a little assistance with the remote viewing mode but for around the house and for security works well. The night vision is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: motocross999
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. The set-up was easy and everything was laid out in the directions. I connected it to my iphone very quickly and had no problems. But if you sign into your camera with the default password on your phone and then change your password, you will have to sign in again on your phone for the camera feed to load. I thought there was a problem at first but figured out that all you have to do is login again. The only con is that the 2 way voice system is sometimes fuzzy, but it is still understandable. Overall it is a great camera and works well.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Martin J. Maggiora
Reviews.Content: just as it says works fine great price i will be buying a few more to put around the house

Reviews.Title: Total Trash
Reviews.Author: Adnan Chaudhary
Reviews.Content: The camera is not detected by WLAN or Computer..... Could not get it started..... Waste of money.... cannot return it since It will cost me more to return so have decided to dump it....... a Big NO NO for this item......

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Shoshana Rich
Reviews.Content: I got this in the mail today and got it setup in just a few minutes. The quick start guide walked me right through everything I needed. Now I can check on it from my pc and phone while I'm away. They give you the DDNS so you don't have to setup through another company if you don't want to. I'm happy, I plan to buy an outdoor model next.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Scott Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera was very easy to set up, and with the included web link provided by Tenvis, I can view this camera from across the country. It only took less than 15 minutes to get it setup and web accessible. I would buy this camera for my house again.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Brett Gardner
Reviews.Content: simple but efficient and economical  had a little trouble with the address but it was no fault of the product.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: The Tenvis JPT3815 does everything it advertises and installs very easily on a Linksys Router.  There is a nice video on installation on  Youtube and I just love the way the little Chinese girl says hello everybody!  If you expect more for the price you are asking too much.  I used Ipcam lite from google play on my Samsung S3 and it was also quite an easy installation.

Reviews.Title: Easy installation
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: The camera have awesome features for he price, was easy to install and monitoring is quite effective, night vision is great.the only trouble I had was with the Ethernet cable, was defective or intermittent...I had to use my cable instead.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Jerrod Harris "Sonoran Spice"
Reviews.Content: Purchased 3 of these and while the instructions were a little confusing at first, once you get it figured out the camera works flawlessly. I would recommend this to anyone in need of a little extra security.

Reviews.Title: Up and running and easy to access over the web
Reviews.Author: imarlb
Reviews.Content: The package arrived as scheduled on a Monday afternoon and by teatime I had it configured to the wireless in my apartment and able to place it where I wanted to,  and access it over the internet from my laptop and also iPad.  I had also set up 3 preset positions so that it is easy to quickly scan the room and see the thermostat and current temperature, so that if the A/C fails I will be able to call out maintenance.The most difficult part was configuring it for web access, but the online support site gave very clear instructions for each type of router.  (I have a 2Wire router from AT&T;).

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Solange
Reviews.Content: The camera works perfectly and its very easy to install as well. I can access it from my Android anytime from any room of my house.I really recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little gadjet
Reviews.Author: jorge delgado
Reviews.Content: This little camera does exactly as advertised, and its a bit smaller than i had thought. I'm so happy with this product I might order some more in the near future

Reviews.Title: Good IPCAM for the money I would buy again
Reviews.Author: Carmen M Torres
Reviews.Content: I had the camera working on wifi in about an hour. Had to configure the port, ddns and static ip on the router. It's all about configuring the router for the cam to work properly. I see plenty of negative reviews about this product it's not the cameras fault it's your router. The IPCAM does need better firmware and better software.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Connie M.
Reviews.Content: All parts in boxpo, had easy time setting uu, ons, works good looks good is good neasy instructi  loved it

Reviews.Title: Good easy basic setup
Reviews.Author: Andrew Davis
Reviews.Content: Works good. Tilt pan work well. 5 minute set up for computer/phone on the same WAN, but I haven't figured out yet how to connect to the camera via the internet.

Reviews.Title: Good camera good price
Reviews.Author: TheTechGuy
Reviews.Content: Camera was very easy to setup. The Tenvis camera also has a lot of features for the price. I have mine setup in the living facing the front door.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA, EASY TO SET UP!!
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THIS CAMERA BASED ON OTHER REVIEWS. IT WAS AS EASY TO SET UP AS DESCRIBED. I HAVENT TESTED OUT THE PORT FORWARDING YET, BUT PLAN TO DO SO. I HAVE ALREADY ORDERED A SECOND AND PLAN ON GETTING A THIRD.

Reviews.Title: So much better than the Belkin camera I paid twice as much for.
Reviews.Author: monkijohnni
Reviews.Content: The Belkin camera died after 2 weeks. The sound went out. So I returned and bought two of these for the same price. They are great. Probably not the pro-quality image some might want, but it is clear and exactly what you'd expect from a color security camera. I even have them set up outside in damp conditions and they are holding up. Good wifi range. I'd recommend this over the belkin or foscam.

Reviews.Title: having troubleon hooh up
Reviews.Author: jim nye
Reviews.Content: Not as saey as u tube claims. No matter what is said .because mines not up yet no help  & mostly left alone

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work with a Mac
Reviews.Author: B. Taylor
Reviews.Content: Essentially these are only designed for use with a PC.  While they probably CAN be made to work with a MAC they are very difficult to setup and I never could get them to display video on my laptop.  They would, however, display video on my iPhone but only when connected to the same local area wireless network.  Running a Mac?  Don't waste your time of these!

Reviews.Title: Going back to Amazon tomorrow
Reviews.Author: Jonathan S.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to provide a little security and peace of mind for our detached garage, so wifi connectivity was a must.  I received the item, unboxed it, plugged it in appropriately, and followed all of the instructions for its installation and setup.  The image quality was maybe not as great as I was hoping, but it suited my needs perfectly.I programmed the wifi settings, and then started playing around with the alert functionality while it was still hardwired into my router.  I tested that for a few hours, and then satisfied that also met my needs, I went to confirm the wifi settings and unplug it from the router... only to discover the wifi was no longer working.I restored it to factory settings.  I unplugged it and plugged it back in.  I reset it by way of the button on its base.  The camera refuses to see any of the ten wifi networks that any other wifi-capable device in my house can see.As the title says, I'm returning this one, and trying something from another company.Oh, and the best part?  TENVIS offered to send me a $15 cash rebate if I wrote a 5-star review on Amazon and gave them a link to prove it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Zheka
Reviews.Content: This camera has all the features cameras have for over $100 but this one is much more affordable. Needed basic wireless camera security for a small shop, for when I am away. Couldn't be happier with the cameras as they fit the job, and for the price I could get two for two different positions in the store that would get rid of blind spots. Rarely easy to set up with a little know how. I am able to check on my store from anywhere with my phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Steve B.
Reviews.Content: First such camera I've bought.  Happy with it's capabilities for the price.  A zoom lens (even manual) would be nice.  Web interface was better than I expected.  I like the multiple camera support.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Alex Ha
Reviews.Content: This is a great web cam. Easy setup and I'm able to monitor & control my cam away from home. You can't beat the price

Reviews.Title: Great Product, use it every day-JPT3815W IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jarrell Sr
Reviews.Content: This might be the first review on Amazon of the Tenvis JPT3815W. I originally wanted to go with the Foscam since it was the most popular of the same type of IP camera, but decided to take a chance with the Tenvis. The little booklet manual was easy to follow and has good illustrations and photos. Set it up first with the ethernet cable before attempting wireless setup. The software auto-detects your network and puts the camera in the same IP address range. I got it all working and was viewing over the LAN in under a half-hour. With some port-forwarding knowledge, you can set the camera up for remote view on your smartphone, which I did with the excellent Android phone app, TinyCam Monitor Pro. Picture quality is good and focus can be manually adjusted by turning the ring around and night-vision works very well.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality Is Excellent, But The Sound Quality Is Terrible
Reviews.Author: NIFman
Reviews.Content: I was excited to receive this product and install it in our son's bedroom to use as a baby monitor.  Setup was easy for me, but might be difficult for some if you're not used to configuring network devices.  I was able to set it up in a short amount of time and was very pleased with the picture quality.  The sound quality, however, is not that great.  I have tried a few different programs on our phones and they all have a crackling sound when you have the sound turned on.  With the sound off, you don't hear any crackling.  For the most part, we just use it for viewing purposes, so we just keep the sound off.  The night vision works great and we haven't had any problems with the pan/tilt feature.  I was worried that the lights on the front of the camera might keep our son awake, but he hasn't had any problems falling asleep.  If the sound quality was better, then I would rate it 5 stars.  The sound quality is bad enough to deduct 2 stars from the rating.

Reviews.Title: its an awesom product, must have product
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: this is an awesome product. a must have product and a good price. with the tenvis who need other name brands. it doesnt every thing that i brought it for. capturing picture thru motion detection when im not home and video. i could view it from my phone, laptop or tablet even if im not at home, its an awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera every time I have to fly out of town and it works great. the app for the iPhone works great. all in all a very good product.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera Terrible Software
Reviews.Author: Bryce Juzek
Reviews.Content: The camera is nice, but the software is terrible.  The tutorial for setting up the camera is showing it for a different software then what is provided and they have a thick chines accent.  Unless you are a computer expert i would highly recommend a different camera.  I can't view the video stream unless i am on the same wifi network.  I can't record the video stream on a mac.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: TroyOkerlund
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, love it! ture wireless, great sound. love the appusing it in a 3000 sqft home... good range

Reviews.Title: Recommed product
Reviews.Author: donna
Reviews.Content: I would like to recommend this product,  I have purchased 4 of these cameras for home use. The company and supplier stand by their product. Customer service was helpful in set up if you had questions. Shipping was quick. They are simple to setup and has quality viewing.

Reviews.Title: TENVIS JPT3815W
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Adams "RICK"
Reviews.Content: VERY HARD TO SET UP FOR ON LINE VIEWING.....YOU MUST COMMUNICATE WITH CHINA! NEVER AGAIN, AND THAT TAKE UP TO 24HRS. IT TOOK ME A WEEK TO SET UP.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Djordan
Reviews.Content: Ive had these camera's for a month they work great . Pictures are clear day & night . built in mic also works good . Able to hear & talk back with the intercom . If your looking for a good affordable ip camera this is it .

Reviews.Title: Much much better and simpler to install than FOSCAM!
Reviews.Author: M. Budd "Str8Dumpn"
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing, and far better than its competitors.I first bought FOSCAM wireless ip camera that was basically the same design and features as this camera for about 20$ more. Well, I got it and it wouldnt regester on the network, after 6hrs of time/tech support turns out the NIC cad was bad, so I returned it for a full refund.Aftwards I found the TENVIS camera for 20$ less, this time it took me 30mins and it was up and running and I was able to access it with my Iphone in mins. The camera is built very well, and the wireless features work perfect. Couldnt ask for anything better.Best IP/WIRELESS CAMERA ON THE MARKET!

Reviews.Title: Brilliant Camera, great for the price, all around very satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Cruz
Reviews.Content: I apologize for a former review I had posted, seems to have been a user error.Thank you for such a great product, any chance of a wholesale deal?

Reviews.Title: Great cam,I love it
Reviews.Author: Lei
Reviews.Content: This is a great IP cam for the price. works even better with android/iphone app.I bought this cam mainly for look at my daughter (5 month) during the night. the IR works great(with a faint red), tilt/pan motor is almost silent.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: liveinla
Reviews.Content: It's a great product and you can see the camera's view through the phone. The control software on the browser is easy to use and it offers relatively good viewing quality for its price.

Reviews.Title: Good product at afford price
Reviews.Author: Handy Su
Reviews.Content: It is a good prodcut at affordable price.The setup is easy and straightforward.I am accessing it through my cell phone or tablet without any problem.I love it so far.

Reviews.Title: Well began but short lived
Reviews.Author: Abhishek Jain
Reviews.Content: I bought the product to work as a baby monitor for my little girl. It was easy to install and use and served well as per its capabilities. But suddenly last week, on its 3 month birthday, it died. I am not satisfied by such short life of the product.The return / replace warranty is unfortunately only 1 month and I am now wondering what to do.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Kevin R. Davis
Reviews.Content: I wasn't blown away by this camera but it seems to be as good and reliable as the others I've tried.  It seems a little unstable with the pan and tilt controls so I'm penalizing it a little for that.  I also noticed some fisheye effect.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: E. Britt
Reviews.Content: picture is clear in daytime. night time picture is surprisingly good also. the only problem is trying to get the software to select folders to record in. even after logging in as admin in explorer and camera software it will not let me select a folder. another problem is that it reboots rather often. why it does this i do not know. for the price though it is a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent device
Reviews.Author: Mustafa W. Saleh
Reviews.Content: Excellent I love it working good with god value it is great and as expected clear  instructions and easy fix

Reviews.Title: This Camera does not work with MAC computer
Reviews.Author: mariely wynn
Reviews.Content: I bought this cameras on a very small budget for my business. The CD software does not work as have an error then I try to download the software through tenvis.com and did not work at all. The cameras does not work with MAC. One more thing, the cameras are wireless but the need to be plug to a power source at the back and the cable is not long kind of struggled.They look nice and would love to keep them.

Reviews.Title: unresponcesive
Reviews.Author: jude
Reviews.Content: the manufacturer does not reply to this product . .. there are some question i would like to ask the manufacturer but the customer relations/service is poor

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price!
Reviews.Author: My dog is smarter than your honor student
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. I got it up and running in a half hour and I do not know much about routers and IP stuff. So far, the camera has worked like a charm.

Reviews.Title: Great entry level IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Santos Dumont "14-Bis"
Reviews.Content: Not the nest image in the planet (no IR filter, Mjpg based), but they WORK. Alarms are still a bit buggy since the lowest motion alarm settings will bombard you with hundreds of emails (false alarms or changes on the sunlight?). But as a basic camera, and for its price, a great combination.

Reviews.Title: features + functionality + value = great product
Reviews.Author: Michael Naish Jr
Reviews.Content: i purchased one of these to test and eventually bought 5 more. the cameras reboot occasionally, but with the right settings (which pan/tilt/zoom (PTZ) setting to return to after a restart) it does not matter. i couple with with SecuritySpy recording software, and i have a very robust in-home monitoring solution.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says
Reviews.Author: MAH
Reviews.Content: It works well enough; the picture quality is ok for a VGA camera.  You can see everything, but do not expect to read a license plate, and you may not be able to make out a face.  If you want better quality you will need a camera in the mega pixel range.Night Vision works well in total darkness for at least 20ft.Setup was a little difficult but most people can manage it.

Reviews.Title: Home and Away Networking Solved (2 way audio still horrible)
Reviews.Author: Brentlh
Reviews.Content: To all those interested. I figured out the flaw to allow for outside viewing view the URL site. You can only go to your [...] site when not connected to your network that the camera is on. So at home connect via web browser to 192.168.1.239:81 and when away from home via laptop or iphone Cam Viewer app connect to [...]. One easy way to use the iPhone app at home and then away is to set-up and save the camera twice once with [...] and then second using 192.168.1.239:81. The 2 way audio is still not good regardless what I do (or whether I'm on the IE browser or iPhone) they really need a fix that as my wife wants me to return it because of that issue :( If anyone has any tricks let me know.

Reviews.Title: Correction
Reviews.Author: William Callahan "CruelladeBill"
Reviews.Content: I was  told I wrote a disparaging review. I do not remember doing it? Might be a mistake, or a senior moment. In fact I am very happy w /the Camera. The service has been exceptional. These guys helped me more than once along the way. Thanks Bill Callahan

Reviews.Title: IP wireless camera
Reviews.Author: Sharon Conway
Reviews.Content: Works great.  I can access and control the camera from both my android phone and home computers as long as I am on my home intranet. I have not been able to setup something correctly (the router maybe?) to see the images outside of my intranet but am still working on it.Would be great as a home security camera to see who is at the front door, where the kids are, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great Product. HORRIBLE customer service.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Guy
Reviews.Content: Tenvis NEVER answers the phone and NEVER returns phone calls or voicemails. I can't view the camera unless I'm AT HOME on the same network as the camera. I bought it so I can monitor my dog while at work. Since I can't get this function to work it's USELESS for me until I can get some help.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I purchased these cameras to setup as a nanny cam to watch our little girl's care during the day when we were away at work. As long as you don't expect fantastic resolution, turnkey setup, and crystal-clear audio, these cameras are a good value. I have experienced the crackling audio as other reviewers have mentioned, and the audio is mostly useless. I haven't tried a recording to see if it is any better there, but live viewing with audio you can't hear much of anything with the crackling and cutting out. That being said, I think the picture is acceptable and will suffice for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Nice little IP camera...
Reviews.Author: Alex Choung
Reviews.Content: The installation was easy and the image quality is above average (nice).It stopped pan/tilting a couple of times so far, but with the hard reset it came back working.The software has a room for improvement. The software that comes with the product has a limitation.For instance, when set up the 'preset' it could have a control that allows to scan only those preset positions.The night mode activates automatically which is very nice, but when you want the led turned off for any reason they cannot be turned off as well as the green flashing light as some other reviewers pointed out.The mobile apps are great, but in order to have one with all functions enabled a paid Pro version is needed. One mentioned on the product's installation instruction has Ad on the top, but there is TinyCam app that is Ad Free. Both are FREE version apps.Well... Overall it is a good camera and I'm very satisfied so far. At the moment am considering the outdoor units from Tenvis too as the tests turned out well so far.

Reviews.Title: Kinda a pain to work with
Reviews.Author: Bradley Converse
Reviews.Content: Does not work if your router emits any 802.11N signal. You have to turn it off for the thing to work. Just get an apexis or foscam camera. Those work more reliably with your existing infrastructure.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis Pretty Good!
Reviews.Author: The Nipster
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cheaper priced IP camera. I found it. Good sound. Good speaker sound. Camera view OK wish I spent the extra $40 to get the iRobot3. But the controls are dead on! Night vision is fantastic! Over all --- nice camera and you can't beat the price. I would buy another one if I need more indoor cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: J. R. Dempsey
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount anywhere you want and simple set up. Very easy to use and good instructions if you need them. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Wireless WiFi 2
Reviews.Author: Ferdi
Reviews.Content: I think the best thing about this camera is the ability to control it from your phone, Picture quality is good and focus can be manually adjusted by turning the ring around and night-vision works very well.It's amazing all this can be configured using the camera's built-in "web server." Well I was very impressed.

Reviews.Title: wireless camera
Reviews.Author: kote
Reviews.Content: The advertisement for it looks pretty good, looks like a trustworthy camera. one thing noticing i might not like to much is that it appears that it has to be moved manually and for it to be a wifi camera kind of the point would to not have to be there with it to use it.

Reviews.Title: This is no plug and play, but plug and pray!
Reviews.Author: roaeja "Hey you!"
Reviews.Content: Pain in the butt to set up, but once up and running, not to bad.A high speed internet helps.  Remember, you are uploading your video to their server and then downloading it to your browser window.  So, what you see, they see.  Like I-spy.  And sometimes the camera movements can be jerky, this is where a high speed internet connection helps.  Other than that, not to bad.For the price, it can't be beat.  Color is a little off and I wish I could move the picture with my mouse pointer.  ??Update:  This stopped working for Mac Lion update.  It was Safari 6.0, causing the trouble.  It would freeze after a few seconds.  I finally traced the problem down to the browser, Safari.  If I use Firefox, it work ok.Update:  Google Chrome seems to be the ONLY browser thatworks.  Firefox gives you a black screen after a few minutes,Opera doesn't work at all, but Chrome is nice and steady.

Reviews.Title: unless you are a network administrator, you can never pass the installation.
Reviews.Author: Huseyin Polat "party men"
Reviews.Content: It was so complicated that after trying days I still couldn' t pass the DDNS settings.. it threw me an error. if you don't have years of experience in network administration, skip this camera.

Reviews.Title: Blew out my wi-fi
Reviews.Author: AdhesiveRaptor
Reviews.Content: I had to return the to return the Tenvis and AT&T; had to come out and replace my Wi-Fi because it kept shutting down my Wi-Fi box. Even he didn't know why. I later found through research it was because this model doesn't support 802.11n.

Reviews.Title: doesn't work
Reviews.Author: J. Rogers
Reviews.Content: Says it will work with mac. Couldn't be a bigger lie. the software doesn't work and the web links don't download. tried on three computers, "two mac's and a dell"... what more can you expect from a product from China?

Reviews.Title: i was looking for a babycam
Reviews.Author: Thierry
Reviews.Content: i was looking for a babycambut babymonitors seem to be very expensive and you will have to carry a receiver with short battery life and extremly small screenthis one cought my eye, its cheaper and you can access it with your smartphone or tableti noticed they sell this model under alot of diffrent brands, here at my local dealer they sell it as a brand named "VSA"my guess is that the firmware of all the diffrent brands are all the same and contain all the same hardware and software bugsi was able to test it at the store and its not very reliable, the image can freeze forever as babymonitor its a big no noso i came to one conclusion, if i want a solid ip camera for security or babycam with a killer resolution and low pricei ordered myself a raspberry pi + wifi donglei can install the needed software onto my raspberry pi connect to my network and plug in almost any kind of webcamstream the video output to the web and configure it so that only i can view the stream from at home or the internetand i can make it record video on demand so it starts recording on movementonly some knowledge is needed of linux to configure it in this setup

Reviews.Title: TENVIS JPT3815W Wireless IP
Reviews.Author: Cyril
Reviews.Content: Purchasing this product was a big mistake, since I had it I can't go wireless which was my main reason of buying it. I have tried four different computers bug can't get through, right now I can't recommend this to anyone...

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: JAMES HAWK "HAWK"
Reviews.Content: Had to call many times to get it to operate. You"ll be talking with someone in India, in broken English. Only functioned on my computer out of town temporarily. Not worth the many phone calls and headaches.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, well worth it's price.
Reviews.Author: Mr Clean
Reviews.Content: I am totally amazed how easy it is to setup this camera.  The installation CD guided me through flawlessly.  Great wireless WiFiconnection allows me to view the camera from anywhere in my house and from my IPhone.  There is a little latency for internet connection which I can live with, as long as I can view images from my iphone over the 4G.  Alarm works fine and send me email messages with video snapshot. Pan/Tilt control is very smooth,  offer enough range of motion in our living room, where I can see through the window to the backyard.Overall, I would definitely give it a 5 star,  for its price over its value.  It has my recommendations.

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Easy Setup, Good Customer Service
Reviews.Author: McGels
Reviews.Content: First IP Camera purchase and the installation/setup was smooth as described.  I was not able to get the DDNS setup correctly for remote viewing and reached out to Tenvis support.  They quickly responded and were able to assist me in setting this up correctly.  I use this camera to monitor our 2 year old who doesn't always like to stay in her bed at night.  We view this camera daily using different devices (iPhone, iPad, PC's).  I would have rated this 5 stars if the audio was decent.  The audio has never worked on this device.  Not too big of deal since we have a separate baby monitor but would be nice.I will definitely look at purchasing additional cameras to use to monitor entry doors of our house.

Reviews.Title: Good value.
Reviews.Author: Dennis Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Great value, reasonable documentation.  You need to understand routers and networks to successfully use, but this would be true for most IP cameras.

Reviews.Title: Tenvis Creeper Cam
Reviews.Author: Timothy L.
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the money.  It can be a little daunting to get working well initially.  Most problems with setup are not with the camera.  So if you are a novice, you will need to reset your patience timer and learn a little about how network cameras work.  It is fairly easy to get it working on your house WiFi network, but accessibility with an outside computer via a web browser can lead to some challenges.  Nonetheless, when it is up and working properly, it is a very decent camera for the price with a good picture and flawless motion with the pan/tilt.  Still having limited success with smart phone access, but I suspect my data speed is less than optimal.

Reviews.Title: A lot of camera and support, for a a little money !!!
Reviews.Author: thompson.george
Reviews.Content: I own a JP T3815W PT network camera. I normally am not one to write reviews, however, this camera and their company are definitely worthy of praise. The camera itself offers many functions of a camera that you would expect to spend three times the purchase price that I paid for the camera. In addition, their service department is unsurpassed in assisting with any problems you may have and are very friendly and cooperative to work with. I would also like to add that their service is ongoing. You would be very hard-pressed to find another company with such a great service department. In closing, I would personally recommend that if you are considering a purchase from this company, you should not hesitate in the least when you make a purchase from them. My name is George Thompson and will always consider Tenvis as my first choice.
